tika-vin06t:16_0: Saññā nimittaṃ kattā ca, parimāṇaṃ payojanaṃ;
tika-vin06t:19_0: Tatrāha – “vattabbaṃ vattumicchatāti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha kathaṃvidho vattā”ti? Uccate –
tika-vin06t:22_1: So hi anekappakāro atthānurūpo atthānanurūpo ceti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:22_2: Sandhāyabhāsito byañjanabhāsito sāvasesapāṭho niravasesapāṭho nīto neyyoti.
tika-vin06t:22_3: Tatra anekatthavattā sandhāyabhāsito nāma “mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:22_8: Viparīto niravaseso nāma “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tyādi.
tika-vin06t:23_0: Atthopi anekappakāro pāṭhattho sabhāvattho ñeyyattho pāṭhānurūpo pāṭhānanurūpo sāvasesattho niravasesattho nītattho neyyatthotyādi.
tika-vin06t:23_10: Vajjetabbaṃ kiñci apariccajitvā parisesaṃ katvā vutto sāvasesattho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjatī”ti ca,
tika-vin06t:23_13: Viparīto niravasesattho “sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca. Tatra,
tika-vin06t:23_17: Saddavaseneva vedanīyo nītattho “rūpā saddā rasā gandhā,
tika-vin06t:24_0: “Yo attho saddato ñeyyo, nītatthaṃ iti taṃ vidū;
tika-vin06t:26_6: Dussīlo hi attānamupahantunādeyyavāco ca bhavatyapattāhārācāro iva niccāturo vejjo.
tika-vin06t:26_8: nāvassaṃ nissayo ca bhavatyahivāḷagahākulo iva kamalasaṇḍo.
tika-vin06t:26_9: Ubhayavipanno sabbathāpyanupāsanīyo bhavati gūthagatamiva chavālātaṃ gūthagato viya ca kaṇhasappo.
tika-vin06t:26_10: Ubhayasampanno pana suci sabbathāpyupāsanīyo sevitabbo ca viññūhi,
tika-vin06t:31_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”. –
tika-vin06t:37_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:40_3: pūjārahatāya vā akāraṇataṃ dassetvā yo koci imissā samantapāsādikāya ādigāthāya niddiṭṭhalokanāthattahetuṃ
tika-vin06t:40_4: yathāvuttahetumūlena thirataraṃ acalaṃ katvā yathāvuttahetukālaṃ accantameva pūrento avasāne yathāvuttahetuphalaṃ
tika-vin06t:44_1: Tāni hi accantadukkhena kasirena vacanapathātītānubhāvena mahatā ussāhena karīyantīti atidukkarāni nāma.
tika-vin06t:44_2: Atidukkarattā eva hi tesaṃ atidullabhaṃ loke anaññasādhāraṇaṃ nāthattasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ phalanti,
tika-vin06t:44_4: hetumūlaṃ nāma yathāvuttassa hetuno nipphādanasamatthā mahākaruṇā,
tika-vin06t:44_5: sā ādipaṇidhānato paṭṭhāya “mutto mocessāmī”tiādinā nayena yāva hetuphalappayojanā,
tika-vin06t:49_5: Kāmañca so kālo asaṅkhyeyyavasena pameyyo viññeyyo,
tika-vin06t:49_6: tathāpi kappakoṭivasena aviññeyyataṃ sandhāya “kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kāla”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:49_10: Tattha kappīyati saṃkappīyati sāsapapabbatādīhi upamāhi kevalaṃ saṃkappīyati,
tika-vin06t:49_25: mittāmittādibhedaṃ pakkhapātaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ sattaṃ ajjhupekkhanto cāti attho.
tika-vin06t:49_26: Khedaṃ gatoti anantappabhedaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ anubhavanaṭṭhena gato,
tika-vin06t:49_28: Saṃsāradukkhañhi sārīrikaṃ mānasikañca sukhaṃ khedayati pātayatīti “khedo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:52_3: Na hi kassaci dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokassa upakāraṃ āvahati.
tika-vin06t:52_7: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:52_8: Tattha bhagavā yathāvuttahetūhi sattānaṃ vineyyabhāvanipphādanapaññābījāni vapi,
tika-vin06t:52_11: Na evaṃ saṃsāradukkhena lokassa upakāraṃ kiñci akāsi,
tika-vin06t:52_13: Imissā yojanāya sabbapaṭhamassa bodhisattassa uppattikālato paṭṭhāya bodhisattassa nāthattasaṅkhātapāramitāhetuphalādhigamo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:55_1: Paṭhamacittassa pāramitābhāvo rukkhassa aṅkurato paṭṭhāya uppattiupamāya sādhetabbo. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:55_6: na antarā khedaṃ asahanto nivattatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:55_7: Lokadukkhāpanayanakāmassa vā bhagavato attano dukkhānubhavanasamatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:58_0: Evaṃadhippāyassa attamattadukkhānubhavanasamatthatāya kāyeva kathāti atisayaṃ atthaṃ dassetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:58_1: Atha vā khedaṃ gatoti byāpāraṃ paricayaṃ gatotipi attho sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:58_2: Kammādīsu sabyāpāraṃ purisaṃ disvā santi hi loke vattāro “khinnoyaṃ kamme,
tika-vin06t:58_4: Imissā yojanāya nāthoti iminā buddhattādhigamasiddhaṃ koṭippattaṃ nāthabhāvaṃ patvā ṭhitakālo dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:58_8: Tasmā so ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkarāni karonto avasāne dukkarapāramitāpāripūriyā tāsaṃ phalabhūtaṃ nāthabhāvaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_9: patvā lokahitāya byāpāraṃ gatoti ayamattho nidassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:58_10: “Bodhiṃ gato”ti vuttepi subyattaṃ hetuphalaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:58_11: Buddhabhāvappattasseva ca nāthassa namo kato hoti visesavacanasabbhāvato,
tika-vin06t:58_14: So ca pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāvamaraṇakālā hoti.
tika-vin06t:58_15: Taṃ ativiya parittaṃ kālaṃ lajjino atisukaraṃ sīlamattaṃ ekakassa attano hitāya attamattadukkhāpanayanādhippāyena
tika-vin06t:58_16: paripūrento ko nāma idhalokaparalokātikkamasukhaṃ na gaccheyya,
tika-vin06t:58_17: nanu bhagavā sakalalokadukkhāpanayanādhippāyena kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kālaṃ karonto atidukkaranirassādaṃ
tika-vin06t:58_18: khedaṃ gatoti aññāpadesena guṇaṃ vaṇṇeti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:59_0: Lokahitāyāti ettha lokiyati ettha dukkhanti loko,
tika-vin06t:59_3: Tasmā tassa sattalokassa idhalokaparalokahitaṃ atikkantaparalokānaṃ vā ucchinnalokasamudayānaṃ lokānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:59_4: idha jātiloke okāsaloke vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhātañca hitaṃ sampiṇḍetvā lokassa, lokānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:59_9: taṃ suṇāthā”ti evaṃ yācanaṭṭhenāpi nāthateti nātho.
tika-vin06t:59_10: Bhikkhūnaṃ vītikkamānurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikāya ca karuṇāya upagantvā tapati,
tika-vin06t:59_11: suttantavasena vā tesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ anusayite kilese karuṇāya ca paññāya ca upagantvā tapati,
tika-vin06t:59_12: abhidhammavasena vā te te saṅkhāre aniccādilakkhaṇavasena upaparikkhitvā attano kilese paññāya upecca
tika-vin06t:59_14: Sadevake loke appaṭipuggalattā kenaci appaṭihatadhammadesanattā paramacittissariyappavattito ca issariyaṭṭhenāpi nāthateti nātho.
tika-vin06t:59_15: “Dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesī”ti vacanato sampahaṃsanasaṅkhātena āsīsaṭṭhena,
tika-vin06t:59_16: paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya “kathaṃ nāmāhaṃ mutto mocayissāmī”tiādinā nayena āsīsaṭṭhena vā nāthateti nāthoti veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:59_18: Catūhipi nāthaṅgehi catuvesārajjacatupaṭisambhidādayo sabbepi buddhaguṇā yojetabbā,
tika-vin06t:60_3: Mahākāruṇikassāti ettha sabbasattavisayattā mahussāhappabhavattā ca mahatī karuṇā mahākaruṇā.
tika-vin06t:60_4: Tattha paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya yāvaanupādisesanibbānapurappavesā niyuttoti mahākāruṇiko, bhagavā.
tika-vin06t:60_5: Ettha ca mahākāruṇikassāti iminā yathāvuttahetumūlaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:60_6: Nikkaruṇo hi paradukkhesu udāsino buddhatthāya paṇidhānamattampi atibhāriyanti maññanto appameyyaṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin06t:60_7: atidukkaraṃ hetuṃ pūretvā nāthattasaṅkhātaṃ hetuphalappayojanabhūtaṃ lokahitaṃ kathaṃ karissati.
tika-vin06t:60_8: Tasmā sabbaguṇamūlabhūtattā mahākaruṇāguṇameva vaṇṇento “namo mahākāruṇikassā”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:60_12: tiṇṇampi anurūpaṃ payojananti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:63_0: Ettha siyā “anekesu bhagavato guṇesu vijjamānesu kasmā ‘mahākāruṇikassā’ti ekameva gahita”nti? Uccate –
tika-vin06t:64_0: Dosahīnassa satthassa, codanā tu na vijjate;
tika-vin06t:66_0: Na mayā codanā katā, kintu pucchā eva katā. Apica –
tika-vin06t:74_0: Sammāpi codanā taṃ khalu, guravo vivākyā vivaddha;
tika-vin06t:79_0: Yassa hi vākyasahassaṃ, vākye vākye satañca jivhā;
tika-vin06t:80_0: Nāmaṃ dasabalaguṇapadesaṃ, vattuṃ kappenapi na sakkā.
tika-vin06t:88_0: Yathā tvaṃ sattānaṃ, dasabala tathā ñāṇakaruṇā;
tika-vin06t:89_0: Guṇadvandaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, tava guṇagaṇā nāma tiguṇāti. –
tika-vin06t:90_1: Atha vā “chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu aññatarattā taggahaṇena sesāpi gahitāva sahacaraṇalakkhaṇenā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:90_2: Visesato panettha abhidhammassa kevalaṃ paññāvisayattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathārambhe ācariyena “karuṇā viya sattesu,
tika-vin06t:90_3: paññā yassa mahesino”ti paññāguṇo vaṇṇito tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaayādhimuttibhedānurūpaparicchindanapaññāya,
tika-vin06t:90_7: Idha pana vinaye āsayādinirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ karuṇāya pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto,
tika-vin06t:90_9: avattabbārahañca vadanto sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesīti karuṇāguṇoyeveko vaṇṇitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:99_2: Bhavā bhavanti vattamānabhavato aññaṃ bhavaṃ gacchati upagacchati,
tika-vin06t:99_11: asekkhā dhammā”tiādīsu viya hi vuddhiatthattā akārassa.
tika-vin06t:99_23: Avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsinoti ettha navapi lokuttaradhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin06t:99_31: Phalasāmaññena tiṇṇampi phalānaṃ atthīti navavidhopesa “avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:99_33: Anabhihitopi hi dhammassa tatrābhihitova bujjhitabbo iti vacanato kāraṇagocaraggahaṇena cattāripi phalāni gahitāni.
tika-vin06t:99_34: Narakādīsu apatamānaṃ dhāreti sugatiyaṃ uppādanenāti dhammo.
tika-vin06t:99_35: Puna sugatimhi ajananakārī akusaladhamme nivāretvā poseti pavatteti vaḍḍhetīti dhammo.
tika-vin06t:100_3: ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsarita’nti vacanato catusaccadhammaṃ
tika-vin06t:100_4: asambudhaṃ bhavā bhavaṃ gacchati jīvalokoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:100_6: tasseva “tassā”ti ante taṃniddesena niyamanato catusaccadhammopi avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī dhammavaroti cāpajjati.
tika-vin06t:100_7: Aññathā “namo avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsino dhammavarassa tassā”ti taṃniddesena samānavibhattikaraṇaṃ na yujjati atippasaṅganiyamanato,
tika-vin06t:100_9: Tasmā dukkhasamudayasaccānaṃ tabbhāvappasaṅgo natthīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:100_11: Api ca maggasaccanirodhasaccesu phalānaṃ apariyāpannattā nava lokuttaradhammā saṅgahitāti vacanavirodho,
tika-vin06t:100_12: phalānaṃ asaṅgahe verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ na kevalaṃ ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca,
tika-vin06t:100_15: dhammamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti vacanavirodho cāti pubbāparaviruddhā esā gāthā sāsanaviruddhā cā”ti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:100_17: Ettha hi ācariyena pavattipavattihetuvisayavibhāgo ca dassito. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:100_23: Sugatiduggatippabhedo hi bhavo atthato pañcupādānakkhandhā honti.
tika-vin06t:100_24: “Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti vacanato dukkhappavatti pavatti nāma,
tika-vin06t:100_26: avijjāsaṅkhātassa ca pavattihetussa aggahitaggahaṇena nirodhamaggasaccadvayaṃ visayo nāma.
tika-vin06t:101_0: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ buddhena gocarāsevanāya āsevitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:101_2: Ettāvatā asambudhaṃ buddhanisevitaṃ yanti upayogappatto yo visayo nirodho ca maggo ca,
tika-vin06t:101_3: tassa yathāvuttāvijjādikilesajālattayaviddhaṃsino namo dhammavarassāti ayaṃ gāthāya attho.
tika-vin06t:101_8: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti suttattho ca asesato gahito hoti.
tika-vin06t:101_9: Atha vā imāya gāthāya kevalaṃ pariyattidhammova gahito hoti,
tika-vin06t:101_12: tampi asambudhaṃ buddheheva nisevitaṃ gocarāsevanāya anaññanisevitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:102_0: Tatiyagāthāya sīlādayo kiñcāpi lokiyalokuttarā yathāsambhavaṃ labbhanti,
tika-vin06t:102_1: tathāpi ante “ariyasaṅgha”nti vacanato sīlādayo cattāro dhammakkhandhā lokuttarāva.
tika-vin06t:102_2: Ettha ca “sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇappabhutīhī”ti vattabbe sarūpekasesaṃ katvā “vimuttiñāṇappabhutīhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:102_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi vimuttīti phaladhammāva sutte adhippetā,
tika-vin06t:102_7: Nibbānaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vacanato maggādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vimuttiñāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:102_8: Vimutti vimokkho khayoti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin06t:102_9: “Khaye ñāṇaṃ anuppāde ñāṇanti ettha khayo nāma maggo,
tika-vin06t:102_10: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayoti phalanibbānānaṃ adhivacana”nti sutte āgatameva.
tika-vin06t:102_11: Pahīnakilesānaṃ khayo pākatiko khayo eva. Pabhuti-
tika-vin06t:102_12: saddena tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidāti evamādayo guṇā saṅgahitā.
tika-vin06t:102_14: Khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikānanti “anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti suttato kusalassa viruhanaṭṭhānattā,
tika-vin06t:102_15: suttantanayena upanissayapaccayattā ca kāmaṃ kusalassa khettaṃ hoti saṅgho,
tika-vin06t:102_24: Lokepi hi devadattassa khettaṃ yaññadattassa khettaṃ sāliyavupanissayattā sālikhettaṃ yavakhettanti ca vuccati.
tika-vin06t:102_26: ariyabhāvaṃ vā pattaṃ sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena saṅghatattā saṅghaṃ. “Ariya-
tika-vin06t:102_30: tathāpi uttamasaṅghe guṇagāravena uttamaṅgameva niddisanto “sirasā namāmī”tyāha.
tika-vin06t:102_31: Sirassa pana uttamatā uttamānaṃ cakkhusotindriyānaṃ nissayattā,
tika-vin06t:102_32: tesaṃ uttamatā ca dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetutāya veditabbā. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:105_0: Evamavatvā kasmā ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:105_4: Tasmā “satācārato bhaṭṭhā mā mayaṃ homā”ti karīyati,
tika-vin06t:105_5: catugambhīrabhāvayuttañca vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmassa mahāsamuddaṃ ogāhantassa viya paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatassāpi mahantaṃ bhayaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:105_8: Apicācariyo satthupūjāvidhānena asatthari satthābhinivesassa lokassa yathābhūtaṃ satthari eva sammāsambuddhe satthusambhāvanaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin06t:105_11: Antarāyabahulattā khandhasantatiyā vippakatāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya attano āyuvaṇṇasukhabalānaṃ parikkhayasambhavāsaṅkāya “abhivādanasīlissa…pe…
tika-vin06t:105_12: āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti vuttānisaṃse yāva saṃvaṇṇanāpariyosānā pattheti.
tika-vin06t:105_13: Api cettha buddhassa bhagavato paṇāmapūjāvidhānaṃ sammāsambuddhabhāvādhigamatthaṃ buddhayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-vin06t:105_15: lokuttarasseva vā saddhammassa pūjāvidhānaṃ paccekabuddhabhāvādhigamatthaṃ paccekabuddhayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-vin06t:105_17: Paramatthasaṅghapūjāvidhānaṃ paramatthasaṅghabhāvādhigamatthaṃ sāvakayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti,
tika-vin06t:105_18: maṅgalādīni vā sātthāni anantarāyāni ciraṭṭhitikāni bahumatāni ca bhavantīti evaṃladdhikānaṃ cittaparitosanatthaṃ
tika-vin06t:106_0: “Maṅgalaṃ bhagavā buddho, dhammo saṅgho ca maṅgalaṃ;
tika-vin06t:110_0: Ettha ca satthupadhānattā dhammasaṅghānaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ satthupūjāvidhānamicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ sāsanato lokato ca.
tika-vin06t:114_0: Saṅgho ca vutto yamato sa satthā.
tika-vin06t:116_0: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthā tato mato;
tika-vin06t:117_0: Dhammaṭṭhito so saṅgho ca, satthusaṅkhyaṃ nigacchati.
tika-vin06t:118_0: Santi hi loke vattāro kosagataṃ asiṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ visuṃ aparāmasitvā “asiṃ gahetvā ṭhito eso”ti.
tika-vin06t:121_3: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vuttattā bhājananti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:121_4: Atha vā “buddhasubodhito dhammo ācariyaparamparāya suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittatelamiva aparihāpetvā yāvajjatanā
tika-vin06t:121_5: ābhatattā eva mādisānampi sotadvāramanuppatto”ti saṅghassa ācariyo atīva ādarena paṇāmaṃ karoti “sirasā
tika-vin06t:122_1: ācariyena pana adhippetappayojanaṃ attanā eva vuttaṃ “iccevamaccantanamassaneyya”ntiādinā catutthagāthāya.
tika-vin06t:122_4: Yadi evaṃ yathāvihitamattameva pūjāvidhānaṃ arahati ratanattayaṃ,
tika-vin06t:122_5: na tato uddhanti āpajjatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ “evamaccantanamassaneyya”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:122_8: aññena vā tādisena accantameva muhuttamapi aṭṭhatvā abhikkhaṇaṃ nirantaraṃ niyamena namassanārahaṃ namassamānassa hitamahapphalakaraṇatoti attho.
tika-vin06t:122_9: Evaṃvidhaṃ dullabhaṭṭhena mahapphalaṭṭhena ca siddhaṃ ratanabhāvaṃ ratanattayaṃ namassamāno yaṃ puññābhisandaṃ alatthaṃ alabhiṃ.
tika-vin06t:122_15: “vipula”nti vacanato so attho na yujjatīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:123_0: Pañcamagāthā yasmiṃ vinayapiṭake pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhite sakalaṃ
tika-vin06t:123_1: tividhampi sāsanaṃ tesveva puggalesu patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:123_4: Bhagavā hi ṭhitihetubhūtāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā abhāvena aṭṭhitoti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:123_5: Ucchedadiṭṭhiko hi paraloke nirapekkho kevalaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogamanuyuñjanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin06t:123_6: na paralokahitāni puññāni kattuṃ byāvaṭo hoti,
tika-vin06t:123_8: Bhagavā pana tathā atiṭṭhanto anāyūhanto majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto sayañca oghaṃ tari,
tika-vin06t:123_12: Catubrahmavihāravasena sattesu suṭṭhu sammā ca ṭhitassāti atthavasena vā susaṇṭhitassa.
tika-vin06t:123_13: Susaṇṭhitattā hesa kevalaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo hitaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo sampattiyā ca pamodito apakkhapatito ca hutvā vinayaṃ deseti,
tika-vin06t:123_14: tasmā imasmiṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre sāruppāya thutiyā thomento āha “susaṇṭhitassā”ti.
tika-vin06t:123_18: “susaṇṭhānā surūpatā”ti suttassa ca vasena susaṇṭhitassāti attho vutto,
tika-vin06t:123_24: Tasmā bhāvanapuṃsakavasena amissaṃ taṃ vaṇṇayissanti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:123_25: Pubbācariyānubhāvanti aṭṭhakathā “yasmā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsū”ti vacanato tesaṃ ānubhāvo nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:123_26: Kiñci apubbaṃ disvā santi hi loke vattāro “kassesa ānubhāvo”ti.
tika-vin06t:123_27: Atha vā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ anugantvā taṃtaṃpāṭhe atthaṃ bhāvayati vibhāvayati,
tika-vin06t:123_28: tassa tassa vā atthassa bhāvanā vibhāvanāti ānubhāvo vuccati aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin06t:124_0: Pubbācariyānubhāve sati kiṃ puna taṃ vaṇṇayissanti iminā ārambhenāti tato vuccanti chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamanavamagāthāyo.
tika-vin06t:124_7: “Taṃ vaṇṇayissa”nti vuttattā pubbaṭṭhakathāya ūnabhāvo dassitoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:125_0: Sallekhiyeti kilesajātaṃ bāhullaṃ vā sallikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho,
tika-vin06t:125_5: Paññāya accuggataṭṭhena dhajo upamā etesanti dhajūpamā,
tika-vin06t:125_10: saddo “sāmaṃ saccāni buddhattā sambuddho”ti vacanato paccekabuddhāpi saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin06t:126_0: Aṭṭhakathāya ūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano karaṇavisesaṃ tassa payojanañca dassetuṃ “saṃvaṇṇanā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:126_1: Na kiñci atthaṃ abhisambhuṇātīti kiñci payojanaṃ phalaṃ hitaṃ na sādhetīti attho “na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:126_2: Ajjhesanaṃ buddhasirivhayassāti iminā yasmā sahampatibrahmunā ajjhiṭṭhena dhammo desito bhagavatā,
tika-vin06t:126_4: tasmā ayampi ācariyo taṃ ācariyavattaṃ pūjento imaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ buddhasirittherassa yācanaṃ nissāya akāsīti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:127_0: Tato paraṃ dve gāthāyo kattabbavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin06t:127_2: ekaṭṭhakathāya kusalassa vā “ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthī”ti paṭikkhepaṃ nivāreti,
tika-vin06t:127_4: theravādadassanena vinayavinicchayaṃ pati vinayadharānaṃ kāraṇopapattito uhāpohakkamaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:127_5: ayuttattheravādapaṭikkhepena puggalappamāṇataṃ paṭikkhipatīti ime cānisaṃsā kattabbavidhidassanena dassitā honti.
tika-vin06t:127_6: Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañca samārabhanto tassā saṃvaṇṇanāya mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ sarīraṃ katvā samārabhissaṃ,
tika-vin06t:127_8: tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu loke vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu ca yo vutto vinicchayo,
tika-vin06t:127_10: vinayayuttiyā vā yuttamatthaṃ tassa sarīrassa alaṅkāraṃ viya gaṇhanto samārabhissaṃ.
tika-vin06t:127_13: Atha vā antogadhattheravādaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā samārabhissanti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:127_17: Tattha paccarī nāma sīhaḷabhāsāya uḷumpaṃ kira,
tika-vin06t:127_18: tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:128_0: Samma samārabhissanti kattabbavidhānaṃ sajjetvā ahaṃ ṭhito,
tika-vin06t:128_1: tasmā taṃ me nisāmentūti gāthāya taṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ me mama,
tika-vin06t:128_3: Nisāmentu passantu paññācakkhunā suṇantu vā saddhāvīriyapītipāmojjābhisaṅkhārena saṅkharitvā pūjayantā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ.
tika-vin06t:128_9: tasmā parinibbutepi tasmiṃ tathāgate tattha sokaṃ akatvā sakkacca dhammaṃ paṭimānayantā nisāmentūti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:128_10: Atha vā “dhammakāyā tathāgatā”ti vacanato dhammo ca so padīpo cāti dhammappadīpo, bhagavā.
tika-vin06t:129_1: so tatheva buddhaputtehi sāvakehi ñāto avabuddho,
tika-vin06t:129_2: yehi tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matiṃ adhippāyaṃ accajantā niravasesaṃ gaṇhantā.
tika-vin06t:130_3: kintu sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ idha vinayamhi paṇḍitānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:130_4: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:131_0: Tato cāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaatthajātato tantikkamaṃ pāḷikkamaṃ.
tika-vin06t:131_13: Tassa tassa āgamasuttassa abhidhammavinayasuttassa cānurūpaṃ paridīpayantī,
tika-vin06t:131_16: “Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata”nti evamādīnaṃ abhidhammasuttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ abhidhammasuttantānurūpanti evamādi.
tika-vin06t:131_22: Paṇḍitānaṃ pamāṇattāpi vitthāramaggassa samāsitattāpi vinicchayassa asesitattāpi tantikkamassa avokkamitattāpi
tika-vin06t:131_23: suttantikavacanānaṃ suttantaṭṭhakathānurūpaṃ dīpanatopi tasmāpi sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti.
tika-vin06t:131_24: Ettha “tantikkamaṃ avokkamitvā”ti vacanena siddhepi “aṭṭhakathācariyā verañjakaṇḍādīsu ‘suttantikānaṃ bhāro’ti gatā,
tika-vin06t:131_25: mayaṃ pana vatvāva gamissāmā”ti dassetuṃ “suttantikāna”nti vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:134_1: “Buddhena dhammo vinayo ca vutto”ti pubbe vuttattā idāni “vuttaṃ yenā”ti na vattabbanti ce?
tika-vin06t:134_4: Yatthappatiṭṭhitañcetanti vacanaṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:134_5: Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti āhacca bhāsitaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:134_6: Na hi bhagavato atītādīsu appaccakkhaṃ kiñci atthi.
tika-vin06t:136_3: Tampi sālavanaṃ upagantvā mittasuhajje apaloketvā nivattanato upavattananti pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:136_6: Tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanne hoti,
tika-vin06t:136_9: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ “katakicco pītija hāsa ceto averamukhenābhatakuṇḍalenā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:136_11: tasmiṃ ṭhāne vā mā socittha cittena,
tika-vin06t:136_17: Ekacce pana “yaṃ yasmā ahaṃ anuggahito”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:136_23: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo nirodhasamāpatti ca paṭilābhakkamena “anupubbavihārā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:139_4: evaṃ santepi atthi viseso tehi sammukhāpi asammukhāpi sutaṃ,
tika-vin06t:139_13: tasmā amhe upādāya tena bahu pariyattoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:139_16: Aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti ettha eko divaso naṭṭho,
tika-vin06t:139_23: Subhasuttaṃ “aciraparinibbute bhagavatī”ti vuttattā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesu antogadhaṃ na hotīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:139_28: Ākāsena āgantvā nisīdīti eketi etaṃ dutiyavāre gamanaṃ sandhāyāti āyasmā upatisso.
tika-vin06t:139_29: Paṭhamaṃ vā ākāsena gantvā parisaṃ patvā bhikkhupantiṃ apīḷento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āsane eva attānaṃ dassesi.
tika-vin06t:140_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ pucchi…pe…
tika-vin06t:140_1: āyasmā upālitthero vissajjesīti idaṃ pubbe “paṭhamaṃ āvuso upālī”tiādinā vuttapucchāvissajjanaṃ saṅkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:140_6: vatthumpi pucchī”ti evaṃ pubbe dassitānukkamena avatvā “vatthumpi pucchi,
tika-vin06t:140_10: Ettha pana vicāraṇā verañjakaṇḍe sampatte karīyati.
tika-vin06t:140_14: Atha kho “āyasmā mahākassapo”tiādinā pubbe vuttameva saṅkhipitvā dasseti saṅgītikārako vasīgaṇo.
tika-vin06t:140_17: tathā ānandattherassa vissajjanakkamopi kimatthaṃ na dassitoti ce?
tika-vin06t:140_18: Iminānukkamena saṅgahaṃ pañcapi nikāyā anāruḷhāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:140_20: Āyasmā mahākassapo pañcapi nikāye anukkameneva pucchi,
tika-vin06t:140_21: ānandatthero pana anukkameneva pucchitampi apucchitampi tassa tassa suttassa sabhāvaṃ antarā uppannaṃ
tika-vin06t:140_22: vatthuṃ uddesaniddesakkamaṃ mātikāvibhaṅgakkamanti evamādisabbaṃ anurūpavacanaṃ pakkhipitvā vissajjesi,
tika-vin06t:140_24: Atha vā “ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake”ti vattabbe “rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti uppaṭipāṭivacanenapi imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:141_0: Gahakāranti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena sakkā so daṭṭhuṃ,
tika-vin06t:141_1: tassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto vicarinti attho.
tika-vin06t:141_2: Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:141_3: Sabbā te phāsukāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
tika-vin06t:141_9: Aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye cāti ettha pāṇātipāto akusalanti evamādīsu maraṇādhippāyassa
tika-vin06t:141_12: Tathā adinnassa parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti abyākato dhammo,
tika-vin06t:141_13: tabbiññattisamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā akusalo dhammoti evamādinā aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhamme paṭibalo vinetuṃ.
tika-vin06t:141_14: Jātarūparajataṃ parasantakaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhantassa yathāvatthuṃ pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭesu aññataraṃ,
tika-vin06t:141_18: rūpiyachaḍḍakasammatassa anāpattīti evaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite vinayepi paṭibalo vinetunti attho.
tika-vin06t:141_20: etena phalavasena javanavasena ca cittassa vuddhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:146_4: Aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā pavattattā vipassanācittāni visayato lokiyā’bhisamayo asammohato lokuttaro,
tika-vin06t:146_5: lokuttaro eva vā abhisamayo visayato nibbānasaṅkhātassa atthassa,
tika-vin06t:146_9: Gambhīrassa udakassa pamāṇaggahaṇakāle dīghena pamāṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:146_12: Tañca atthaṃ nānubhonti nādhigacchanti kañci attanā adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:146_18: So hi yathā bhaṇḍāgāriko rañño kaṭakamakuṭādiṃ gopetvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe upaneti,
tika-vin06t:146_19: evaṃ sahetukānaṃ sattānaṃ maggaphalatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
tika-vin06t:146_30: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati…pe…
tika-vin06t:146_33: Vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā sīlasampattiṃ nissāya āsavakkhayañāṇena saheva viya dibbacakkhupubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāni paṭilabhati.
tika-vin06t:146_34: Visuṃ etesaṃ parikammakiccaṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ tāsaṃyevāti vuttanti ca vadanti eke.
tika-vin06t:146_35: Abhidhamme pana tissovijjā cha abhiññā catasso ca paṭisambhidā aññe ca sammappadhānādayo guṇavisesā vibhattā.
tika-vin06t:146_37: tathāpi visesato paññājātikattā catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇātīti dassanatthaṃ tāsaṃ tatthevāti avadhāraṇavipallāso kato.
tika-vin06t:152_0: Brahmalokā cavitvāti ettha cattāro maggā pañcānantariyāni niyatamicchādiṭṭhīti imeyeva niyatā,
tika-vin06t:152_9: Tassā kira sarīre sandhayo na paññāyanti,
tika-vin06t:152_20: Anukkamena pana buddhasāsanāvahāraṃ vatthuṃ dīpento “rājā kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:152_24: Pubbe jeṭṭhabhātikattā teneva paricayena pattaggahaṇatthāya ākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:152_30: tassā pamādo padaṃ maggoti evaṃ cattāri saccāni sandassitāni honti.
tika-vin06t:152_33: Nigrodhattherassānubhāvakittanādhikārattā pubbe vuttampi pacchā vattabbampi sampiṇḍetvā āha “puna rājā
tika-vin06t:152_36: “Puthujjanakalyāṇakassa vā paccavekkhitaparibhogo”ti vacanato sekkhāva paramatthato dāyādā,
tika-vin06t:152_37: tathāpi thero mahindakumārassa pabbajjatthaṃ ekena pariyāyena lokadhammasiddhena evamāha “yo koci mahārāja…pe…
tika-vin06t:154_0: Attā ve putto nāmāsi, sa jīva saradosata”nti.
tika-vin06t:155_0: Tasmā iminā pariyāyena oraso putto mātāpitūhi pabbajito ce,
tika-vin06t:155_1: atthato te sayaṃ pabbajitā viya honti.
tika-vin06t:155_4: dhammakathikā therassa āgamanakāle parivāratthāya pesitā, tasmā.
tika-vin06t:155_6: caṇḍabhāvo cassa “ambaṃ chinditvā veḷuyā vatiṃ karohī”ti vuttaamaccavatthunā vibhāvetabbo.
tika-vin06t:155_13: Vibhajitvā vadatīti vibhajjavādī “atthi khvesa brāhmaṇa pariyāyo”tiādinā.
tika-vin06t:157_0: Na ca appatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ”. ;
tika-vin06t:158_3: Amarāvikkhepikapakkhampi īsakaṃ bhajati bhagavā “sassato lokoti abyākatametaṃ asassato lokoti abyākatameta”ntiādiabyākatavatthudīpanato
tika-vin06t:158_7: Tathā adhiccasamuppannikapakkhampi bhajati “laddhā mudhā nibbutiṃ bhuñjamānā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:158_16: Evaṃ tena tena pariyāyena tathā tathā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vibhajitvā vadatīti vibhajjavādī bhagavāti.
tika-vin06t:160_18: Paṭhamapavāraṇāya vā pavāretvā ekamāsaṃ tattheva vasitvā kattikapuṇṇamāsiyaṃ avoca,
tika-vin06t:160_19: aññathā “puṇṇamāyaṃ mahāvīro”ti vuttattā na sakkā gahetuṃ.
tika-vin06t:160_28: Sabbadisāhi pañca rasmiyo āvaṭṭetvāti pañcahi phalehi nikkhantattā pañca,
tika-vin06t:160_35: Kāliṅgesu janapadesu jātisampannaṃ kulaṃ kāliṅgakulanti keci.
tika-vin06t:161_1: Tattha ṭhitehi samuddassa diṭṭhattā taṃ ṭhānaṃ samuddasālavatthu.
tika-vin06t:161_6: tattha dve vassāni vasitvā vinayaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin06t:161_11: Maggādipaccavekkhaṇe asati antarā parinibbānaṃ nāma natthi sekkhassa maraṇaṃ vā,
tika-vin06t:161_14: Anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti kañci dhammaṃ anupādāya aggahetvā īsakampi anavasesetvā parinibbānatthāyāti attho.
tika-vin06t:161_16: Ettāvatā attahitanipphattiṃ dassetvā idāni parahitanipphattiṃ dassetuṃ “etadatthaṃ sotāvadhāna”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:161_18: attano vinayakathanaṃ vinayamantanañca uggahetuṃ paresaṃ sotassa odahanaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:161_19: Tato uggahitavinayakathāmantanānaṃ tesaṃ upanisā yathāvuttakāraṇaparamparā siddhāyevāti na puna dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:161_20: Aññathā etadatthā upanisāti iminā vacaneneva anupādāparinibbānassa saṅgahitattā anupādāparinibbānato
tika-vin06t:161_21: uddhaṃ sotāvadhānāsambhavato etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānanti ante na sambhavatīti niratthakaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:161_22: na ca niratthakaṃ parahitanipphattiyā mūlakāraṇadassanatthattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:162_0: Evaṃ yathā yathā yaṃ yaṃ, sambhaveyya padaṃ idha;
tika-vin06t:163_0: Taṃ taṃ tathā tathā sabbaṃ, payojeyya vicakkhaṇoti.
tika-vin06t:168_0: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:168_1: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vinayanidāne ārabhitabbe verañjakaṇḍassa ārambho kimatthoti ce? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:168_3: Yadi evaṃ “paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti,
tika-vin06t:168_7: Evaṃ santepi “paṭhamassa pārājikassa kiṃnidāna”nti pucchite sādhāraṇamahānidānavissajjanaṃ ayuttaṃ viyāti? Nāyuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:168_8: sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nidānassa puṭṭhattā tassa vissajjetabbattā ca sabbasādhāraṇamahānidānaṃ paṭhamamāha.
tika-vin06t:168_11: Āyasmatā mahākassapena anukkamena sabbopi vinayo pucchito,
tika-vin06t:168_12: puṭṭhena ca āyasmatā upālittherena yathāsambhavaṃ nirantaraṃ vissajjitameva.
tika-vin06t:168_13: Apucchitānipi vinītavatthuādīni yujjamānāni vatthūni antokatvā vissajjanakkameneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:168_14: Aññathā verañjakaṇḍaṃ paṭhamapārājikasseva nidānanti vā anadhikārikaṃ vā nippayojanaṃ vā pāṭekkaṃ sikkhāpadanidānapucchānantaraṃ
tika-vin06t:168_16: tasmā ādito pabhuti vinayanidānaṃ dassetuṃ “tena samayenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:169_3: āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvadīpanañcāti tividhamassa payojanaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:169_8: arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akampanato bhagavato tādibhāvappatti veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:169_9: aṭṭhannampi tesaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ attani sambhavapariyāyadīpanapāḷiyā pahīnakilesatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:169_10: Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ tissannañca vijjānaṃ adhigamaparidīpanena adhigataguṇavisesatā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:169_12: muddhāpi tassa vipateyyā”ti ca “jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassā”ti ca vacanena jeṭṭhaseṭṭhatā veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:169_16: tathāgatova tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti vacanaṃ anaññavisayabhāvadīpanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:169_20: sabbo bhikkhusaṅgho uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gaccheyyā”ti ca imehi therassa tīhi sīhanādehi āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvatādīpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:169_21: Sāvatthiyādīsu aviharitvā kimatthaṃ bhagavā verañjāyameva tadā vihāsīti ce?
tika-vin06t:169_28: tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tena samayenāti yena kālena āyasmato…pe…
tika-vin06t:169_30: Purimesu catūsu asaṅgahakāraṇesu paṭhamena bhagavā mettābhāvanādinā amanussānaṃ cittasaṃrakkhaṇena bhikkhūnaṃ ādaraṃ janeti.
tika-vin06t:169_31: Dutiyena parisāvacarena bhikkhunā evaṃ parisā saṅgahetabbā,
tika-vin06t:169_32: evaṃ appicchena santuṭṭhena ca bhavitabbanti vā dasseti.
tika-vin06t:169_34: Catutthena evaṃ mahānubhāvenāpi paccayatthaṃ na loluppaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:172_1: Nanu vuttaṃ pubbeva “idañhi buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotī”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:172_2: tasmā upālittherena vuttassa tenātiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ nānappakārato dassayanto karissāmi vinayassa bhagavato
tika-vin06t:172_4: Yadi evaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatīti evamādivacanapaṭimaṇḍitanidānaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ
tika-vin06t:172_5: kena dhārita”ntiādivacanaṃ virujjhati “tena samayenā”tiādivacanassa vinayapiṭakapariyāpannabhāvadīpanatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:172_7: Vinayassādibhāvena saṅgītikārakehi anuññātattā vinayapariyāpannatāpi yujjati tassa vacanassa. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:172_10: tathā avatvā idha “tena samayenā”ti paṭhamaṃ taṃniddesova kasmā vuttoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:172_12: yassa vā sikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtassa samayassa hetu bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi,
tika-vin06t:172_13: tassa ca samayassa atītassa tesaṃ saṅgītikārakānaṃ vasīnaṃ suviditattā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:172_15: “atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti ca “atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne sannipātāpetvā”ti ca “bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanu…pe…
tika-vin06t:172_16: dasa atthavase paṭicca saṅghasuṭṭhutāyā”ti ca “evañca pana,
tika-vin06t:172_18: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti ca khandhakesu ca “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:172_20: tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja”ntiādivinayakkamassa vacanato yo so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo,
tika-vin06t:172_21: tassa tassa vinayakkamassa so paññattisamayo ca suvidito tesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ dhammadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:172_23: Tasmā suviditattā tena samayena hetubhūtena viharatīti viharatipadena ekasambandhattā ca paṭhamaṃ yaṃniddesādino
tika-vin06t:172_24: asambhavato ca vinayapiṭake taṃniddesova paṭhamaṃ vutto. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:172_25: Ettha “yena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vā “yena kho pana samayena vesālī…pe…
tika-vin06t:172_26: hotī”ti vā asambhavato yaṃniddesena avatvā taṃniddesasseva sambhavato “tena kho pana samayena…pe…
tika-vin06t:172_29: Aniyamaniddesavacananti ettha kiñcāpi yathāvuttanayena niyamaniddesavacanamevetaṃ taṃniddesattā,
tika-vin06t:172_30: tathāpi sampatikālavasena taditaresaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aviditattā “aniyamaniddesavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:172_31: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “ayañhi sabbasmimpi vinaye yuttī”ti,
tika-vin06t:173_0: Yadi sabbaṃ tenāti padaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:173_1: tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadanti ettha idampi pubbe siddhatthaṃ tenāti padaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:173_2: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharatī”tiādīsu vuttaṃ tenāti padañca aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:173_4: tasmā yesaṃ tena taṃniddesena niddiṭṭhattho avidito,
tika-vin06t:173_6: Atha vā tato paṭhamaṃ tadatthādassanato pacchāpi taṃsambandhena yaṃniddesadassanato ca “aniyamaniddesavacanameta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:173_7: Atha vā pubbaṇhādīsu ayaṃ nāmāti aniyametvā kālaparidīpanassa samayasaddassa upapadabhāvenapi evaṃ vattumarahati “yadidaṃ aniyamaniddesavacana”nti.
tika-vin06t:173_8: Atha vā “tenā”ti vutte tena ghaṭena paṭenāti sabbatthappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ niyamaṃ karoti “samayenā”ti.
tika-vin06t:173_10: Parabhāge atthato siddhena sāriputtassa parivitakkasamayena. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:173_12: “parato idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:173_13: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
tika-vin06t:173_14: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena cā”tiādivacanaṃ virujjhatīti? Na,
tika-vin06t:173_16: Suttantābhidhammesu viya avatvā idha vinayapiṭake karaṇavacanena kasmā niddesoti hi codanā.
tika-vin06t:173_17: Tasmā tassā vissajjane bāhullena karaṇavacanappayojanaṃ vattukāmo ācariyo āha “yo so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:173_18: Na sampati vuccamānasseva karaṇavacanassa payojanaṃ vattukāmo,
tika-vin06t:174_3: khaṇo samayo cā”ti ettha khaṇasamayānaṃ eko attho,
tika-vin06t:174_4: tathā kālañca samayañca upādāyāti kālasamayānaṃ eko attho siyā,
tika-vin06t:174_5: apica āgamanapaccayasamavāyo cettha samayo kālassāpi āgamanapaccayattā samayaggahaṇeneva so gahitoti visuṃ kālo kimatthaṃ gahitoti ca? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:174_6: appeva nāma svepīti kālassa paṭhamaṃ niyamitattā na samayo kālattho.
tika-vin06t:174_7: Tasmiṃ sveti niyamitakāle itaresaṃ āgamanapaccayānaṃ samavāyaṃ paṭicca upasaṅkameyyāma yathāniyamitakālepi
tika-vin06t:174_8: pubbaṇhādippabhedaṃ yathāvuttasamavāyānurūpaṃ kālañca upādāyāti sveti paricchinnadivase pubbaṇhādikālaniyatabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:174_9: tasmā kālasamayānaṃ na ekatthattā kālassa visuṃ gahaṇampi sātthakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:174_10: Yasmā khaṇe khaṇe tvaṃ bhikkhu jāyasi ca jīyasi ca mīyasi ceti bhikkhuniyā santike abhikkhaṇaṃ gacchatīti
tika-vin06t:174_11: ca khaṇe khaṇe bhāsati satthusāsananti ca khaṇasaddo anekattho,
tika-vin06t:174_16: Khaṇasamayānaṃ attho ekattho yujjati khaṇo okāsalābho,
tika-vin06t:174_18: Attano attano ucchedādayo diṭṭhigatasaṅkhāte samaye ettha pavadantīti samayappavādako.
tika-vin06t:174_26: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu “catunnaṃ saccānaṃ catūhi ākārehi paṭivedho”tiādīsu khandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa dukkhassa dukkhākāratāyaṭṭho.
tika-vin06t:174_32: Dukkarakārikasamayopi kāḷo samaṇo gotamo na kāḷotiādinā pākaṭo.
tika-vin06t:175_0: Accantameva taṃ samayanti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva pattasanniṭṭhānā,
tika-vin06t:175_2: Karuṇāvihārena vihāsīti karuṇākiccavihārena tasmiṃ samaye vihāsīti attho.
tika-vin06t:175_6: mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā veneyyasattāvalokanaṃ katvā tadanurūpakaraṇaṃ karuṇākiccaṃ.
tika-vin06t:175_12: Tattha karuṇākiccaṃ vihāraṃ dassento “karuṇāvihārena vihāsī”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:175_15: Tattha hi abhidhamme kālasamūhakhaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātavasena pañcavidho samayaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:175_21: Tasmā yasmiṃ kāle puñje vā cittaṃ samuppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:175_22: tasmiṃ kāle puñje vā phassādayo uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:175_23: Adhikaraṇañhīti ettha abhidhamme niddiṭṭhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kālaṭṭho samūhaṭṭho ca hoti,
tika-vin06t:175_24: “yasmiṃ samaye”ti vuttaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:175_26: Tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ bhāvo nāma kinti?
tika-vin06t:175_29: sā pana samayassa bhāvena bhāvo lakkhīyati ñāyati,
tika-vin06t:175_30: tasmā tattha bhummavacananiddeso katoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:176_0: Tattha khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo khaṇo,
tika-vin06t:176_5: Tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇakāraṇasamavāyahetumhi sati tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ bhāvo vijjamānatā hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:176_6: Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatīti ettha atthadvayamekassa sambhavatīti idha vinaye vuttassa
tika-vin06t:176_7: samayasaddassa kattukaraṇatthe tatiyā hetumhi ca ityuttattā.
tika-vin06t:176_8: So dubbiññeyyoti “tathāgatova tattha kālaṃ jānissatī”ti vuttattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:176_9: Tena samayenāti tassa samayassa kāraṇā “annena vasati vijjāya vasatī”ti yathā,
tika-vin06t:176_10: annaṃ vā vijjaṃ vā labhāmīti tadatthaṃ vasatītyattho.
tika-vin06t:176_11: Evaṃ “tena samayena viharatī”ti vutte hetvatthe tatiyā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin06t:176_12: tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā samayañca vītikkamañca olokayamāno tattha tattha vihāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:176_17: tasmā dutiyā kāladdhāne accantasaṃyogeti dutiyātra sambhavati “māsamadhīte divasamadhīte”ti yathā.
tika-vin06t:176_18: Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatīti ettha yassa karaṇavacanassa hetuattho sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:176_19: tena samayena hetubhūtena taṃ taṃ vatthuvītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ vītikkamasamayasaṅkhātaṃ vā sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-vin06t:176_22: tena karaṇabhūtena samayena sampattena sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:177_1: tassa niyamabhūto kālo pana karaṇameva taṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvāva sikkhāpadassa paññapetabbattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:177_3: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “idaṃ karaṇaṃ pubbabhāgattā paṭhamaṃ vattabbampi pacchā vutta”nti,
tika-vin06t:177_5: Hetuatthato hi yathā pacchā karaṇattho yojiyamāno anukkameneva yogaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:177_7: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathācariyo pacchā vuttaṃ idaṃ karaṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ yojetvā paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ hetuatthaṃ pacchā yojesi,
tika-vin06t:177_9: Ito paṭṭhāya yattha yattha “ācariyena likhita”nti vā “ācariyassa takko”ti vā vuccati,
tika-vin06t:177_10: tattha tattha ācariyo nāma ānandācariyo kalasapuravāsīti gahetabbo. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:177_15: atha imasseva padadvayassa gahaṇe kiñci payojanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin06t:177_17: kesañci buddhassa bhagavato paramagambhīraṃ ajjhāsayakkamaṃ ajānataṃ “apaññatte sikkhāpade anādīnavadasso…pe…
tika-vin06t:177_18: abhiviññāpesī”tiādikaṃ “atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sudinnaṃ paṭipucchī”tiādikañca “sādiyi tvaṃ bhikkhūti.
tika-vin06t:177_19: Nāhaṃ bhagavā sādiyi”ntiādikañca tathā purāṇavohārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchitvā tena vuttaparicchedena dutiyapārājikapaññāpanañca
tika-vin06t:177_20: devadattassa pabbajjānujānanañcāti evamādikaṃ vinayapariyattiṃ disvā buddhasubuddhataṃ paṭicca saṅkā
tika-vin06t:177_22: “tathā kiṃ pana tuyhaṃ chavassa kheḷāsakassā”ti evamādikaṃ pharusavacanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vinayapariyattiṃ
tika-vin06t:177_24: tadubhayasaṅkāvinodanatthaṃ āyasmatā upālittherena idameva padadvayaggahaṇaṃ sabbattha katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:177_31: Suttante ca vuttaṃ “saṇhenapi kesi vinemi pharusenapī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:178_0: Asādhāraṇahetumhīti ettha kusalamūlāni na akusalānaṃ kadāci mūlāni honti,
tika-vin06t:178_2: abyākatamūlāni na kadāci kusalānanti ayameva nayo labbhati,
tika-vin06t:178_3: yasmā kusalā hetū taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo,
tika-vin06t:178_7: Sattānaṃ hitasukhanipphādanādhimuttatanti ettha sāmaññato vuttasatte dvidhā bhinditvā dassetuṃ “manussānaṃ upakārabahulata”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:178_14: Devamanussānanti ettha bhabbapuggale veneyyasatteyeva gahetvā tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya attano uppattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:178_19: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti ettha samādhiṃ paññañca aggahetvā diṭṭhisīlamattaggahaṇaṃ sabbasekkhāsekkhasāmaññattā.
tika-vin06t:178_24: tasmā ekalakkhaṇānampi tāsaṃ paññādiṭṭhīnaṃ avatthantarabhedo atthi dhitisamādhindriyasammāsamādhīnaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:178_28: pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti cā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:178_35: evaṃ hutvā ṭhitassa kittisaddo abbhuggatoti abhisaddena yoge upayogavacanāni hontīti attho.
tika-vin06t:179_1: brahmaloke nibbattatīti iminā kāmupādānahetu kammaṃ katvā kāmabhave eva nibbattatītivādīnaṃ vādo paṭikkhittoti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:179_3: kappetvā vā pacchā “tattha sampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti kāmupādānapaccayā tadupagaṃ karotīti brahmalokepi kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā,
tika-vin06t:179_12: Tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikāti tassa kāraṇabhūtassa imassa khandhapañcakassa samuṭṭhāpikāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:179_13: “Āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato tassa eva kāraṇantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:179_14: Apica “rūpādi viya taṇhāpi taṇhāya uppattippahānaṭṭhāna”nti vacanato rūpādi viya taṇhāpi dukkhasaccaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:179_16: etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti ca “etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyatī”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:179_17: Visuddhimagge “sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāyā”ti
tika-vin06t:179_18: vacanato idha rūpataṇhādayo dukkhasaccanti vacanaṃ virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:179_24: viññāṇupādānakkhandho”ti ettha “ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ saṅkhārupādānakkhandho”ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:180_2: taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesāti dutiyo,
tika-vin06t:180_3: taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesā avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti tatiyo,
tika-vin06t:180_4: taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesā avasesā ca akusalā dhammā tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavānīti catuttho,
tika-vin06t:180_5: taṇhā ca avasesā ca kilesā avasesā ca akusalā dhammā tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni sāsavāni avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammāti pañcamo vāroti.
tika-vin06t:180_9: so ca nayo ariyasaccaniddese na labbhati.
tika-vin06t:180_12: tasmā suttantabhājaniyova pamāṇaṃ tattha ca taṇhāya vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:180_17: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti iminā pariyāyena vuttattā tattha vuttampi pamāṇameva.
tika-vin06t:180_18: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa”nti vacanato “kasiṇānī”ti jhānāni vuttāni.
tika-vin06t:180_21: “Dvattiṃsākārāpi paṇṇattiṃ vissajjetvā paṭikūlāti sati paṭṭhapetabbā”ti vacanato satigocarā rūpādayo ca veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:181_5: Atha vā pana “nāhaṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyya”nti vadāmīti attho.
tika-vin06t:181_9: ariyagamanena lokantaṃ patvāva dukkhā atthi pamocananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:181_13: sabbe te lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena eko lokoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:181_14: Saṅkhārā hi sakasakapaccayāyattatāya sattā visattā sattā nāma.
tika-vin06t:181_20: “Sinerussa samantato”ti vacanato yugandharādayo sineruṃ parikkhipitvā parimaṇḍalākārena ṭhitāti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:182_14: Satthavāho satthāti nipātito yathā pisitāso pisāco.
tika-vin06t:182_18: tassa me tava dhammaṃ suṇantassa sīsaṃ daṇḍena sannirumbhitvāti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin06t:182_29: attanā eva vā ñātā sacchikatātipi sacchikāpaññatti.
tika-vin06t:182_35: Bhavassa antaṃ nibbānaṃ maggādhigamena taṃ gatoti bhavantago.
tika-vin06t:183_2: ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahathā”tiādinā nayena ekakādivasenāgate gahetvā vadati.
tika-vin06t:183_8: Cetokhilā satthari kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya,
tika-vin06t:183_12: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratīti āgatā pañca vinibandhā.
tika-vin06t:183_13: Vivādamūlāni kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thambho sārambho sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā ādhānaggāhī duppaṭinissaggitā.
tika-vin06t:183_14: Vibhaṅge pana “kodho makkho issā sāṭheyyaṃ pāpicchatā sandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin06t:183_50: Pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccantiādimhi idaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamaṃ atthavissajjanaṃ –
tika-vin06t:183_52: atha kasmā cattāro eva vuttāti ce?
tika-vin06t:184_1: dukkhaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā”tiādināpi nayena ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yo,
tika-vin06t:184_4: dukkhasamudayampi so passatī”tiādinā nayena ekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā sesesu kiccanipphattivasenāpi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:184_5: Tattha yadā ekekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:184_6: tadā samudayadassanena tāva sabhāvato pīḷanalakkhaṇassāpi dukkhassa yasmā taṃ āyūhanalakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitaṃ saṅkhataṃ,
tika-vin06t:184_9: tasmāssa maggadassanena santāpaṭṭho āvi bhavati nandassa accharādassanena sundariyā anabhirūpabhāvo viya.
tika-vin06t:184_10: Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena tassa vipariṇāmaṭṭho āvi bhavatīti vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin06t:184_11: Sabhāvato āyūhanalakkhaṇassapi samudayassa dukkhadassanena nidānaṭṭho āvi bhavati asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena
tika-vin06t:184_15: Tathā nissaraṇassāpi nirodhassa avivekabhūtassa samudayassa dassanena vivekaṭṭho āvi bhavati.
tika-vin06t:184_17: Iminā hi anamatagge saṃsāre maggo na diṭṭhapubbo,
tika-vin06t:184_18: sopi ca sappaccayattā saṅkhato evāti appaccayadhammassa asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo hoti.
tika-vin06t:184_22: Tathā niyyānalakkhaṇassāpi maggassa samudayadassanena “nāyaṃ hetu nibbānassa pattiyā,
tika-vin06t:184_24: Nirodhadassanena dassanaṭṭho paramasukhumarūpāni passato “vippasannaṃ vata me cakkhū”ti cakkhussa vippasannabhāvo viya.
tika-vin06t:184_25: Dukkhadassanena adhipateyyaṭṭho anekarogāturakapaṇajanadassanena issarajanassa uḷārabhāvo viyāti evamettha lakkhaṇavasena,
tika-vin06t:184_26: ekassa aññasaccadassanavasena ca itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āvibhāvato ekekassa cattāro atthā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:185_2: Sacchikatvā pavedetīti ettāvatā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:185_3: Tena ñāṇasampattiṃ dīpetvā idāni karuṇāsampattiṃ dīpetuṃ “so dhammaṃ desesī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:185_4: Atha vā kiṃ so pavedesīti? Ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:185_14: Tassa pakāsakaṃ piṭakattayaṃ idha sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:185_43: Akkharehi vā ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ,
tika-vin06t:185_45: niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:185_47: Tassevatthassa paṭivijjhitabbo sako sako bhāvo paṭivedho nāma.
tika-vin06t:185_55: Āgamabyattitoti punappunaṃ adhīyamānā khandhādayo pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin06t:186_12: natthettha tayā sadisopīti āha “tvaṃ sadevakassa lokassa aggo”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:186_16: patthanāvasena vā uppannā rāgasampayuttā somanassavedanānurūpato uppajjitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya “rūparasā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin06t:186_18: Tathāgatassapi hi kassaci te pahīnāti matthakacchinnatālo viya katā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:186_20: te vijjamānāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapantisadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā.
tika-vin06t:186_33: Itthambhūtā pana te rūparasādayo anabhāvaṃkatā āyatimanuppādadhammāti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ.
tika-vin06t:187_5: Paṭicchādetabbe hi attano guṇe “āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriya”ntiādinā pakāsento attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ pakāsetīti gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:187_11: bujjhanti vā tena taṃsamaṅginoti maggo bodhi,
tika-vin06t:187_14: Tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ upanissayavato yathāsambhavaṃ tisso vijjā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:187_16: Tikkhopi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti,
tika-vin06t:187_20: antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasenassa sūrabhāvo ca veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:188_0: Chandoti ca saṅkappoti ca avatthantarabhedabhinno rāgova –
tika-vin06t:194_0: Vibhaṅgeyeva kiñcāpi attho vuttoti ettha ayamadhippāyo –
tika-vin06t:194_1: vibhaṅgapāḷiṃ ānetvā idha vuttopi sabbesaṃ upakārāya na hoti,
tika-vin06t:194_5: tasmā tatiyaṃ chaḍḍetvā dve gahetvā tadaṅgādīsu vikkhambhanavivekaṃ gahetvā “tayo evā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin06t:194_6: Evaṃ sati cittavikkhambhanā ekatthā evāti viseso na siyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:194_13: kilesakāmattā vā dvīsu kammesu pariyāpanno puriso viya.
tika-vin06t:194_14: Yathā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññattivasena loke “saphalo rukkho”ti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:194_15: tatheva vijjamānena vijjamānapaññattivasena sāsane “savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ jhāna”nti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:195_14: Na vitakkavicārāyeva tehi sampayuttānaṃ oḷārikabhāvatoti tesveva ādīnavadassanena dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe tesaṃ abhāvo hoti.
tika-vin06t:195_17: yogena vā idaṃ jhānaṃ “sampasādana”nti vuccati “ekodibhāva”nti ca,
tika-vin06t:195_19: Paṇītabhojanasikkhāpade sappiādayo viyāti vutte ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā na virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:195_20: Samaṃ passatīti līnuddhaccaṃ pahāya khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanākārabhūtā
tika-vin06t:195_25: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhā jhānupekkhā pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva,
tika-vin06t:196_10: Chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārabojjhaṅgajhānupekkhā pārisuddhitatramajjhattupekkhā ca atthato ekā,
tika-vin06t:196_11: tasmā ekakkhaṇe ekāva siyā, na itarā,
tika-vin06t:196_20: “Dukkhadomanassasukhasomanassāna”nti evaṃ pahānakkamena avatvā vibhaṅge vuttanayena kasmā vuttānīti ce?
tika-vin06t:196_22: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītanti ettha “ārammaṇavasena aggahetvā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītākārena anubhavatīti gahetabba”nti vadanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:196_24: Tatiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya upakārā hutvā āgatāti satisīsena desanā katā,
tika-vin06t:196_25: vigatavalāhakādinā sommatāya rattiyā valāhakādinā kālussiye satipi divā viya anupakārikā na hoti rattiṃ,
tika-vin06t:196_28: rattiyā alābhāti ime dve hetū aparisuddhatāya kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:196_30: attano upakārakattena cāti ime dve sabhāgatāya kāraṇa”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:199_6: Asabhāgattā javanavipassanāpādakāni samānāni abhiññāpādakāni ca honti,
tika-vin06t:201_0: Satthu yasmā tasmā bhagavā, vijjattayamāha verañje.
tika-vin06t:202_1: Sīlavato hi sīlapaccavekkhaṇatthaṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhānesu nisinnassa nisajjanato paṭṭhāya attano atītakiriyānussaraṇabahulatāya
tika-vin06t:202_3: Tathā attānaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ cutipariggahaṇasīlatāya cutūpapātañāṇaṃ appakasirena samijjhati,
tika-vin06t:202_7: tasmāssa āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ appakasirena samijjhatīti ettha vinayanidāne vijjattayameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:203_0: So evanti iminā kiñcāpi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:203_3: iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena catutthajjhānaṃ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha,
tika-vin06t:203_6: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ettha ca purimāni tīṇi jhānāni yasmā pītipharaṇena ca sukhapharaṇena ca sukhasaññañca
tika-vin06t:203_7: lahusaññañca okkamitvā lahumudukammaññakāyo hutvā iddhiṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin06t:203_8: tasmā iminā pariyāyena iddhilābhāya saṃvattanato sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbāni.
tika-vin06t:203_10: Idameva vā atthaṃ sandhāyāha “pubbe imāni cattāri jhānāni kesañci abhiññāpādakānī”ti.
tika-vin06t:203_11: Yadi evaṃ catutthajjhānampi antokatvā evanti kimatthaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:203_15: Yasmā yasmiṃ sati “pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmesi”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:203_16: tasmā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānacitte pakatibhūmibhāvappatte abhiññāpādake jāte parikammacittaṃ “pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya abhininnāmesi”nti āha.
tika-vin06t:203_17: Abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hotīti ettha taṃ iddhividhādhigamatthāya parikammacittaṃ abhinīharati.
tika-vin06t:203_19: Gaṇṭhipade pana “abhiññāpādakajjhānato iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ nīharaṇattha”nti vuttattā abhinīhārakkhamanti attho pakappito.
tika-vin06t:204_0: So evaṃ samāhite evaṃ āneñjappatteti yojanā veditabbā dutiyavikappe,
tika-vin06t:204_2: Ayaṃ yojanā paṭhamavikappe na sambhavati “parisuddhetiādīsu panā”ti vacanena “eva”nti padassa anuppabandhanivāraṇato.
tika-vin06t:204_5: na ca maṃ bhikkhū jāneyyu”ntiādinā nayena uppannaicchāvasena pavattānaṃ kopaapaccayānaṃ abhāvena anaṅgaṇeti attho.
tika-vin06t:204_6: Ettha ca pana yathāvuttappakārā icchāpi paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya antarāyikā “sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto antarāyiko dhammo”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:204_9: Katthaci pana “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ icchāvacarāna”nti potthakesu pāṭho dissati,
tika-vin06t:204_11: gaṇṭhipade ca “aho vata satthā mamaññeva paṭipucchitvā dhammaṃ deseyyā”ti yo tadattho likhito,
tika-vin06t:204_13: Na hi jhānapaṭilābhapaccayā kopādayo anaṅgaṇasutte vuttā,
tika-vin06t:204_14: “na ca yuttito sambhavanti jhānalābhino tadabhāvā”ti ācariyo vadati,
tika-vin06t:204_16: Ettha vijjattayassa uttaruttaravisesadassanatthaṃ “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādinā punappunaṃ aṭṭhaṅganidassanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:204_18: Bhagavā hi pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena attano anantasaṃsāradukkhaṃ passitvā,
tika-vin06t:204_19: cutūpapātañāṇena parassa ca lokassa āsavakkhayañāṇena tadubhayavūpasamattañca passitvā taṃ deseti,
tika-vin06t:204_23: Evaṃ nānāguṇavisesadīpanato imasseva lokiyābhiññādvayassa idha gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:205_3: Pāḷiyaṃ kiñcāpi “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”tiādivacanena sakalajātiyā anussaraṇameva pubbenivāsānussati viya dissati,
tika-vin06t:205_9: Gaṇṭhipade pana “tesaṃ chinnavaṭumakānaṃ lokuttarasīlādīni na bhagavatā bodhisattakāle viññātānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:205_11: taṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhikāre “ariyānaṃ upavādakā”ti vacanena samentaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:205_12: Na hi ariye apassantassa evaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:209_9: Evaṃnāmo evaṃgottoti padadvayena ajjhattabahiddhāmūlakaṃ paññattisaṅkhātaṃ gocaranivāsaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:209_14: Amutrāti ettha paṭhamayojanāyaṃ sīhokkantavasena anussaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:209_19: Yathā tanti nidassanena paṭipattisādhāraṇena phalasādhāraṇataṃ dassento brāhmaṇassa ādaraṃ janeti,
tika-vin06t:209_21: “Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti tassa pubbe uppannacitte eva niyojeti.
tika-vin06t:209_22: Paṭhamā abhinibbhidāti vacanena avijjaṇḍakosassa bahupaṭalabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin06t:212_3: Na cutiṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:212_4: Tasmā “yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti vacanaṃ viya phalūpacāreneva vuttamidanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:212_6: Iminā pana keci ācariyā “kusalākusalā cakkhū dibbacakkhu kāmāvacara”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:212_10: Ekādasannaṃ upakkilesānaṃ evaṃ uppattikkamo upakkilesabhāvo ca veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:212_11: mahāsattassa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni disvā “idaṃ nu kho ki”nti vicikicchā udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_12: so upakkileso upakkilesasutte “vicikicchādhikaraṇañca pana me samādhimhi cavi,
tika-vin06t:212_13: samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpāna”nti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:212_15: idāni na kiñci manasi karissāmī”ti cintayato amanasikāro,
tika-vin06t:212_17: tato tassa pahānatthaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā rūpāni passato himavantādīsu dānavarakkhasādayo passantassa chambhitattaṃ udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_18: tato tassa pahānatthaṃ “mayā diṭṭhabhayaṃ pakatiyā olokiyamānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:212_19: adiṭṭhe kiṃ nāma bhaya”nti cintayato uppilāvitattaṃ udapādi.
tika-vin06t:212_21: “taṃ duvuttaṃ parato abhijappāvacanena tadatthasiddhito”ti ācariyo vadati.
tika-vin06t:212_23: tena me idaṃ uppilaṃ uppanna”nti vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karontassa kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ kāyadaratho kāyālasiyaṃ udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_26: tato taṃ pahāya samappavattena vīriyena chambhitattabhayā himavantādiṭṭhānaṃ pahāya devalokābhimukhaṃ
tika-vin06t:212_27: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato taṇhāsaṅkhātā abhijappā udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_28: tato “mayhaṃ ekajātikarūpaṃ manasi karontassa abhijappā uppannā,
tika-vin06t:212_29: tasmā dāni nānāvidhaṃ rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:212_30: kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasi karoto nānattasaññā udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_31: tato “nānāvidharūpāni me manasi karontassa nānattasaññā udapādi,
tika-vin06t:212_32: tasmā dāni abhijappādibhayā iṭṭhādinimittaggāhaṃ pahāya ekajātikameva rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti tathā
tika-vin06t:212_33: karoto abhinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ udapādi evaṃ pahīnaupakkilesassāpi anadhiṭṭhitattā.
tika-vin06t:213_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni na ca passāmi,
tika-vin06t:213_10: Vicikicchā cittassa upakkilesotiādīsu “ime dhammā upakkilesāti ādīnavadassanena pajahiṃ,
tika-vin06t:213_11: na mayhaṃ tadā uppannattā”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin06t:213_16: na “sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha viya sabbasaṅkhatesu,
tika-vin06t:213_19: sampati nirayaṃ upapannāti evaṃ pāṭhasesena sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:213_23: lokācāraṃ vā na jānātīti adhippāyena vuttattā guṇaparidhaṃsanena garahatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:213_24: “Niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti vutto ariyapuggalo maggāvaraṇaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ pharusavacanaṃ yadi katheyya,
tika-vin06t:213_28: “Vāyāmaṃ mā akāsīti therena vuttattā maggāvaraṇaṃ karotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:213_35: yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī”ti vacanato pākatikaṃ ahosīti eke.
tika-vin06t:213_36: Sace so na khamatīti sotāpannādīnaṃ khantiguṇassa mandatāya vā āyatiṃ tassa suṭṭhu saṃvaratthāya vā akkhamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:213_37: Sukhānaṃ vā āyassa ārammaṇādino abhāvā kālakañcikā asurā honti.
tika-vin06t:213_40: tassa tassa atthassa vindanaṭṭhena vijjāti attho.
tika-vin06t:216_1: So evaṃ samāhite citteti kiṃ purimasmiṃyeva,
tika-vin06t:216_4: tadeva puna samāpajjanavasena abhinavaṃ abhiṇhaṃ katanti dassanatthaṃ “so evaṃ samāhite citteti idha
tika-vin06t:216_6: yadi tadeva puna samāpajjanavasena abhinavaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin06t:216_7: atha kasmā pubbe viya “vipassanāpādakaṃ abhiññāpādakaṃ nirodhapādakaṃ sabbakiccasādhakaṃ sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakaṃ
tika-vin06t:216_8: idha catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabba”nti avatvā “idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabba”nti
tika-vin06t:216_10: nanu idha tathāvacanaṭṭhānameva taṃ arahattamaggena saddhiṃ sabbaguṇanipphādanato,
tika-vin06t:216_13: saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātāya niyamena ahosīti dassanatthaṃ vipassanāpādakamidha vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:216_20: phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ hotīti idaṃ ekattanayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:216_25: Bhuñjamāno eva hi bhojanapariyosāne bhuttāvī nāma.
tika-vin06t:216_26: “Iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetī”ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca paṭṭhāne “maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati, phalaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:216_28: Pavattikkamo panettha sarūpato atthatoti dvidhā vutto.
tika-vin06t:216_29: Tattha “vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ ahosī”ti sarūpato catubbidhassapi paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa pavattikkamanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:216_31: Teneva ante “abbhaññāsi”nti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ desanaṃ akāsi paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa tathā appavattito.
tika-vin06t:216_32: Appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto “khīṇā jātī”ti jānāti nāma.
tika-vin06t:219_10: Tasmā “rāgavirāgamima”nti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā puna piṇḍetvā dhammamimaṃ upehīti yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:219_12: Saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ dukkhaṃ hiṃsatīti ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:219_15: Pabhedena pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyanti.
tika-vin06t:219_16: Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati.
tika-vin06t:219_17: Lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesaṃ tadaṅgavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati.
tika-vin06t:219_18: Taṃ atthato ratanattaye saddhāpaṭilābho saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-vin06t:219_24: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:219_35: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisati.
tika-vin06t:220_1: Lacchāma nu khoti duggate sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:220_7: Na ca vaṭṭatīti puna pākaṃ kiñcāpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:220_9: “uttaṇḍulabhattaṃ labhitvāpi pidhetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:220_10: “Sāvakānaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti iminā vacanena ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ sandhāya “pacchā sīla”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:220_11: Upālittheropi taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca bhagavatā bahūni sikkhāpadāni paññattāni atthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:220_12: Yadi evaṃ verañjāyaṃ “etassa bhagavā kālo”ti vacanaṃ na sametīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:220_14: Thero pana paññattāni ṭhapetvā idāni paññapetabbāni pātimokkhuddesappahonakāni sandhāyāha.
tika-vin06t:220_15: Bhagavāpi “na tāva sāriputta satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”ti bhaddālisutte viya ekaccesu paññattesupi tato paraṃ paññapetabbāni sandhāyāha.
tika-vin06t:220_16: Idheva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti na ca vaṭṭatī”ti vacanañca,
tika-vin06t:220_17: tathā “ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā”tiādivacanāni ca atthi.
tika-vin06t:220_18: Aññathā “dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchantī”ti idhevedaṃ pāḷiṭhapanaṃ virujjhatīti ācariyena vicāritaṃ,
tika-vin06t:220_20: Kintu idha pāḷiṭhapanavirodhavicāraṇā pana nippayojanā viya mama dissati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:220_23: “Sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā ekabhikkhunāpi na kato”ti vuttaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-vin06t:220_24: tasmā vassacchedassa kāraṇe sati sattāhakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:221_3: Theraṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ pucchīti iminā ācariyo yaṃ pubbe āṇāya ṭhitānaṃ sāvakānaṃ mahānubhāvatādassanaṃ
tika-vin06t:221_6: rājagahe verañjāyañcāti ubhayattha vitakkuppāde ekato piṇḍetvā dassento “atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:222_0: Kāmaṃ hinoti attano phalanibbattiyā sahāyaṃ gacchatīti kattari hetu,
tika-vin06t:222_1: tathāpi idha tena karaṇabhūtena tassa phalaṃ hinoti pavattatīti hetu.
tika-vin06t:222_18: Āsavehīti padañca paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ katvā gaṇṭhipade attho pakāsito.
tika-vin06t:222_19: Yadi ariyamaggena niruddhānaṃ āsavānaṃ vasena anāsavatā,
tika-vin06t:222_21: Na hi niruddhāni cittāni ārammaṇāni karontīti tāni aniruddhāsavavasena sāsavānīti ce.
tika-vin06t:224_0: Vālesu cāmariṃ hanti, siṅgesu sarabho hato”ti. –
tika-vin06t:226_1: Naciraṭṭhitikakāraṇe kathite ciraṭṭhitikakāraṇaṃ atthato vuttapaṭipakkhavasena kiñcāpi siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:226_2: tathāpi taṃ therassa vinayapaññattiyācanāya okāsakāraṇādhippāyato vinayapaññattiyācanokāsaṃ pāpetuṃ puna bhagavantaṃ “ko pana, bhante,
tika-vin06t:226_6: Ādaratthavasenevettha dvikkhattuṃ vuttanti yasmā thero pubbe rājagahe,
tika-vin06t:226_8: tasmā ādarena punappunaṃ yācayamānaṃ passitvā sayampi bhagavā ādareneva “āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputtā”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:226_11: pubbenanu tavayācanaṃ sampaṭicchatāva mayā ettake kāle ettakāni sikkhāpadāni paññattāni,
tika-vin06t:226_12: na tāva me sāvakānaṃ āṇāpātimokkhuddesānujānanakālo sampatto,
tika-vin06t:226_13: takkānumānavasena tayā ‘etassa bhagavā kālo’ti punappunaṃ niddisiyamānopi nesa so kālo,
tika-vin06t:226_15: Yasmā pana “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisiyatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:226_17: “Tatthāti sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkhaṃ bhummavacana”nti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ tassā siddhiyā itarassa siddhito.
tika-vin06t:226_18: “Sāvakānaṃ visayabhāvanti iminā mahāpadumattheravādo paṭikkhitto”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:226_24: dukkaṭassā”ti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ bhagavā buddhattena dasavassiko hutvā paññapesi ūnadasavassikassa tassa tathā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin06t:226_26: tasmā taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsato pubbe rājagahe eva paññattanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:226_27: tasmiṃ siddhe siddhameva “yāva na saṅgho rattaññumahattaṃ pattoti vacanaṃ ito pubbe paṭhamayācanāyapi vutta”nti.
tika-vin06t:226_28: Aṭṭhakathāyampi rattaññumahattappattakāle “dve sikkhāpadānī”ti gaṇanaparicchedavacanaṃ paṭhamayācanāya vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:227_0: “Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassā”tiādimhi ayamādito paṭṭhāya atthavibhāvanā –
tika-vin06t:227_1: ayaṃ kirāyasmā assajittherato paṭiladdhaṃ ekagāthāmattakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nayasatasahassehi vivecento
tika-vin06t:227_2: arahattaṃ patvā sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhito “aho vata mahānubhāvoyaṃ saddhammo,
tika-vin06t:227_3: yo vināpi dhammasāminā parammukhato sutamattepi mayhaṃ mahantaṃ guṇavisesaṃ janesi,
tika-vin06t:227_4: sādhu vatāyaṃ saddhammo ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti cintento “katamesānaṃ nu kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:227_6: kāraṇañca attano aggasāvakañāṇena paṭivijjhitvā “sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattantiādiciraṭṭhitikāraṇa”nti
tika-vin06t:227_8: Tato pañhassa vissajjane vinayapaññattiyācanokāse sampatte “etassa bhagavā kālo,
tika-vin06t:227_14: sattesu kāruññatañca paṭicca “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā”tiādinā
tika-vin06t:227_15: nayena vepullamahattataṃ paṭicca satthā sāvakānaṃ upajjhāyavattādīni vinayakammāni,
tika-vin06t:227_18: Tadā ca āyasmā sāriputto satthārā niddiṭṭhesu ciraṭṭhitihetūsu jātesu “navaṅgasatthusāsanamahattatā ca sampati jātā,
tika-vin06t:227_20: pātimokkhuddeso eveko na tāva sāvakānaṃ anuññāto,
tika-vin06t:227_22: Saṅghopi etarahi parisuddho pacchimakassa sotāpannattā”ti cintetvā pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānāpetukāmo yattakehi
tika-vin06t:228_0: Tattha “yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā”ti pātimokkhuddesappahonakasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāyāha,
tika-vin06t:228_3: paññapiyamānesu ca “na tāva bhaddāli satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī”tiādi vuttaṃ apaññattaṃ upādāya,
tika-vin06t:228_4: tathā idhāpi apaññattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:228_5: Parisuddhattā saṅghassa sampati sāvakānaṃ āṇāpātimokkhuddesaṃ nānujānāmīti dassento “nirabbudo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin06t:228_6: Na hi parisuddhe saṅghe ovādapātimokkhuddesassa anuddesakāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin06t:228_8: Tathā ca so tato aṭṭhannaṃvassānaṃ accayena anuññāto.
tika-vin06t:228_13: Yaṃ pana upasampadakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā ekakaṃ ohāya pakkamiṃsu…pe…
tika-vin06t:228_14: so tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā cirena agamāsī”ti vatthu āgataṃ,
tika-vin06t:228_15: taṃ sudinnavatthuto parato uppannampi tattha yathādhikāraṃ samodhānetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:228_16: Tathā tattheva “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni hontī”tiādinā aṅgānipi veditabbāni.
tika-vin06t:228_17: Na hi ādito eva ubhatopātimokkhāni siddhānīti.
tika-vin06t:228_20: rāhulakumāre uppanne bodhisatto nikkhamitvā chabbassāni dukkaraṃ katvā sattame abhisambuddho,
tika-vin06t:228_21: tasmiṃ eva saṃvacchare kapilavatthuṃ gantvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesi.
tika-vin06t:228_22: Ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovādasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañhi āyasmā sattavassikakāle bhagavantaṃ cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā ‘dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehi,
tika-vin06t:228_23: dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī’ti dāyajjaṃ yācamāno bhagavatā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa niyyādetvā pabbājito”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:228_26: tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajja”nti vuttattā saraṇagamanūpasampadā paṭhamavassabbhantare eva paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin06t:228_33: tasmā ito pubbepi sikkhāpadāni paññattānīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:247_0: Ñātuṃ sayaṃ no na pare ca netuṃ,
tika-vin06t:249_0: Tattha kamabhedo sikkhāpadānaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin06t:249_9: Iccevamādīhi abhāvabhedasikkhāpadānaṃ idha bhāvabhedena yuttipariyesanaṃ sādhayamānopi siyā anummādavighātabhāgīti.
tika-vin06t:249_10: Ettāvatā sakalassapi vinayapiṭakassa vitakkayācanakālakālaññūkāraṇaphalapayojanehi sattahi aṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ
tika-vin06t:249_13: Tasseva “etassa bhagavā kālo”tiādinā pavattā yācanā nāma.
tika-vin06t:249_17: “Tesaṃyeva āsavaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti vacanato āsavaṭṭhānīyadhammapaṭighāto phalaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:249_18: “Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assā”ti vacanato sāsanabrahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhiti payojananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:252_6: Ocinantā viyāti bahupupphaṃ gacchaṃ mālākārā ciraṃ ocinanti,
tika-vin06t:252_7: evaṃ bahuveneyyesu gāmādīsu ciraṃ vasantā veneyyapuññaṃ pariharantā caranti.
tika-vin06t:252_11: Manussā pana imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā uppajjanti.
tika-vin06t:252_15: Yena kāraṇena mayaṃ tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadeyyāma,
tika-vin06t:252_26: atikkantakālattā tamahaṃ sampati kuto dadeyyanti dassetī”ti vadati.
tika-vin06t:255_4: Sakāya paṭiññāya mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethātiādi parasamayavivajjanatotiādi.
tika-vin06t:255_5: Vibhaṅganayabhedadassanatoti tisso itthiyo bhūmaṭṭhaṃ thalaṭṭhantiādi. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:255_6: kiṃ bhagavato mārāvaṭṭanapaṭighātāya satti natthīti? Atthi,
tika-vin06t:260_0: Kiṃ bhagavā sasisso tāva mahantaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ ubbhaṇḍikaṃ katvā agamāsīti?
tika-vin06t:260_2: temāsibhāgiyaṃ pana puññarāsikaṃ deyyadhammaṃ appaṭikkhipanto brāhmaṇassa upāyato satthā adāsi.
tika-vin06t:265_0: Tasmā bhagavā assādiyanto taṃ deyyadhammaṃ appaṭikkhipanto upāyena brāhmaṇassa puññabuddhiṃ katvā,
tika-vin06t:265_2: “ayaṃ nayo aṭṭhakathaṃ vināpi pāḷinayānulomato siddho”ti vadanti. Kathaṃ? –
tika-vin06t:272_0: Idāni āyasmā upālitthero vinayapaññattiyā sādhāraṇanidānaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadānaṃ pāṭekkaṃ paññattiṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin06t:272_2: niggumbaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “atha kho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā”tiādimāhāti.
tika-vin06t:274_0: Tasmiṃ siddhe nidānānaṃ, kamasiddhi yato bhave.
tika-vin06t:275_0: Tattha sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ desanākkamo pahānakkamo paṭipattikkamo uppattikkamoti catubbidho kamo labbhati.
tika-vin06t:275_1: Tattha bhagavatā rājagahe bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena pātimokkhuddesassa yo desanākkamo anuññāto,
tika-vin06t:275_2: taṃ desanākkamamanulomento āyasmā mahākassapo paṭhamaṃ pārājikuddesaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin06t:275_4: tato aniyatuddesaṃ vitthāruddesañca pucchitvā tadanantaraṃ bhikkhunīvibhaṅgañca teneva anukkamena pucchi,
tika-vin06t:275_5: nidānuddesantogadhānañca sarūpena anuddiṭṭhānaṃ pucchanatthaṃ khandhakepi pucchi.
tika-vin06t:275_6: Etena ca khandhake paññattā thullaccayā saṅgahitā honti.
tika-vin06t:275_7: Pucchitānukkameneva upālitthero taṃ sabbaṃ sāpattibhedādikaṃ desento thullaccayadubbhāsitaāpattisamuṭṭhānādidīpakaṃ antokatvā desesi,
tika-vin06t:275_9: Ubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakato pana uccinitvā tadā parivārapāḷi visuṃ katā.
tika-vin06t:275_10: Imameva nayaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “eteneva upāyena khandhakaparivārepi āropesu”ntiādi.
tika-vin06t:275_12: Puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā upāli vissajjesī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:275_14: Vissajjento pana āyasmā upāli nivarasesaṃ desento khandhakaparivāre antokatvā desesi.
tika-vin06t:275_15: Tadā ca khandhakaparivārapāḷi visuṃ katāti ayaṃ desanākkamo.
tika-vin06t:275_16: Yadi evaṃ nidānuddeso paṭhamaṃ desetabboti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:275_18: So hi “yassa siyā āpattī”tiādinā nayena pavattattā paṭhamaṃ sikkhāpadasaṅgahitāsu āpattīsu adassitāsu na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:275_20: tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti vacanato sikkhāpadāneva paṭhamaṃ desetabbānīti pārājikuddesakkamo sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:276_0: Pārājikuddesādisaṅgahitānaṃ āpattiakusalānaṃ yathoḷārikakkamena pahātabbattā pahānakkamopettha sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:276_1: Upasampannasamanantaraṃ “tāvadeva cattāri akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānī”ti vacanato “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti
tika-vin06t:276_2: vacanato ca yathā garukaṃ ācikkhaṇaṃ sikkhanena paṭipattikkamopettha sambhavati,
tika-vin06t:276_3: evamimehi tīhi kamehi desetabbānampetesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ uppattikkamo sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:276_5: taṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne eva vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ.
tika-vin06t:276_7: Tato “anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthī”ti parivāre etaṃ vacanaṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:276_8: ettāvatā purimena kamattayena paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ patte pārājikuddese paṭhamuppannattā methunadhammapārājikaṃ
tika-vin06t:276_9: sabbapaṭhamaṃ desetukāmo upālitthero “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliya”nti vesālimeva pāpetvā ṭhapesi.
tika-vin06t:276_12: manussamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti evamādīnaṃ desanādhippāye sati bārāṇasiṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeyyāti.
tika-vin06t:284_0: Tattha bhagavā verañjāyaṃ vutthavasso anupubbena cārikaṃ caranto kattikajuṇhapakkhe eva vesāliṃ pāpuṇitvā yāva paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:284_1: tāva aṭṭha vassāni vesāliyaṃyeva viharanto viya pāḷikkamena dissati,
tika-vin06t:284_2: na ca bhagavā tāvattakaṃ kālaṃ tattheva vihāsi.
tika-vin06t:284_3: So hi sudinnassa sāvakānaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujānitvā yathābhirantaṃ tattha viharitvā
tika-vin06t:284_4: cārikaṃ caranto bhesakaḷāvanaṃ patvā tattha terasamaṃ vassaṃ vasi,
tika-vin06t:284_5: teneva anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā cuddasamaṃ vassaṃ vasi,
tika-vin06t:284_8: tato vutthavasso cārikaṃ caranto rājagahaṃ patvā sattarasamaṃ vasi,
tika-vin06t:284_9: iminā anukkamena aparānipi tīṇi vassāni tattheva vasi.
tika-vin06t:284_10: Ettāvatā bhagavā paripuṇṇavīsativasso rājagahato anupubbena vesāliṃ pāpuṇi,
tika-vin06t:284_11: tato upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko sudinno vesāliyaṃyeva methunaṃ dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesi,
tika-vin06t:284_12: tato bhagavā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññapesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:284_13: Tattha yasmā upālitthero ito paṭhamataraṃ tattha vesāliyañca paññattasikkhāpadāni adassetukāmo,
tika-vin06t:284_16: pacchā imassa sikkhāpadassa paññattikāle nivāsañca ekato katvā “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliya”ntiādimāha,
tika-vin06t:284_20: Tasmā imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājikassa paññattiṭṭhānasaṅkhāte nidāne ṭhatvā “tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hoti…pe…
tika-vin06t:284_21: aññataraṃ vajjigāmaṃ upanissāya viharatī”ti etasmiṃ imassa sikkhāpadassa puggalappakāsane,
tika-vin06t:284_22: “tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti…pe…
tika-vin06t:284_23: tikkhattuṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ abhiviññāpesī”ti imasmiṃ vatthuppakāsane ca codanānayo,
tika-vin06t:284_26: kimatthaṃ therena aññesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ puggalavatthūni viya saṅkhepato avatvā yattha ca so uppanno,
tika-vin06t:284_30: taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesetvā puggalavatthūni vitthārato vuttānīti ce? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:297_0: Api ca yadi paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ akarontassāpi yāva brahmalokā ayaso patthaṭo,
tika-vin06t:300_0: Nanu māgaṇḍikaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā mātāpitūnamassā hitatthaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ bījakabījakamātūnaṃ arahattuppatti therena dīpitā.
tika-vin06t:300_1: “Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:300_2: yena samayena sudinno purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti vā “yena samayena bhagavā paṭhamapārājikaṃ
tika-vin06t:300_3: paññapesī”ti vā vacanaṃ idha na yujjati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:300_4: “Idha pana hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatī”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanañhi idha na labbhati.
tika-vin06t:300_7: Yasmā pana so ciraniviṭṭhopi ca gāmo attano niviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakālamatthīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-vin06t:300_8: tena pariyāyena “tena kho pana samayena vesāliyā avidūre kalandagāmo nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:301_1: Anuññātosi pana tvanti samaṇavattadassanatthaṃ bhagavā pucchati.
tika-vin06t:301_2: Mātāpitūhi ananuññātanti ettha janakeheva ananuññātadassanatthaṃ pucchīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:301_3: Na kho sudinna tathāgatāti “pabbājetu maṃ bhagavā”ti yācanāvasena panevamāha,
tika-vin06t:301_4: na bhagavā sayaṃ saraṇāni datvā pabbājesi.
tika-vin06t:301_12: Akāmakā vinā bhavissāmāti tayā saddhiṃ amaritvā akāmā jīvissāma.
tika-vin06t:301_15: tayi jīvamāne eva no maraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:301_16: maraṇenapi no tayā viyogaṃ mayaṃ akāmakāva pāpuṇissāma.
tika-vin06t:302_1: Katipāhaṃ balaṃ gāhetvāti kasmā panāyaṃ tathā pabbajjāya tibbacchando anuññāto samāno katipāhaṃ ghareyeva vilambitvā kāyabalañca aggahesīti?
tika-vin06t:302_2: Anumatidānena mātāpitūsu sahāyakesu ca tuṭṭho tesaṃ cittatuṭṭhatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:302_3: Kesuci aṭṭhakathāpotthakesu keci ācariyā “ayaṃ sudinno jīvakavatthuto pacchā paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena
tika-vin06t:302_4: paṃsukūliko jāto”ti saññāya “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko hotī”ti likhanti,
tika-vin06t:302_6: “Tathā sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito,
tika-vin06t:302_7: vīsatime vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho sayaṃ pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā”ti,
tika-vin06t:302_8: “bhagavato hi buddhattaṃ pattato paṭṭhāya yāva idaṃ vatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:302_9: etthantare vīsati vassāni na koci gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyi,
tika-vin06t:302_10: sabbe paṃsukūlikāva ahesu”nti ca vuttena aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:302_14: tasmā avassiko ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho siyāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:302_15: “alattha kho sudinno kalandaputto bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
tika-vin06t:302_17: Pabbajjānantarameva hi so upasampanno terasadhutaṅgaguṇe samādāya vattanto aṭṭha vassāni vajjigāme viharitvā
tika-vin06t:302_18: nissayamuttattā sayaṃvasī hutvā “etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā”tiāditakkavasena yena vesālī tadavasari,
tika-vin06t:302_19: tasmā “paṃsukūlikadhutaṅgavasena paṃsukūliko hotī”ti ettakoyeva pāṭho yesu potthakesu dissati,
tika-vin06t:302_21: “Āraññiko hotī”ti iminā pañca senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni saṅgahitāni nesajjikaṅgañca vihārasabhāgattā,
tika-vin06t:305_1: Apaññatte sikkhāpadeti ettha duvidhaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:305_4: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti evaṃ sauddesānuddesabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:305_5: Tattha pātimokkhe sarūpato āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā sauddesapaññatti nāma.
tika-vin06t:305_7: Tattha yassā paññattiyā anto āpattiyā saha,
tika-vin06t:305_12: Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā.
tika-vin06t:305_13: “Pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti hi puggalova tattha dassito, nāpatti.
tika-vin06t:305_14: Dassitāpattikā nāma bhikkhunīpātimokkhe “sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti hi tattha āpatti dassitā saddhiṃ puggalena,
tika-vin06t:305_19: Tattha aniddiṭṭhakārakā nāma sukkavissaṭṭhi musāvāda omasavāda pesuñña bhūtagāma aññavādaka ujjhāpanaka
tika-vin06t:305_20: gaṇabhojana paramparabhojana surāmeraya aṅgulipatodaka hasadhamma anādariya talaghātakajatumaṭṭhaka sikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_1: Tattha “yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ āpatti thullaccayassā”ti evamādikā padabhājaniye sandissamānāpatti padabhājanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:306_7: divā paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti evamādikā vinītavatthusikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:306_13: “Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya,
tika-vin06t:306_14: pācittiya”nti iminā vuttena “yā pana bhikkhunī nacceyya vā gāyeyya vā vādeyya vā pācittiya”nti evamādikaṃ
tika-vin06t:306_17: Chabbidhampetaṃ chahi kāraṇehi uddesārahaṃ na hotīti anuddesasikkhāpadaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:307_0: Tattha apaññatte sikkhāpadeti sauddesasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:307_1: Ekacce ācariyā evaṃ kira vaṇṇayanti “cattāro pārājikā kativassābhisambuddhena bhagavatā paññattātiādinā
tika-vin06t:307_2: pucchaṃ katvā tesu paṭhamapārājiko vesāliyaṃ paññatto pañcavassābhisambuddhena hemantānaṃ paṭhame māse
tika-vin06t:307_3: dutiye pakkhe dasame divase aḍḍhateyyaporisāya chāyāya puratthābhimukhena nisinnena aḍḍhaterasānaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
tika-vin06t:308_0: Yasmā dvādasamaṃ vassaṃ, verañjāyaṃ vasi jino;
tika-vin06t:309_0: Tasmiñca suddho saṅghoti, neva pārājikaṃ tadā.
tika-vin06t:311_0: Tasmiṃ siddhāti siddhāva, garukāpatti no tadā.
tika-vin06t:317_0: Suttameva pamāṇaṃ no, sova kālo anappakoti.
tika-vin06t:318_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “atha bhagavā ajjhācāraṃ apassanto pārājikaṃ vā saṅghādisesaṃ vā na paññapesī”ti,
tika-vin06t:318_3: tena sauddesānuddesapaññattibhedaṃ sakalaṃ pārājikaṃ sandhāyāhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:318_8: Asucipāne pana hatthiniyā tāpasapassāvapānena vālakābyo nāma uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:323_0: “Pupphike edhiyya suddhe, passaṃ narañca itthi taṃ;
tika-vin06t:325_0: Rājorodho viyāti sīhaḷadīpe ekissā itthiyā tathā ahosi,
tika-vin06t:325_3: na taṃ manussānaṃ visayo ahosi tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:325_4: Teneva bhikkhū pucchiṃsu “kacci no tvaṃ āvuso sudinna anabhirato”ti.
