tika-vin06t:326_12: Padaniruttibyañjanāni nāmavevacanāneva “nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ niruttī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin06t:326_16: Saṅghasuṭṭhutāyāti ettha lokavajjassa paññāpane saṅghasuṭṭhutā hoti pākaṭādīnavato.
tika-vin06t:326_24: “Pubbe katapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassā”ti vuttattā “sudinno taṃ kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi,
tika-vin06t:327_7: Vatthuno paññattiyā vā vītikkamacetanāyābhāvepi paṭikkhittassa karaṇe,
tika-vin06t:327_8: kattabbassa akaraṇe vā sati yattha āpattippasaṅgo,
tika-vin06t:327_9: taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā surāpānaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:327_20: etāni pana vitthārato dveasīti mahāvattāni nāma honti.
tika-vin06t:327_22: Tattha paññattivinayo samathavinayatthāya samathavinayo saṃvaravinayatthāya saṃvaravinayo pahānavinayatthāyāti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:327_24: taṃ saṅghaphāsūti ekamiva vuttaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya sati saṅghaphāsu bhavissatīti dīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:327_25: Pakarīyanti ettha te te payojanavisesasaṅkhātā atthavasāti atthavasaṃ “pakaraṇa”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:327_26: Dasasu padesu ekekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya padasataṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:327_27: Tattha pacchimassa padassa vasena atthasataṃ purimassa vasena dhammasataṃ atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ,
tika-vin06t:327_28: dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni,
tika-vin06t:327_30: dhammasate ñāṇasataṃ dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin06t:328_0: Methunaṃ dhammanti evaṃ bahulanayena laddhanāmakaṃ sakasampayogena,
tika-vin06t:328_1: parasampayogena vā attano nimittassa sakamagge vā paramagge vā paranimittassa sakamagge eva pavesapaviṭṭhaṭhituddharaṇesu
tika-vin06t:328_2: yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ paṭisādiyanavasena seveyya pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti.
tika-vin06t:328_3: Keci pana “pavesādīni cattāri vā tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin06t:328_9: tesaṃ matena catūsupi catasso pārājikāpattiyo āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:328_10: Teyeva evaṃ vadanti “āpajjatu methunadhammapārājikāpatti methunadhammapārājikāpattiyā tabbhāgiyā”ti,
tika-vin06t:328_12: saṅghādisesāpattiñca āpajjitvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gahaṭṭhakāle methunādipārājikaṃ āpajjitvā puna pabbajitvā
tika-vin06t:328_13: upasampajjitvā ekaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ ekamanekaṃ vā paṭikaritvāva so puggalo yasmā nirāpattiko hoti,
tika-vin06t:328_14: tasmā so gahaṭṭhakāle sāpattikovāti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi attheva āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_15: Vuṭṭhānadesanāhi pana asujjhanato ‘payoge payoge āpatti pārājikassā’ti na vuttaṃ gaṇanapayojanābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:328_17: atha kho padabhājane ‘āpatti pārājikassā’ti vacanenāyamattho siddho”ti yuttiñca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:328_18: Yadi evaṃ mātikāyampi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya pārājika”nti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:328_20: Sabbepi hi āpattikkhandhe bhikkhugaṇanañca anavasesetvā tiṭṭhatīti anavasesavacananti katvā paveseva āpatti,
tika-vin06t:328_22: tamevekaṃ sandhāya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti pārājikāpattimpi anto katvā nidānuddese vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_23: Tasmā mātikāyaṃ “pārājika”nti avatvā “pārājiko hotī”ti puggalaniddesavacanaṃ tena sarīrabandhanena upasampadāya abhabbabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_24: “Āpatti pārājikassā”ti padabhājane vacanaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi pārājikassa asaṃvāsassa sato puggalassa atheyyasaṃvāsakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_25: Na hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako hoti,
tika-vin06t:328_27: Tenevāha “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:328_28: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:328_30: Anupasampannassa tadabhāvato siddho so “upasampanno bhikkhu”tveva vuccatīti.
tika-vin06t:328_33: Bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghādisesesu pana bhikkhusaṅghādisesato vuṭṭhānavidhivisesadassanatthaṃ “ayampi bhikkhunī…pe…
tika-vin06t:328_34: āpannā”ti puggalaniddesaṃ katvāpi pārājikato adhippāyantaradassanatthaṃ “nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti āpattināmaggahaṇañca kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:328_36: Apuggalaniddesesu sekhiyesu āpattiyā dassanakāraṇaṃ sekhiyānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:332_1: Dutiyapaññattiyaṃ “idha mallā yujjhantī”tiādīsu viya paṭisevatīti vattamānavacanaṃ pacurapaṭisevanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:332_3: no tiracchānagatāyā”ti paripuṇṇatthampi paṭhamaṃ paññattiṃ attano micchāgāhena vā lesaoḍḍanatthāya vā evamāha.
tika-vin06t:332_4: Paripuṇṇatthataṃyeva niyametuṃ “nanu āvuso tatheva taṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:332_7: Vicāraṇā panettha tatiyapaññattiyaṃ āvi bhavissati. “Nanu, āvuso,
tika-vin06t:332_8: bhagavatā anekapariyāyenā”tiādi na kevalaṃ sauddesasikkhāpadeneva siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:332_10: Atha vā yadi sauddesasikkhāpadaṃ sāvasesanti paññapesi,
tika-vin06t:332_11: iminā anuddesasikkhāpadenāpi kiṃ na siddhanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Tena hi,
tika-vin06t:332_13: bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti tadeva sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapaññattameva lesatthikānaṃ alesokāsaṃ katvā āmeḍitatthaṃ katvā paññapessāmīti attho.
tika-vin06t:332_14: Aññathā “aññavādake vihesake pācittiya”ntiādīsu viya vatthudvayena āpattidvayaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:333_0: Yassa sacittakapakkhetiādimhi pana gaṇṭhipadanayo tāva paṭhamaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin06t:333_4: Surāpānasmiñhi “surā”ti vā “pātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalameva,
tika-vin06t:333_7: Tattha na vaṭṭatīti “jānitvā”ti vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassāpi lokavajjabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:333_8: Imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ pariharitukāmatāya vajirabuddhittherassa gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “idha sacittakanti ca
tika-vin06t:333_18: yaṃ pana tattheva vuttaṃ “pasuttassa mukhe koci suraṃ pakkhipeyya,
tika-vin06t:333_20: tattha yathā bhikkhuniyā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ parassa āmasanādikāle kāyaṃ acāletvā citteneva
tika-vin06t:333_21: sādiyantiyā āpatti ‘kiriyāva hotī’ti vuttā yebhuyyena kiriyasambhavato,
tika-vin06t:333_24: Surāpānāpattiyā ekantākusalatā pana majjasaññinopi sakiṃ payogena pivato hotīti katvā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:334_1: sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ gahetvā yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:334_3: Sacittakācittakasaṅkhātassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:334_4: tampi surāpānādi lokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:334_6: Sacittakapakkheti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin06t:334_7: Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa sacittakapakkheti visesane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin06t:334_8: Yasmā panettha paṇṇattivajjassa paññattijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva,
tika-vin06t:334_9: vatthujānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā kusalaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin06t:334_10: tasmā “tassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti na vuccatīti “sesaṃ paṇṇattivajja”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:334_12: supinante abbohārikattā supinante vijjamānāpi vītikkamachāyā abbohārikabhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:334_13: Idaṃ pana vacanaṃ daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanattā ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:334_14: tena yaṃ vuttaṃ bāhiranidānakathādhikāre “daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇappayojanāti yebhuyyatāya vutta”ntiādi,
tika-vin06t:337_3: Yāvadatthanti yāvatā attho adhippāyoti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:337_6: tadekaṭṭhe ca dubbalyāvikaraṇe paññatte sati yujjati,
tika-vin06t:337_9: kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāressanti,
tika-vin06t:337_11: bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin06t:337_13: Na hi tato pubbe adhiṭṭhānaṃ vikappanaṃ vā anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:337_19: saṅgho anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti upasampadaṃ yācitvā upasampannena upasampannasamanantarameva “upasampannena bhikkhunā methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo,
tika-vin06t:337_20: asakyaputtiyo”ti ca paññattena assamaṇādibhāvaṃ upagantukāmena nanu paṭhamaṃ ajjhupagatā sikkhā paccakkhātabbā,
tika-vin06t:337_22: te pana “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseviṃsū”ti anupaññattiyā okāsakaraṇatthaṃ vā taṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:337_23: “So āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti kiñcāpi ettheva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:337_25: Na hi sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā yo pārājikavatthuṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati,
tika-vin06t:337_30: Sā hi yassa pārājikaṃ hoti aññā vā āpatti,
tika-vin06t:337_32: Evañhi ante avatvā ādimhi vuttā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anupaññatti viya.
tika-vin06t:340_1: Tattha sudinnavatthu makkaṭivatthu vajjiputtakavatthu cāti tippabhedaṃ vatthu imassa sikkhāpadassa nidānaṃ nāma,
tika-vin06t:340_7: tañca kho itthiyā no purise no paṇḍake no ubhatobyañjanake cā”ti makkaṭipārājiko viya aññopi lesaṃ oḍḍetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin06t:340_8: tasmā tādisassa alesokāsassa dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin06t:340_9: Makkaṭivatthusaṅkhātā nidānā “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti mātikāvacanabhedo na itthiyā eva methunasiddhidassanato kato,
tika-vin06t:340_10: tasmā vibhaṅgo taṃniyāmako tassā mātikāya adhippetatthaniyāmako vibhaṅgo.
tika-vin06t:340_16: tiracchānagatapurisassa dve magge”tiādinā nayena sabbalesokāsaṃ pidahitvā niyamo kato.
tika-vin06t:341_1: yadi evaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavasena vā liṅgaparivattanavasena vā na kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:341_3: Tadavacanena bhikkhunī purisaliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhubhāve ṭhitā evaṃ vadeyya “nāhaṃ upasampadakāle bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā,
tika-vin06t:341_4: tasmā na appaccakkhātasikkhāpi methunadhammena pārājikā homī”ti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:341_6: Bhikkhunīnampi “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti vutte bhikkhunīnampi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthīti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:341_13: apica yo tathā lesaṃ oḍḍetvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto vajjiputtakā viya pārājiko hoti.
tika-vin06t:341_14: Te hi “bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti vacanābhāve sati “āpattiṃ tumhe,
tika-vin06t:341_17: Ettha pana “bhikkhave”ti vuttattā keci bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitā,
tika-vin06t:341_20: labheyyāma bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampada”nti vuttattā keci vibbhantāti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:341_21: Tato āpattiyā bhedoti tato vibhaṅgato “akkhāyite sarīre pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:341_22: yebhuyyena khāyite thullaccaya”ntiādi āpattiyā bhedo hoti.
tika-vin06t:341_23: Anāpatti tadaññathāti tato eva vibhaṅgato yenākārena āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin06t:341_26: na sādiyati anāpattī”ti hi vibhaṅge asati na paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:344_0: Imaṃ nayaṃ dassetvāva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ attho pakāsitabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:344_1: Bhagavatā pana yenākārena yaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:344_2: tassa ākārassa samatthaṃ vā asamatthaṃ vāti duvidhaṃ nidānaṃ,
tika-vin06t:344_6: Na hi vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū sayameva attano attano asantaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ pāpetvā bhāsiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:344_7: Aññamaññassa hi te uttarimanussadhammassa gihīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
tika-vin06t:344_9: Tattha tena lesena bhagavā taṃ vatthuṃ nidānaṃ katvā pārājikaṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin06t:344_11: Iminā nayena nidānāpekkhāni ñatvā tabbiparītāni sikkhāpadāni nidānānapekkhānīti veditabbāni,
tika-vin06t:345_1: tesaṃ appahonakatāya vā tadaññataravekallatāya vā vītikkame sati āpattibhedadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:345_2: asati anāpattidassanatthañcāti sabbattha tayo atthavase paṭicca mātikāya vibhajanaṃ vibhaṅgo ārabhīyatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:345_5: bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhū”ti kevalaṃ byañjanatthadīpanavasena pavatto vā,
tika-vin06t:345_6: “samaññāya bhikkhū”ti bhikkhubhāvasambhavaṃ anapekkhitvāpi kevalaṃ bhikkhu nāma pavattiṭṭhānadīpanavasena pavatto vā,
tika-vin06t:345_9: ñatticatutthena kammena upasampannoti bhikkhū”ti upasampadānantarenāpi bhikkhubhāvasiddhidīpanavasena pavatto vā,
tika-vin06t:345_13: asekkho bhikkhū”ti bhikkhukaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatabhikkhudīpanavasena pavatto vā vibhaṅgo ajjhupekkhito sabbasāmaññapadattā,
tika-vin06t:345_15: adhikaraṇadassanādivasena pavatto ca ajjhupekkhito itarattha tadabhāvatoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:346_1: manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassātiādi payoganiyamadassanavasena pavatto,
tika-vin06t:346_4: na sādiyati anāpattītiādi vatthupayoganiyame sati cittaniyamabhāvābhāvavasena āpattānāpattidassanatthaṃ pavatto,
tika-vin06t:346_5: mataṃ yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ āpatti thullaccayassātiādi vatthussa appahonakatāya vītikkame āpattibhedadassanatthaṃ pavatto,
tika-vin06t:346_6: na sādiyati anāpattīti cittaniyamavekalyena vītikkamābhāvā anāpattidassanatthaṃ pavattoti.
tika-vin06t:346_7: Evaṃ itaresupi sikkhāpadesu yathāsambhavanayo ayanti payojano vibhaṅgo.
tika-vin06t:347_4: so vibhaṅgo viya tayo atthavase paṭicca pavatto.
tika-vin06t:347_10: ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānī”ti etāni kevalaṃ vatthumattadīpanapadānīti niratthakāni nāma,
tika-vin06t:347_13: ākaṅkhamānena paṭiggahite”tiādinā nayena tadaññathā anuddharaṇena nippayojanabhāvo dīpito hoti,
tika-vin06t:347_19: tasmā vuttaṃ mātikāyaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin06t:347_21: “Parapariggahitaṃ parapariggahitasaññitā garuparikkhāro theyyacittaṃ avaharaṇa”nti vuttānaṃ pañcannampi
tika-vin06t:347_22: aṅgānaṃ pāripūriyā petatiracchānagatapariggahite āpattippahonakaṭṭhānepi vissajjanatthaṃ “anāpatti petapariggahite”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:347_27: imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohīti bhaṇatītiādi pana tadaññathā paṭipattikkamadassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:348_0: Ettha paṭhamapaññatti tāva paṭhamabodhiṃ atikkamitvā paññattattā,
tika-vin06t:348_1: āyasmato sudinnassa aṭṭhavassikakāle paññattattā ca rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle paññattā.
tika-vin06t:348_3: So hāyasmā makkaṭipārājiko yathā mātugāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu tiracchānagatitthī anadhippetā,
tika-vin06t:348_9: Te hi vajjiputtakā lābhaggamahattaṃ pattā hutvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā nhāyitvā varasayanesu sayitvā tatiyānupaññattiyā vatthuṃ uppādesuṃ,
tika-vin06t:348_10: te ca vepullamahattaṃ patte saṅghe uppannā,
tika-vin06t:348_12: Idaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ tividhampi vatthuṃ upādāya catubbidhampi taṃ kālaṃ patvā paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:349_3: Na hi sabbopi bhikkhunāmako yā bhagavatā yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannabhikkhūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena sikkhitabbasikkhā vihitā,
tika-vin06t:349_4: “ettha saha jīvantī”ti yo ca ājīvo vutto,
tika-vin06t:349_7: Yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannasamanantarameva tadubhayaṃ jānantopi ajānantopi tadajjhupagatattā samāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:349_8: Saha jīvantīti yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin06t:349_10: yaṃ pana vuttaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhāsamāpanno sājīvaṃ avītikkamanto sājīvasamāpanno hotī”ti,
tika-vin06t:349_12: Na hi sikkhaṃ aparipūrento kāmavitakkādibahulo vā ekaccaṃ sāvasesaṃ sājīvaṃ vītikkamanto vā sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno nāma na hoti.
tika-vin06t:349_13: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pana catukkaṃ labbhati atthi bhikkhu sikkhāsamāpanno sīlāni paccavekkhanto na sājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin06t:349_15: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno kāmavitakkādibahulo sājīvasamāpanno nirāpattiko,
tika-vin06t:349_16: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno na ca sājīvasamāpanno anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin06t:349_17: atthi sikkhāsamāpanno ca sājīvasamāpanno ca sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto,
tika-vin06t:349_18: ayameva catuttho bhikkhu ukkaṭṭho idha adhippeto siyā.
tika-vin06t:349_19: Na hi bhagavā anukkaṭṭhaṃ vattuṃ yuttoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:349_22: Ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇādhippāye sati “sikkhāti tisso sikkhā”ti ettakameva vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:350_0: “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti parato vacanaṃ apekkhitvā adhisīlasikkhāva vuttāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:350_2: Na hi adhisīlasikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevituṃ bhabbo,
tika-vin06t:350_3: taṃ sikkhaṃ aparipūrento sājīvañca vītikkamanto eva hi paṭiseveyyāti adhippāyo,
tika-vin06t:350_8: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:350_9: tasmā adhisīlasikkhāya saṅgāhako sājīvo sikkhāsājīvoti vutto.
tika-vin06t:350_14: Tañca upasampadūpagamanantarato paṭṭhāya sikkhanādhikārattā “sikkhatī”ti ca “samāpanno”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin06t:350_16: tādisaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca aparabhāge sājīvasaṅkhātameva sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya,
tika-vin06t:350_17: tasmiṃyeva ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti ayamattho yujjati.
tika-vin06t:350_19: So ca na paṭikkhepārahoti tena tadanusārena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:351_7: tasmā sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanabhikkhūnaṃ sāmaññamidaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇanti katvā kevalaṃ sikkhāsamāpanno,
tika-vin06t:351_8: kevalaṃ sājīvasamāpanno ca ubhayasamāpanno cāti sarūpekadesekasesanayena “sikkhāsājīvasamaāpanno”tveva
tika-vin06t:351_9: sampiṇḍetvā ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇena anukkaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇasiddhito aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ukkaṭṭhova vutto.
tika-vin06t:351_11: tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha sikkhāpadassa avacane parihāraṃ vatvā yasmā pana so asikkhampi samāpanno,
tika-vin06t:351_12: tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi atthato veditabboti ca vatvā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno taṃ appaccakkhāya yañca
tika-vin06t:351_13: sājīvaṃ samāpanno tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttanti ayamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:351_14: Etasmiṃ pana adhippāye adhisīlasikkhāya eva gahaṇaṃ sabbatthikattā,
tika-vin06t:351_16: Yathā ca sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyanto sīlaṃ samādiyatīti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:351_17: evaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paccakkhanto sīlasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ paccakkhātīti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:351_20: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭisevitamethunassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto na samūhanati nāma.
tika-vin06t:351_21: Na hi so bhikkhu hutvā paṭisevi,
tika-vin06t:352_1: nanu “yo pana bhikkhu sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā…pe…
tika-vin06t:352_4: Yo pana sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno theyyasaṃvāsādiko kevalena samaññāmattena,
tika-vin06t:352_7: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa pārājikāpatti.
tika-vin06t:352_8: Yo vā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno tassa ca,
tika-vin06t:352_9: yo vā pakkhapaṇḍakattā paṇḍakabhāvūpagamanena na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno tassa ca tadubhayaṃ atthīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:352_10: “Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ca pakkhapaṇḍako upasampadāya na vatthū”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:352_12: tasmiṃ pakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe paṇḍakattā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin06t:352_13: so pariccajitabbasikkhāya abhāvena sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya mukhena parassa aṅgajātaggahaṇādayo methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin06t:352_15: Ayaṃ nayo apaṇḍakapakkhaṃ alabhamānasseva parato yujjati,
tika-vin06t:352_16: labhantassa pana arūpasattānaṃ kusalānaṃ samāpattikkhaṇe bhavaṅgavicchede satipi amaraṇaṃ viya paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi bhikkhubhāvo atthi.
tika-vin06t:352_17: Saṃvāsaṃ vā sādiyantassa na theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvo atthi antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa viya.
tika-vin06t:352_19: Gaṇapūrako pana na hoti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno viya,
tika-vin06t:352_26: Yato upasampadā tassa apaṇḍakapakkhe anuññātā sahetukapaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin06t:353_0: Apica sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti iminā tassa sikkhāsamādānaṃ dīpetvā taṃ samādinnasikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya tattha ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin06t:353_1: na aññathāti iminā kāraṇena yathāvuttāniṭṭhappasaṅgato “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:353_3: tathā “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā gāmā
tika-vin06t:353_4: vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya,
tika-vin06t:353_8: Na hi “pageva paṇḍake purise vā”ti vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-vin06t:356_6: suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”ti evamādito hi pariyattisāsanato suttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:356_8: “Anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti bhaṇatī”ti evamādito pariyattisāsanato ācariyavādaṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:356_10: supinantenā”ti evamādito pariyattisāsanato eva attanomatiṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ.
tika-vin06t:356_11: Tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
tika-vin06t:356_12: Api ca vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “anupasampannena paññattena vā apaññattena vā vuccamāno…pe…
tika-vin06t:356_20: Āhaccapadenāti aṭṭha vaṇṇaṭṭhānāni āhacca vuttena padanikāyenāti attho,
tika-vin06t:356_25: Ācariyavādo “ācariyavaṃso”ti vutto pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparāya ābhatova pamāṇanti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin06t:357_1: idha ca kiñcāpi “suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:357_2: atha kho mahāpadesanayasiddhaṃ paṭikkhittāpaṭikkhittaṃ anuññātānanuññātaṃ kappiyākappiyanti atthato vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:357_3: Tattha yasmā ṭhānaṃ okāso padesoti kāraṇavevacanāni “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda,
tika-vin06t:357_5: “niggahaṭṭhāna”nti ca “asandiṭṭhiṭṭhāna”nti ca “asandiṭṭhi ca pana padeso”ti ca lokato,
tika-vin06t:357_8: Mahantabhāvo pana tesaṃ mahāvisayattā mahābhūtānaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:358_6: kāyindriyassa ca samāyoge sati paṭivijānanto kāyikasukhavedanuppattimattena sādiyati nāmāti paricchinditvā
tika-vin06t:358_7: tassa āpatti pārājikassāti asevanādhippāyassapi āpattippasaṅgaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:358_8: tathā yassa santhatattā vā yonidosavasena vā dukkhā asātā vedanā,
tika-vin06t:358_10: tassa jānato ajānatopi “anāpatti asādiyantassā”ti suttantaṃ dassetvā sevanādhippāyassāpi anāpattippasaṅgaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:358_11: tathā yadi mocanarāgena upakkamato mutte saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin06t:358_12: pageva methunarāgenāti dukkaṭaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā saṅghādisesaṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:358_14: Itaro “anāpatti ajānantassāti vuttattā jānato jānaneneva sukhavedanā hotu vā mā vā sādiyanā hotī”ti vatvā
tika-vin06t:358_16: anavajjaṃ sāvajjaṃ karotīti evaṃ dhammaṃ uddhammaṃ karoti.
tika-vin06t:358_17: Ubhayaṃ pana jānanto “bhikkhussa sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhiteti vacanato sevanacittamevettha pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:358_19: abhāvena anāpattī”ti vatvā ubhayampi rakkhati sampādeti.
tika-vin06t:358_20: Iminā nayena sabbasikkhāpadesu yathāsambhavaṃ sappayojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin06t:359_0: Saṅgītiṃ āropetvā ṭhapitapāḷito vinimuttaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā pāḷivinimuttā atthato, nayato,
tika-vin06t:359_1: anulomato ca pāḷiokkantavinicchayappavattā anupaviṭṭhavinicchayavasena pavattāti attho.
tika-vin06t:359_2: “Na samūhanissatī”ti jānantopi bhagavā kevalaṃ “tesaṃ mataṃ pacchimā janatā mama vacanaṃ viya pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin06t:359_5: tenetaṃ siddhaṃ “paññattampi ce sikkhāpadaṃ samūhanituṃ yassa saṅghassa anuññātaṃ bhagavatā,
tika-vin06t:359_8: Kiñca bhiyyo ūnātirittasikkhāpadesu ācariyakulesu vivādo aññamaññaṃ na kātabboti dassanatthañca.
tika-vin06t:359_11: Bhagavatā ca “sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:359_12: Tattha ca ekacce therā evamāhaṃsūti ca aññavādadassanato vivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:359_13: tadabhāvattampi ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ sāvetvā avivadamāneheva sikkhitabbaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin06t:360_1: Tattha “suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsū”ti vacanato piṭakattayassapi sādhāraṇā esā kathāti veditabbā,
tika-vin06t:360_4: “Suttādicatukkaṃ appaccakkhāya tena aviruddhassa kammassa kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti dhammasirittherassa gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:360_7: Suttañhi appaṭivattiyaṃ kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti etehi padehi ayuttattā.
tika-vin06t:360_8: Pākatike pana gaṇṭhipade “tamatthaṃ vinicchinitvā tassa kārakasaṅghasadisa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:360_12: tadanulomato nāḷikeraphalassa udakampi udakameva hotīti paravādī ca.
tika-vin06t:363_0: Evaṃ paravādinā vutte sakavādī dhaññaphalassa gatikattā,
tika-vin06t:363_1: āhāratthassa ca pharaṇato “yāvakālikameva ta”nti vadanto paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin06t:363_2: Paro ācariyavādanti “suṅkaṃ pariharatīti ettha upacāraṃ okkamitvā kiñcāpi pariharati,
tika-vin06t:363_3: avahāro evā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato “tathā karonto pārājikamāpajjatī”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “suṅkaṃ pariharati,
tika-vin06t:363_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti suttaṃ tattheva āgatamahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena saddhiṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti,
tika-vin06t:363_6: Paro attanomatīti ettha “purebhattaṃ parasantakaṃ avaharāti purebhattameva harissāmīti vāyamantassa pacchābhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:363_8: tasmā mūlaṭṭho na muccatīti tumhākaṃ theravādattā mūlaṭṭhassa pārājikamevā”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī
tika-vin06t:363_9: “taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin06t:364_0: Paro suttanti “aniyatahetudhammo sammattaniyatahetudhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti suttaṃ paṭṭhāne
tika-vin06t:364_1: likhitaṃ dassetvā “ariyamaggassa na nibbānamevārammaṇa”nti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “ārammaṇattikādisuttānulome
tika-vin06t:364_3: Suttānulome otarantaṃyeva hi suttaṃ nāma, netaraṃ.
tika-vin06t:364_4: Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatīti ettakenapi siddhe tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhapāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”tiādi.
tika-vin06t:364_7: pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato dinnabhojane bhuñjitvā parissayāni parivajjitvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā viharanto nicco hotīti.
tika-vin06t:364_8: Evarūpassa atthassa vasena āruḷhampi suttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:364_9: tena vuttaṃ no ce tathā paññāyatīti siddhepi “no ce tathā paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:364_11: “Bāhirakasuttaṃ vā”ti vuttattā attano suttampi atthena asamentaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:364_12: Paro ācariyavādantiādīsu dvīsu nayesu pamādalekhavasena tattha tattha āgataṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ theravādehi saddhiṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:365_1: Paro suttanti paravādinā “mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi siṅgiveraṃ vacā…pe…
tika-vin06t:365_2: bīje bījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā bhindati vā…pe…
tika-vin06t:365_3: āpatti pācittiyassāti tumhākaṃ pāṭhattā haliddigaṇṭhiṃ chindantassa pācittiya”nti vutte sakavādī “yāni
tika-vin06t:365_4: vā panaññāni atthi mūle sañjāyantī”tiādiṃ dassetvā tassa aṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātena ācariyavādena paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin06t:365_6: Paro suttānulomanti paravādinā “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggahoti vacanassānulomato ‘amhākaṃ
tika-vin06t:365_7: porāṇabhikkhū ekapāsāde gabbhaṃ thaketvā anupasampannena sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti tathā katvā āgatā,
tika-vin06t:365_8: tasmā amhākaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti tumhesu eva ekaccesu vadantesu tumhākaṃ na kiñci vattuṃ sakkā”ti vutte sakavādī
tika-vin06t:365_9: “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇa”ntiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti.
tika-vin06t:365_10: Paro attanomatinti “dvāraṃ vivaritvā anāpucchā sayitesu ke muccantī”ti ettha pana dvepi janā muccanti yo ca yakkhagahitako,
tika-vin06t:365_11: yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpitoti tumhākaṃ theravādattā aññe sabbepi yathā tathā vā nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin06t:366_1: Paro suttanti “āpattiṃ āpajjantī”ti paravādinā gutte sakavādī “divā kilantarūpo mañce nisinno pāde bhūmito amocetvāva niddāvasena nipajjati,
tika-vin06t:366_2: tassa anāpattī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā ekabhaṅgena nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin06t:366_6: duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampītiādivacanehi saṃsandanato sadārapose doso tumhākaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:366_7: tena vuttaṃ ‘puttadārassa saṅgaho”’ti paravādinā vutte kiñcāpi sakavādī bahussuto na hoti,
tika-vin06t:366_8: atha kho rāgasahiteneva akusalena bhavitabbanti paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin06t:366_9: Sesesupi iminā nayena aññathāpi anurūpato yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:366_13: Tāni sakavādī attano suttādimhi otāretvā sace sameti gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:369_0: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana kiñcāpi yo panāti anavasesapariyādānapadaṃ,
tika-vin06t:369_1: tathāpi bhikkhūti iminā parapadena samānādhikaraṇattā tadanurūpānevassa vibhaṅgapadāni vuttāni.
tika-vin06t:369_3: abhikkhubhāvassa cāti yassa kassaci pabbajitassa sādhāraṇāni,
tika-vin06t:369_4: tathāpi “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:369_5: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:369_6: āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassā”ti evamādisuttaṃ nibbacanatthayuttova puggalo “āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassā”ti ettha vatthu,
tika-vin06t:369_8: Sabbassapi vinayapiṭakassa sādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇaṃ vatthuñhi bhagavā ārabhi.
tika-vin06t:369_9: Yo pana suddho eva samāno kenaci kāraṇena gihiliṅge ṭhito,
tika-vin06t:369_10: so attano sabhikkhubhāvattā eva vatthu hoti,
tika-vin06t:369_11: asuddhopi bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitattāti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:369_13: paccatthikehi vā rājabhayādikāraṇena vā kāsāvesu saussāhova apanītakāsāvo vatthu eva puna kāsāvaggahaṇena theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvānupagamanato,
tika-vin06t:369_15: Yo pana liṅgatthenako bhikkhunibbacanatthaṃ sayañca ajjhupagato,
tika-vin06t:369_17: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:369_18: āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassāti ayampi attho dassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:370_0: “Samaññāya bhikkhu paṭiññāya bhikkhū”ti vacanadvayaṃ yathāvuttañca atthaṃ upabrūheti,
tika-vin06t:370_1: antarā uppannāya niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā upacchinnakusalamūlo kevalāya samaññāya,
tika-vin06t:370_20: tasmā “imassa bhikkhukaraṇā kusalā dhammā saṃvijjantī”ti vā “suddhovāya”nti vā na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin06t:370_21: “Diṭṭhivipattipaccayā dve āpattiyo āpajjatī”ti vuttattā na sakkā “asuddho”ti vā “aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno”ti vā vattuṃ.
tika-vin06t:370_22: Esa hi ubhopi pakkhe na bhajati,
tika-vin06t:371_0: Kimatthaṃ panevaṃ mahāsāvajjāya niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā pārājikaṃ bhagavā na paññapesīti?
tika-vin06t:371_2: Pakatiyāpesā diṭṭhi nāma “sammā”ti vā “micchā”ti vā duviññeyyā,
tika-vin06t:371_4: Tattha pārājikāpattiyā paññattāya bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ asamadiṭṭhikaṃ pārājikaṃ maññamānā uposathādīni akatvā acireneva sāsanaṃ vināseyyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:371_5: sayañca apuññaṃ pasaveyyuṃ suddhesupi bhikkhūsu vippaṭipattiyā paṭipajjanena.
tika-vin06t:371_6: Tasmā upāyakusalatāya pārājikaṃ apaññāpetvā tassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ,
tika-vin06t:371_9: Bhagavā hi tassa ce esā diṭṭhi aniyatā,
tika-vin06t:371_10: sammāvattaṃ pūretvā osāraṇaṃ labhitvā pakatatto bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:371_13: yaṃ so niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko sammāvattaṃ pūretvā osāraṇaṃ labhitvā pakatatto bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:371_14: Kevalaṃ “samaññāyabhikkhu paṭiññāyabhikkhū”ti nāmamattadhārako hutvā paraṃ maraṇā ariṭṭho viya saṃsārakhāṇukova bhavissatīti imaṃ nayaṃ addasa.
tika-vin06t:372_3: Tattha hi ovādapaṭiggahaṇapañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā dvinnaṃ therānaṃ eva,
tika-vin06t:372_4: sesā tisso bhikkhunīnaṃ santakāti idha nādhippetā,
tika-vin06t:372_5: tissannampi upasampadānaṃ majjhe “bhadro bhikkhū”tiādīni cattāri padāni vuttāni tissannaṃ sādhāraṇattā.
tika-vin06t:372_6: Ehibhikkhubhāvena vā saraṇagamanañatticatutthena vā upasampanno hi bhadro ca sāro ca sekkho ca asekkho ca hoti,
tika-vin06t:373_0: Ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetoti ettha ca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbā ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampannā.
tika-vin06t:373_1: Na hi aññe ehibhikkhusaraṇagamanaovādapaṭiggahaṇapañhabyākaraṇāhi upasampannā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbā,
tika-vin06t:373_2: tenete paṭikkhipitvā “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū”ti antimova vuttoti kira dhammasiritthero,
tika-vin06t:373_4: “Dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā cā”ti ettakameva vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:373_6: Kiñca bhiyyo “dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti sāmaññena vuttattā ca,
tika-vin06t:373_8: Āyasmā sāriputto āvasathapiṇḍaṃ kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi,
tika-vin06t:373_9: cīvaravippavāsabhayā ca sabbaṃ ticīvaraṃ gahetvā nadiṃ taranto manaṃ vuḷho ahosi mahākassapo.
tika-vin06t:373_10: Kiñca saraṇagamanūpasampadāya upasampanne ārabbha saddhivihārikavattādīni asammāvattantānaṃ nesaṃ dukkaṭāni ca paññattāni dissanti,
tika-vin06t:373_12: Ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti paṭikkhittāya saraṇagamanūpasampadāya anuññātappasaṅgabhayāti upatissatthero,
tika-vin06t:373_13: āpattiyā bhabbataṃ sandhāya tasmimpi vutte pubbe paṭikkhittāpi sā puna evaṃ vadantena anuññātāti bhikkhūnaṃ micchāgāho vā vimati vā uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:373_15: taṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti iminā sameti.
tika-vin06t:374_1: padaniddesattā yattakāni tena padena saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin06t:374_2: ye ca vinayapiṭake tattha tattha sandissanti sayaṃ āpattāpajjanaṭṭhena vā duṭṭhullārocanapaṭicchādanādīsu paresaṃ āpattikaraṇaṭṭhena vā,
tika-vin06t:374_3: te sabbepi dassetvā idāni yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhu-
tika-vin06t:374_5: tassa vasena idaṃ vuttaṃ “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū”ti.
tika-vin06t:374_6: So eva hi kammavācānantarameva sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno hoti tato paṭṭhāya sauddesasikkhāpadānaṃ uppattidassanato,
tika-vin06t:374_9: Tasseva ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ sambhavati “ullumpatu maṃ, bhante,
tika-vin06t:374_12: vinayaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddesaṃ paccakkhāmītiādisikkhāpaccakkhānalakkhaṇapāripūrito cāti sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ upādāya so eva idhādhippetoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:375_1: tasmā “sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamantassa tato tato āpattito anāpatti,
tika-vin06t:375_5: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:375_6: tattha tattha tadajjhācāratthenāyameva ñatticatutthena upasampanno adhippeto nāmā”ti vattuṃ yujjatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:375_7: Evaṃ sante yaṃ vuttaṃ “yāya kāyaci upasampadāya ayaṃ imasmiṃ ‘methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā pārājiko hotī’ti atthe bhikkhūti adhippeto”ti,
tika-vin06t:375_11: Sace ñatticatutthena upasampanno eva idhādhippeto “bhikkhū”ti ca “upasampanno”ti ca,
tika-vin06t:375_12: tena na upasampanno anupasampanno nāmāti katvā ñatticatutthakammato aññathā upasampannā nāma mahākassapattherādayo
tika-vin06t:375_14: omasanādikāle ca dukkaṭameva janeyyunti evamādiko virodhadoso parihato hotīti sabbaṃ ācariyo vadati.
tika-vin06t:376_0: Yasmā te atimahanto jātimado cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:376_1: tasmā tumhehi mama sāsane evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:376_2: “Sātasahagatā paṭhamajjhānasukhasahagatā asubhe ca ānāpāne cā”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:376_9: Ñatticatutthenāti ettha kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin06t:376_10: tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñattitāsaṃ catutthāti katvā “ñatticatuttha”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:376_11: Byañjanānurūpameva aṭṭhakathāya “tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:376_12: atthapavattikkamena padena pana “ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:376_17: kammāni adhammakammaṃ vaggakamma”nti vacanato kuppakammampi katthaci “kamma”nti vuccati tasmā “akuppenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:377_4: na pubbapadaṃ iminā akuppasiddhitoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin06t:377_5: aṭṭhānārahena akuppena upasampanno imasmiṃ atthe anadhippetoti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin06t:377_6: Dvīhi panetehi ekato vuttehi ayamattho paññāyati “kevalaṃ tena akuppena upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto ‘bhikkhū’ti,
tika-vin06t:377_7: ṭhānārahena ca upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto ‘bhikkhū’ti,
tika-vin06t:377_9: Tenāyampi attho sādhito hoti “yo pana, bhikkhu,
tika-vin06t:377_11: so ca puggalo anupasampanno”ti vacanato yāva na ñāyati,
tika-vin06t:377_12: tāva samaññāyabhikkhupaṭiññāyabhikkhubhāvaṃ upagatopi na pubbe dassitasamaññāyabhikkhupaṭiññāyabhikkhu
tika-vin06t:377_13: viya aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā omasanapācittiyādivatthu hoti,
tika-vin06t:377_14: kevalaṃ anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “anupasampanne upasampannasaññī padaso dhammaṃ vāceti,
tika-vin06t:377_16: Akuppena upasampanno pana pacchā pārājikopi jātito upasampannaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti “paṇḍako,
tika-vin06t:377_19: upasampanno nāsetabbo”tiādinā nayena vuttesu pana vajjanīyapuggalesu koci puggalo “upasampanno”ti vuccati,
tika-vin06t:378_0: Ettha pana atthi kammaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ,
tika-vin06t:378_3: atthi nākuppaṃ na ca ṭhānārahanti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:378_6: Dutiyaṃ pariyāyena bhikkhunisaṅghato ekatoupasampannāya liṅgaparivatte sati labbhati.
tika-vin06t:378_7: Tassa hi puggalassa pubbe sikkhamānakāle laddhaṃ ñatticatutthaupasampadākammaṃ kiñcāpi akuppañceva ṭhānārahañca,
tika-vin06t:378_10: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampada”nti ettha apariyāpannattā tassa puggalassa kevalaṃ sāmaṇerabhāvāpattito kammaṃ dāni kuppaṃ jātanti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:378_11: Liṅgaparivattena cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ viya tassa puggalassa bhikkhunisaṅghena katāya upasampadāya vijahanaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:378_12: aññathā so puggalo upasampanno bhikkhūti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:378_13: Atha vā liṅgaparivatte asatipitaṃ ekatoupasampadākammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin06t:378_15: Tasmā na tāva sā “bhikkhunī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:378_16: Yasmā aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ āpajjitvāpi anāpajjitvāpi uppabbajitukāmatāya gihiliṅgaṃ sādiyantiyā punapi upasampadā ubhatosaṅghe labbhati,
tika-vin06t:378_19: Bhikkhunī pana gihiliṅgaṃ sādiyantikāle na purisaliṅgapātubhāve sati bhikkhūsu upasampadaṃ labbhatīti sādhakaṃ kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin06t:378_22: taṃ panāyuttaṃ bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhanābhāvatoti amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:378_24: tathā akate kuppatīti katvā karaṇaṃ satthusāsana”nti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:380_3: Sāvakabodhipaccekabodhisammāsambodhīti vā tīsu bodhīsu sammāsambodhiyaṃ sattā bodhisattā mahābodhisattā nāma.
tika-vin06t:380_9: Kiñcāpi paccekabuddhāpi dhammatāvasena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgatāva honti,
tika-vin06t:380_15: Samantabhadrakaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇattā imissā anupaññattiyā ariyapuggalā ca ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantīti sādhitametaṃ,
tika-vin06t:380_16: tasmā “na hi taṃ samāpanno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ asamatthaṃ viya dissatīti?
tika-vin06t:380_18: samatthameva yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sikkhāpade sāsā vicāraṇā,
tika-vin06t:380_20: Tathā hi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ udakukkhepasīmādhikāre “timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā
tika-vin06t:381_0: Yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:381_4: Na hi taṃsamāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti.
tika-vin06t:381_6: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:381_9: Aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ tāsampi tiṇṇaṃ lokiyānaṃ adhippetataṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:381_11: tissopi lokiyā sikkhā imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājike sambhavanti,
tika-vin06t:381_12: kālenāpi adhicittapaññālābhī bhikkhu tathārūpaṃ asappāyaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca tato tato adhicittato,
tika-vin06t:381_13: adhipaññāto ca āvattitvā sīlabhedaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati,
tika-vin06t:381_15: ayaṃ nayo itaresupi sabbesu adinnādānādīsu sacittakesu labbhati,
tika-vin06t:381_18: pātimokkhasīlassa ca saṅgāhakattā “sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāyā”ti imasmiṃ uttarapade paccakkhānārahā adhisīlasikkhāva
tika-vin06t:381_20: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:382_0: Ettha sikkhāti kāyavacīduccaritato viratī ca cetanā ca,
tika-vin06t:382_4: Cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ sikkhatīti adhikaraṇatthe bhummanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:382_7: tasmā suppaṭicchannādicārittesu virativippayuttacetanaṃ pavattentopi sikkhaṃ paripūrentotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin06t:382_8: “Sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”nti vuttamariyādaṃ avītikkamanto “tasmiñca sikkhāpade sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:382_9: Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “sikkhāti taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sikkhanabhāvena pavattacittuppādo.
tika-vin06t:382_12: Yasmā sikkhāya guṇasammatāya puññasammatāya tantiyā abhāvato lokassa dubbalyāvikammaṃ tattha na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:382_16: Āṇāya hi dubbalyaṃ sambhavatīti āyasmā upatisso.
tika-vin06t:384_2: Bhāvavikappākārenāti “ahaṃ assa”nti āgatattā yaṃ yaṃ bhavitukāmo,
tika-vin06t:386_8: ummattakassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātītiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:386_9: Ariyakena milakkhassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātītiādīhi pana puggalādiniyamepi sati vijānananiyamāsambhavaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin06t:386_11: tāyapi bhāsāya kālaniyamatthadīpane sati sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ ruhatīti no matī”ti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:386_12: Davāyātiādīhi khettādiniyame satipi cittaniyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:386_13: Sāvetukāmo na sāvetīti cittaniyamepi sati payoganiyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:386_15: viññussa na sāvetīti cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamepi sati yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti,
tika-vin06t:386_18: tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yadi ayameva jānātūti ekaṃ niyametvā āroceti,
tika-vin06t:386_24: appaccakkhā hoti sikkhāti cittādiniyameneva sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti,
tika-vin06t:386_27: dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti padassa padabhājanaṃ tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:386_30: Teneva vacībhedenāti tadatthadīpanamattaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva teneva vacībhedena jānāpetīti attho.
tika-vin06t:388_0: Dvinnampi niyametvāti ettha “dvīsupi jānantesu eva paccakkhāmīti adhippāyena vutte tesu eko ce jānāti,
tika-vin06t:388_1: na paccakkhātā hotī”ti aññatarasmimpi gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:388_3: “Gihī homī”ti vā “gihimhī”ti vā vutte kiñcāpi vattamānavacanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:388_4: “Dhārehī”ti atthābhāvā ca “dhārehī”ti vutte ca parassupari gacchati,
tika-vin06t:388_6: Sandiṭṭhikaṃ dhammanti sabbattha dhammavacanaṃ vuttaṃ yaṃ sandhāya “sandiṭṭhika”nti vadati,
tika-vin06t:388_8: Aññathā “vijitavijayaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vutte cakkavattiādīsupi tappasaṅgato buddhasaddopi avasāne vattabbo bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:388_9: Ācariyavevacanesu pana yo maṃ pabbājesītiādi upajjhaṃ aggahetvā,
tika-vin06t:388_10: paraṃ vā uddissa pabbajitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-vin06t:388_22: Akkharasamayānañhi nābhiññātāya vā karaṇānaṃ avisadatāya vā hoti ravābhaññaṃ.
tika-vin06t:391_5: Itthiyā nimittena attano nimittanti duviññeyyametaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:391_6: Attano nimittena itthiyā nimittaṃ suviññeyyattā na dassitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:391_7: Cattāri ṭhānāni muñcitvāti ettha abbhantaratalaṃ chupantaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:391_11: Naṭṭhakāyappasādanti ettha upahatindriyassa āpattisambhavato idhāpi āpattīti ce?
tika-vin06t:392_2: Kalalaparicayavāricāramacchaggahaṇena kiñcāpi samudde mahāmukhā hatthisarīrampi ekappahārena gilituṃ samatthā tato mahantatarā ca gahitā honti,
tika-vin06t:392_3: tesaṃ mukhādīsu methunadhammo na sambhavatīti tattha ṭhānaparicchedo natthīti eke,
tika-vin06t:392_7: “Paññattaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhatā nāmāti vuttattā
tika-vin06t:392_9: Na hi kassaci ūnamadhikaṃ vā atthī”ti tassa gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:394_0: Na saṅghabhinno na ca pana pakkhasaṅkanto;
tika-vin06t:397_1: Tadaṭṭhakathāya ca “ayaṃ pañhā nahāpitapubbakaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
tika-vin06t:397_8: evamaññopi anhāpitapubbako bhikkhu taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ sikkhati eva tadatthakosallatthanti katvā sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ samasikkhatā nāmāti.
tika-vin06t:397_12: Ito paṭṭhāya ye ca “tayo atthavase paṭicca vibhaṅgo pavattatī”ti pubbe vuttā,
tika-vin06t:399_1: Āpatti pārājikā assa hotīti ettha yasmā sā akusalā āpatti tassa bhikkhuno sīlasambhavaṃ abhibhavati,
tika-vin06t:399_2: rāgābhibhave tasmiṃ pārājikāti laddhanāmā pubbabhāge āpannā dukkaṭathullaccayādayo āpattiyo abhibhavitvā vināsetvā sayamevekā assa.
tika-vin06t:399_3: Vatthunā sabhāgāhi vā asabhāgāhi vā aññāhi pārājikattena samānajātikāhi āpattīhi sayaṃ nābhibhavīyatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:399_5: Yadā pana catassopi pārājikāpattiyo ekato honti,
tika-vin06t:399_6: tadā tā tassa bhikkhuno bhikkhubhāvaṃ abhibhavanti,
tika-vin06t:399_11: Dutiyena atthavikappena pārājikassa dhammassa patti sampatti āpattīti attho saṅgahito hotīti katvā āpattisampattivādīnaṃ saṅgahito hoti,
tika-vin06t:399_18: yadā ca sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya sāmaṇerādibhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin06t:399_19: Yadi evaṃ sikkhāya paccakkhātāya pārājikāpatti paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā cāti ubhayaṃ tassa ekato atthi,
tika-vin06t:399_29: sotāpattiphalassa vā arahattaphalassa vā lābhī assa,
tika-vin06t:399_31: Ukkhittako uppabbajito vā parivāsāraho mānattāraho uppabbajito vā sīlasampanno jhānalābhī assa,
tika-vin06t:399_36: mānattaṃ vā datvā abbhetabbo ukkhittako osāretabboti samāno ayaṃ upalabbhoti.
tika-vin06t:400_1: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ āpanno yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti sādiyati saṃvāsaṃ,
tika-vin06t:400_2: santarāyikattā uposathadivasādīsu gahaṭṭhassa viya sayameva sīlaṃ samādiyantassapi na sīlasamādānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin06t:400_4: So ce bhikkhubhāvaṃ na sādiyati na paṭijānāti saṃvāsaṃ na sādiyati,
tika-vin06t:400_5: kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āvikatvā rājavericorādibhayena kāsāvaṃ na pariccajati,
tika-vin06t:402_0: Tattha santī āpattīti sāvasesānavasesappabhedā sabbāpi āpatti āpannā adhippetā.
tika-vin06t:402_1: Evaṃ santepi pageva gahaṭṭhādibhūmiyaṃ ṭhito jhānādīnaṃ bhāgī assa suddhante ṭhitattā,
tika-vin06t:402_3: garudhammaṃ vā āpajjitvā avuṭṭhito sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gahaṭṭhādibhūmiyaṃ ṭhito,
tika-vin06t:402_4: na so jhānādīnaṃ bhāgīyeva bhavati na suddhante ṭhitattā,
tika-vin06t:402_6: teneva bhagavatā “so puna upasampanno osāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:402_7: tasmā tassa puggalassa te bhikkhukāle āpannā antarāyikā dhammā vippaṭisāraṃ janayitvā avippaṭisāramūlakānaṃ pāmojjādīnaṃ sambhavaṃ nivārenti,
tika-vin06t:402_11: Garukaṃ āpajjitvā bhikkhūnaṃ āvikatvā ce uppabbajito,
tika-vin06t:402_12: pakatatto hutvā uppabbajitoti katvā jhānādīnaṃ bhāgī assa “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:402_15: Tadanuvattanako pana taṃ laddhiṃ pahāya bhāgī assa. Na,
tika-vin06t:402_17: sagahaṭṭhāya parisāya sikkhāpaccakkhātakassa antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannakassa nisinnaparisāyāti ettha gahaṭṭho nāma pakatiyā gihiliṅge ṭhito.
tika-vin06t:402_19: So sakāsāvesu sāpekkhattā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ patthayamāno teneva liṅgena tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇero hoti.
tika-vin06t:402_20: Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi pacchā pubbe vuttakkamena asādiyitvā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ patthayamāno
tika-vin06t:402_21: sikkhāpaccakkhātako viya tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇero hoti,
tika-vin06t:402_22: na puna kāsāvaṃ paṭiggāhāpetabbo bhikkhūhi paṭhamaṃ dinnaliṅgeyeva ṭhitattā.
tika-vin06t:402_23: Yo pana pārājiko codiyamāno parājitvā “handa, bhante,
tika-vin06t:402_27: gihiliṅge ṭhapetvā puna kāsāyāni paṭiggāhāpetvā pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin06t:402_28: “Idaṃ pana sabbaṃ attano matiyā vuttattā vicāretvā gahetabba”nti ācariyo vadati.
tika-vin06t:402_29: Pavesanaṃ nāma aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa aṅgajātena samphusanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:402_30: Paviṭṭhaṃ nāma yāva mūlā pavesentassa vippakatakāle vāyāmakālo.
tika-vin06t:402_33: Gaṇṭhipade pana “vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:405_1: “Mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyita”nti vacanato amataṃ yebhuyyena khāyitampi pārājikavatthumevāti dasseti.
tika-vin06t:405_14: Pārājikakhette hi heṭṭhimakoṭiṃ pāpetvā ṭhapite tato paraṃ thullaccayanti paññattameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:405_15: Tattha thullaccayakhettampi pārājikakhettaṃ viya heṭṭhimaparicchedena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:405_18: paṇṇattivajjaṃ kiṃ sāvasesameva bhagavā paññāpetīti? Na.
tika-vin06t:405_19: Ekaṃsato pana yathāsambhavaṃ tattha tattha pakāsayissāma,
tika-vin06t:405_20: kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā upaḍḍhakkhāyite pārājikaṃ na paññāpesīti ayaṃ tāva apucchā buddhavisayattā vinayapaññattiyā.
tika-vin06t:405_22: Yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ nāma vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsapariyosānā khāditaṃ,
tika-vin06t:406_0: Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyitanti “jīvamānakasarīraṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:406_3: akuthite vā manussānaṃ jīvamānasarīre akkhināsādīsu thullaccayameva.
tika-vin06t:406_4: Tiracchānagatānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ nāsāya vatthikose ca thullaccayanti “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti,
tika-vin06t:406_5: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imāya pāḷiyā atthavisesenettha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:406_10: “Alaṃ bhagini netaṃ kappatī”ti iminā tāva methunarāgābhāvo dassito hoti. “Ehi, bhante,
tika-vin06t:406_12: so bhikkhu tathā akāsī”ti iminā tāva mocanassādo dassito hoti,
tika-vin06t:407_6: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato rattacittena akkhikaṇṇavaṇaṃ chupantassa dukkaṭanti siddhanti ayaṃ cammakkhandhake pāḷilesoti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:407_7: “Jīvamānakapurisassāti jīvamānakasaddo mate vattabbameva natthīti ñāpanatthaṃ vutto”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:407_8: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panāti idaṃ kiñcāpi “katvā mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ sarīra”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:407_9: atha kho sesaaṭṭhakathāsu “methunarāgena mukhenā”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva bhāvato taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷivacanena saṃsanditvā dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:407_10: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “taṃ sabbampīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva methunarāgena itthiyā nimittaṃ appavesento chupati,
tika-vin06t:407_21: purimaṃ pasaṃsantī”ti idaṃ saṅgītito pacchā sīhaḷadīpakehi ācariyehi pāḷiyā,
tika-vin06t:407_26: Tiracchānagatitthiyā passāvamagganti ettha mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi pubbe “nimitta”nti vatvā ettha “passāvamagga”nti
tika-vin06t:407_27: vuttattā avasesanimitte dukkaṭanti yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:407_29: Thullaccayanti ca khandhake passāvanimittavasenevāgatattā upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:410_1: Itthinimittaṃ khāṇuṃ katvāti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ vā katvā atirittaṃ vā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvā.
tika-vin06t:410_2: Īsakaṃ anto pavesetvā ṭhitaṃ khāṇumeva ce aṅgajātena chupati,
tika-vin06t:410_5: Suttaṃ bhikkhumhīti sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhiteti ettha viya.
tika-vin06t:414_8: yathayidaṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ viññattiyā abhāvepi “so ce sādiyati,
tika-vin06t:414_9: āpatti pārājikassā”ti hi vuttaṃ “na sādiyati anāpattī”ti ca.
tika-vin06t:414_10: Viññattisaṅkhātāpi kiriyā vinā sevanacittena na hoti cittajattā,
tika-vin06t:414_13: Tasmā kiriyāsaṅkhātamidaṃ viññattirūpaṃ itaraṃ cittajarūpaṃ viya janakacittena vinā na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin06t:414_15: tasmā kiriyāya sati ekantato tajjanakaṃ sevanacittaṃ atthiyevāti katvā na sādiyati anāpattīti na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:414_16: Yasmā viññattijanakampi samānaṃ sevanacittaṃ na sabbakālaṃ viññattiṃ janeti,
tika-vin06t:414_17: tasmā vināpi viññattiyā sayaṃ uppajjatīti katvā “sādiyati,
tika-vin06t:414_22: teneva bhagavā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti citteneva āpattiṃ paricchindati,
tika-vin06t:414_25: tāni eva āpattikarā dhammā nāmāti ca,
tika-vin06t:414_26: catūhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati kāyena vācāya kāyavācāhi kammavācāya āpajjatīti ca etāni suttapadāni avirodhitāni honti,
tika-vin06t:414_30: tato kammavācāya saddhiṃ āpattikarā dhammā sattāti āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:414_31: atha tatthāpi kāyādayo ekato vā nānāto vā labbhanti.
tika-vin06t:414_33: “tīhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti evaṃ virodhitāni honti.
tika-vin06t:414_43: na vinā “no ce kāyena vācāya paṭinissajjati,
tika-vin06t:414_45: Avisesena vā ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ kāyena āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:414_50: ekaccaṃ kammavācāya āpajjatīti ayamattho veditabboti evaṃ avirodhitāni honti.
tika-vin06t:415_1: kāyena āpajjatīti kāyena saviññattikena akattabbaṃ katvā ekaccaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:415_4: Akatampi hi loke “kata”nti vuccati “idaṃ dukkaṭaṃ mayā,
tika-vin06t:415_5: yaṃ mayā puññaṃ na kata”nti evamādīsu,
tika-vin06t:415_11: Tattha samuṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kattabbato vā akattabbato vā kāyādibhedāpekkhameva āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:415_17: yato vā kiriyā vā akiriyā vā hoti,
tika-vin06t:415_18: na taṃ avisesena āpattiyā aṅgaṃ vā anaṅgaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin06t:415_22: Idāni yena cittena sikkhāpadaṃ sacittakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:415_24: tena tassa avisesena sāvajjattā lokavajjabhāvova vuccati,
tika-vin06t:415_25: kintu sāvajjaṃyeva samānaṃ ekaccaṃ lokavajjaṃ ekaccaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti dassanatthaṃ lokavajjaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:415_27: tasmā manokammampi siyā āpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ kammaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:415_31: taṃ ekaccaṃ avedanampi saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpanno āpajjatīti katvā vedanāttikaṃ ettha na labbhatīti
tika-vin06t:415_33: Sikkhāpadañhi sacittakapuggalavasena “ticittaṃ tivedana”nti laddhavohāraṃ acittakenāpannampi “ticittaṃ tivedana”micceva vuccati.
tika-vin06t:415_34: Tatridaṃ suttaṃ “atthāpatti acittako āpajjati acittako vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin06t:416_6: Yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhatiyevāti kāyacittaṃ vācācittanti evaṃ.
tika-vin06t:416_7: Vināpi cittenāti ettha vināpi cittena sahāpi cittenāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:416_12: Tattha saviññattiko kāyo uppattiyā kammaṃ sādheti,
tika-vin06t:416_15: sikkhāpadanti “yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo”ti vacanato vītikkame yujjatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:416_17: Idampi na mayā paricchinnanti hasamāno passati yadā,
tika-vin06t:417_0: Ettha pana yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno…pe…
tika-vin06t:417_1: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto atthi koci pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso,
tika-vin06t:417_2: atthi koci na pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin06t:417_3: Dukkaṭathullaccayavatthūsu paṭisevanto atthi koci na pārājiko.
tika-vin06t:417_4: Pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakapakkhe methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto so pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ nāpajjatīti na pārājiko nāma.
tika-vin06t:417_5: Na hi abhikkhuno āpatti nāma atthi.
tika-vin06t:417_6: So anāpattikattā apaṇḍakapakkhe āgato kiṃ asaṃvāso hoti na hotīti? Hoti,
tika-vin06t:417_7: “abhabbo tena sarīrabandhanenā”ti hi vuttaṃ. “Yo pana, bhikkhu,
tika-vin06t:417_9: asaṃvāso”ti vuttattā yo pana bhikkhubhāvena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-vin06t:417_12: “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne yathā abhikkhunā kammavācāya sāvitāyapi kammaṃ ruhati kammavipattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin06t:417_19: Gahaṭṭho vā titthiyo vā paṇḍako vā anupasampannasaññī kammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-vin06t:417_23: upasampanno saṅghenā”ti hi vacanato saṅghena kammavācāya vattabbāya saṅghapariyāpannena,
tika-vin06t:417_24: saṅghapariyāpannasaññitena vā ekena vuttā saṅghena vuttāva hotīti veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:417_26: Tathā atthi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto koci nāsetabbo “yo bhikkhunīdūsako,
tika-vin06t:417_31: Abhikkhuniyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto na nāsetabbo “antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:417_37: kevalaṃ asaṃvāsoti katvā gaṇapūrako na hoti,
tika-vin06t:417_39: Samasikkhatāpi saṃvāsoti katvā so tena saddhiṃ natthīti padasodhammāpattiṃ pana janetīti kāraṇacchāyā dissati.
tika-vin06t:417_40: Yathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ekakammādino saṃvāsassa abhāvā bhikkhunī asaṃvāsā bhikkhussa,
tika-vin06t:417_43: Tathā “antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannopi ekacco yo nāsetabbo”ti avuttoti iminā nidassanena sā kāraṇacchāyā gahaṇaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:418_4: mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti ca vacanato yo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā anuvijjakena anuvijjiyamāno parājāpito,
tika-vin06t:418_12: atthapurekkhāratādīnaṃ abhāvoti imānettha cattāri aṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:418_13: tathāpi duṭṭhadosasikkhāpade “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin06t:418_14: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:418_15: āpatti omasavādassā”ti vacanato asuddhe upasampannasaññāya eva omasantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin06t:418_19: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin06t:418_20: āpatti omasavādassā”ti vacanato pana kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “tassa upasampannatā upasampannasaññitā”ti na vuttaṃ anekaṃsikattā tassa aṅgassāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:419_6: Sā hi yāva na liṅgaṃ pariccajati,
tika-vin06t:419_7: kāsāve saussāhāva samānā sāmaññā cavitukāmā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantīpi bhikkhunī eva sikkhāsājīvasamāpannāva.
tika-vin06t:419_11: Kadā ca pana sā abhikkhunī hotīti?
tika-vin06t:419_17: Sāmaññā cavitukāmā kāsāvesu anālayā kāsāvaṃ vā apaneti,
tika-vin06t:419_22: saliṅgeneva vā saddhiṃ titthiyesu pavisitvā kesaluñcanādivataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin06t:419_25: Tattha yā bhikkhuniliṅge ṭhitāva titthiyavataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin06t:419_26: sā titthiyapakkantako bhikkhu viya pacchā pabbajjampi na labhati,
tika-vin06t:419_32: sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti vacanato yā paṭhamaṃ vibbhamitvā pacchā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā,
tika-vin06t:419_33: sā āgatā upasampādetabbāti anuññātaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:419_34: Saṅgītiācariyehi pana “catuvīsati pārājikānī”ti vuttattā na puna sā upasampādetabbā,
tika-vin06t:421_2: Tesaṃ tesaṃ “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū”tiādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāṭekkaṃ nāmagaṇanaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin06t:421_3: uddharitvā ūnādhikadosasodhanaṭṭhena uddānā ca tā matrādisiddhigāthāhi chandovicitilakkhaṇena gāthā cāti
tika-vin06t:421_5: sodhane iti dhātussa rūpaṃ uddānāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:421_6: Imā pana uddānagāthā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi saṅgītikāle ṭhapitā,
tika-vin06t:421_9: “Vatthugāthā nāma ‘tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū’tiādīnaṃ imesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ nidānānī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:421_10: tasmā tattha vuttanayena vinītavatthūni eva “vatthugāthā”ti vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:421_19: asādiyantassā”ti anāpattidassanavasena vā yāni vatthūni vinītāni vinicchitāni,
tika-vin06t:421_21: Tesaṃ vinītavatthūnaṃ nidānavatthudīpikā tanti vatthugāthā nāma.
tika-vin06t:421_23: Tesaṃ “iminā lakkhaṇena āyatiṃ vinayadharā vinayaṃ vinicchinissantī”ti vacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:421_24: Na hi uddānagāthāyaṃ kiñcipi vinicchayalakkhaṇaṃ dissati,
tika-vin06t:421_25: uddānagāthānaṃ visuṃ payojanaṃ vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ vinayadharā uggaṇhissantī”ti,
tika-vin06t:421_31: Keci pana “gāthānaṃ vatthūnīti vattabbe vatthugāthāti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:421_34: Tattha kāraṇassa “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti vuttattā vajjiputtakāpi aññe eva.
tika-vin06t:421_36: idha te evā”ti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:422_7: tasmā uppalavaṇṇāti nāmaṃ labhī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:422_8: Nīluppalavaṇṇā kāyacchavīti vacanaṃ pana sāmacchaviṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:422_9: Loke pana “uppalasamā pasatthasāmā”ti vacanato “yā sāmā sāmavaṇṇā sāmatanumajjhā,
tika-vin06t:422_10: sā pāricariyā sagge mama vāso”ti vacanato sāmacchavikā itthīnaṃ pasatthā.
tika-vin06t:423_2: tañca kho purisindriyassa antaradhānena itthindriyassa pātubhāvena.
tika-vin06t:423_6: yathā ca kassaci paṇḍakassa vināpi purisindriyena purisasaṇṭhānaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin06t:423_9: purisindriyaṃ vā antaradhāyantaṃ marantānaṃ viya paṭilomakkamena sattarasamacittakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya antaradhāyati.
tika-vin06t:423_10: Paccuppanne indriye niruddhe itaraṃ visabhāgindriyaṃ pātubhavati.
tika-vin06t:423_11: Yasmā mahāniddaṃ okkantasseva kirassa visabhāgindriyaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-vin06t:423_15: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampada”nti vacanato pavattinīyeva upajjhāyā,
tika-vin06t:423_16: upasampadācariyā bhikkhunīyeva ācariyāti katvā tāsaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:423_17: ācariyavattañca iminā bhikkhunāsadāsāyaṃ pātaṃ bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:423_18: tāhi ca imassa vihāraṃ āgamma saddhivihārikavattādi kātabbaṃ nu khoti ce?
tika-vin06t:423_21: bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitu”nti vacanena vinābhāvadīpanato kevalaṃ na puna upajjhā gahetabbā,
tika-vin06t:423_25: Tattha bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitunti bhikkhūhi vinā hutvā bhikkhunīhi eva saddhiṃ samaṅgī bhavituṃ anujānāmīti attho,
tika-vin06t:423_26: tasmā iminā pāḷilesena “tassā eva gāmantarādīhi anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:423_30: Na hi bhagavā āpattiyaṃ niyojetīti yuttameva taṃ,
tika-vin06t:423_32: tāhi āpattīhi anāpattī”ti pāḷivacanato na gāmantarādīhi anāpattīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:423_33: Sādhāraṇatā āpattiyeva “yā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā,
tika-vin06t:423_35: tāhi āpattīhi anāpattī”ti na vuttattāti ce?
tika-vin06t:423_37: Bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṅkantāyapi tassā tā pahāya aññāhi saṅgamantiyā gāmantarādīhi anāpatti eva sabbakālanti
tika-vin06t:423_38: imassa aniṭṭhappasaṅgato tathā na vuttanti attho.
tika-vin06t:423_39: Tattha gāmantarāpattādivatthuṃ sañcicca tasmiṃ kāle ajjhācarantīpi sā liṅgapātubhāvena kāraṇena anāpajjanato anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:423_41: Tathā yogī anuppanne eva kilese nirodheti.
tika-vin06t:423_43: sabbaso vā pana na sāveti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā,
tika-vin06t:423_44: evamidha anāpannāpi āpatti vuṭṭhitā nāma hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:424_0: Yasmā pana sā purisena sahaseyyāpattiṃ anāpajjantīpi sakkoti bhikkhunīhi saṅgamituṃ,
tika-vin06t:424_1: tasmā anāpattīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:424_2: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “aparehipi catūhākārehi āpattiṃ āpajjati saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalassa santike liṅgapātubhāvenā”ti.
tika-vin06t:424_3: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ parivāre “atthāpatti āpajjanto vuṭṭhāti vuṭṭhahanto āpajjatī”ti,
tika-vin06t:424_7: vihārato paṭṭhāya gāmaṃ pavisantiyā gāmantaraṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin06t:424_10: “Paripuṇṇavassasāmaṇerenāpī”ti vacanato aparipuṇṇavassassa upajjhāyaggahaṇaṃ natthīti viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:424_15: bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhiṃ bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:424_16: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti vatthuṃ anapekkhavissajjanena vā paṭiggahaṇena vā puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmīti.
tika-vin06t:424_17: Pakkhamānattakāle punadeva liṅgaṃ parivattati chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbanti sace,
tika-vin06t:425_0: Parivāsadānaṃ pana natthīti bhikkhuniyā chādanāsambhavato vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:425_1: Sace bhikkhunī asādhāraṇaṃ pārājikāpattiṃ āpajjitvā purisaliṅgaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-vin06t:425_4: anupabbajitvā bhikkhubhāve ṭhito sahaseyyāpattiṃ na janeti.
tika-vin06t:425_5: Vibbhantāya bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅge pātubhūte bhikkhūsu upasampadaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin06t:425_7: Avibbhantamānassa gahaṭṭhasseva sato bhikkhunīdūsakassa sace itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-vin06t:425_9: na puna liṅgaparivatte jāte bhikkhūsu vāti.
tika-vin06t:425_11: so ce sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya vibbhamitvā itthiliṅgaṃ paṭilabheyya,
tika-vin06t:425_12: bhikkhunīsu upasampadaṃ paṭilabhati ubhayattha pubbe pārājikabhāvaṃ appattattā.
tika-vin06t:425_13: Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā purisaliṅgaṃ paṭilabheyya,
tika-vin06t:425_15: Puna sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya āgato na upasampādetabbo aparipuṇṇavīsativassattā.
tika-vin06t:425_16: Puna liṅgaparivatte sati bhikkhunīsu upasampadaṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:425_17: Evaṃ ce katadvādasasaṅgahassa dārakassa liṅgaparivatte sati gihigatā itthī hoti,
tika-vin06t:425_21: na sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi nāsetabbā bhikkhu vā bhikkhūhi puna pakatibhāvāpattisambhavā.
tika-vin06t:425_28: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampadaṃ tāniyeva vassāni bhikkhunīhi saṅgamitu”nti ayaṃ vidhi sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:425_32: tā āpattiyo bhikkhunīnaṃ santike vuṭṭhātuṃ asādhāraṇāhi anāpattīti ayampi vidhi sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:425_33: Yaṃ vuttaṃ parivāre “saha paṭilābhena purimaṃ jahati,
tika-vin06t:425_40: taṃ yathāvuttavidhiṃ sandhāya vuttanti amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:425_42: purisaliṅgaṃ vā antaradhāyantaṃ kiṃ sakalampi sarīraṃ gahetvā antaradhāyati,
tika-vin06t:425_45: yadi tāva sakalaṃ sarīraṃ gahetvā antaradhāyati,
tika-vin06t:425_51: Itthindriyādīni hi sakalampi sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitānīti khaṇanirodho viya tesaṃ antaradhānaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:425_53: Aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhappabhānaṃ dīpānaṃ ekappabhānirodhepi itarissā ṭhānaṃ viya sesasarīraṭṭhānaṃ tattha hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:426_1: Muccatu vā mā vā dukkaṭamevāti mocanarāgābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:426_2: Avisayoti asādiyanaṃ nāma evarūpe ṭhāne dukkaranti attho.
tika-vin06t:426_3: Methunadhammo nāma ubhinnaṃ vāyāmena nipajjati “tassa dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:426_7: “āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājika”nti vacanato akiriyampetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ yebhuyyena “kiriya”nti vuccatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:427_1: “Pārājikabhayena ākāsagatameva katvā pavesanādīni karontassa sahasā tālukaṃ vā passaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ chupati ce,
tika-vin06t:427_5: Dantānaṃ bāhirabhāvo oṭṭhānaṃ bāhirabhāvo viya thullaccayavatthu hotīti vuttaṃ “bahi nikkhantadante jivhāya ca thullaccaya”nti.
tika-vin06t:427_6: Taṃ puggalaṃ visaññiṃ katvāti vacanena so puggalo khittacitto nāma hotīti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:427_8: so ce attano aṅgajātassa dhātughaṭṭanacariṇijjhiṇikādisaññāya sādiyati,
tika-vin06t:427_9: methunasaññāya abhāvato visaññīpakkhameva bhajatīti tassa anāpatticchāyā dissati.
tika-vin06t:427_10: “Methunametaṃ maññe kassaci amanussassā”ti ñatvā sādiyantassa āpatti eva.
tika-vin06t:427_11: Paṇḍakassa methunadhammanti paṇḍakassa vaccamagge vā mukhe vā,
tika-vin06t:427_13: Avedayantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti santhateneva sevane viya.
tika-vin06t:428_2: Tattha “ārocesu”nti vuttapāṭho “vediyi vā so bhikkhave”ti vuttattā sundaraṃ,
tika-vin06t:428_8: tasmā yāva sīsaṃ na pāpuṇāti puggalo,
tika-vin06t:428_11: “Sīsaṃ na pāpuṇātīti pārājikaṃ na hoti tāva pubbapayogadukkaṭe tiṭṭhatī”ti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:428_13: Daṭṭhena daṃsena khādanenāti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_1: Saṅgāmasīse yuddhamukhe yodhapuriso viyāyaṃ bhikkhūti “saṅgāmasīsayodho bhikkhū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:429_3: ekena vā bahūhi vā kaṇṭakehi thakitabbaṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_8: Ayañhettha saṅkhepoti idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_9: “Kiñci karontā nisinnā hontīti vuttattā nipannānaṃ āpucchanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:429_14: “Rattiṃ dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin06t:429_16: mahāpaccariyaṃ visesetvā “anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī”ti vuttattā ca,
tika-vin06t:429_19: tassa āpattiyevāti ettha na anādariyadukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_20: Yathāparicchedamevāti avadhāraṇattā paricchedato abbhantare na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:429_21: Puna “supatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya sanniṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:429_22: Evaṃ nipajjantoti nipajjanakāle āpajjitabbadukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:429_23: tasmā yathāparicchedena uṭṭhahantassa dve dukkaṭānīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin06t:429_24: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyampi “yadi rattiṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipanno ‘divā vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti,
tika-vin06t:429_26: etthāpi “nipanno”ti vuttattā “aruṇe uṭṭhite uṭṭhāhī”ti na vuttattā ca jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:430_0: Yasmā yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūto viya khittacitto nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:430_3: tasmā “yakkhagahitako viya visaññībhūtopi na muccatī”ti yaṃ mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:430_4: taṃ pubbe sañcicca divā nipanno pacchā yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūtopi na muccati nipajjanapayogakkhaṇe eva āpannattāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:430_6: sopi yāva sayameva sayanādhippāyo na hoti,
tika-vin06t:430_8: Yadā kilanto hutvā niddāyitukāmatāya sayanādhippāyo hoti,
tika-vin06t:430_10: jaggāpetvā vā ābhogaṃ vā katvā niddāyitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:430_15: Cirampi adhivāsetvā pacchā vedanāṭṭo hutvā anābhogeneva sayati,
tika-vin06t:430_17: tassāpi avisayattā āpatti na dissatīti visaññībhāveneva supantassa “anāpatti khittacittassā”ti vacanena na dissati.
tika-vin06t:430_18: Ācariyā pana evaṃ na kathayantīti avisesena “na dissatī”ti na kathayanti,
tika-vin06t:430_21: sace saññaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi kilantakāyattā sayanaṃ sādiyanto supati,
tika-vin06t:431_5: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ vinicchayānaṃ ayameva adhippāyoti no khantīti ācariyo,
tika-vin06t:431_6: anugaṇṭhipade pana yakkhagahitakopi visaññībhūtopi na muccati nāma,
tika-vin06t:431_7: pārājikaṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbo so antarantarā saññāpaṭilābhatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:431_8: “Bandhitvā nipajjāpito vā”ti kurundīvacanena ekabhaṅgena nipannopi na muccatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:431_17: Mahāpadumattheravāde “pārājikaṃ āpajjituṃ abhabbo yakkhagahitako nāmā”ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:431_18: tattha ācariyā pana evaṃ vadanti “sace okkantaniddo ajānantopi pāde mañcakaṃ āropeti,
tika-vin06t:431_19: āpattiyevāti vuttattā yo pana patitvā tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin06t:431_20: tassa āpatti antarantarā jānantassāpi ajānantassāpi hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:431_21: Sabbaṭṭhakathāsu vuttavacanāni sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “idha ko muccati ko na muccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:431_22: Yakkhagahitako vā visaññībhūto vā na kevalaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbo eva,
tika-vin06t:431_24: Evaṃ “bandhitvā nipajjāpitova muccatī”ti vacanena tassapi avasavattattā “āpatti na dissatī”ti evaṃ na kathayanti.
tika-vin06t:431_27: Idaṃ kira sabbaṃ na saṅgītiṃ āruḷhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:431_31: tadā sukhumāpi viññatti hoti evāti idha kiriyā evā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:435_1: Dutiye rājūhi eva pariggahitattā “rājagaha”nti laddhanāmake samīpatthena,
tika-vin06t:435_2: adhikaraṇatthena ca paṭiladdhabhummavibhattike gijjhakūṭe pabbate catūhi vihārehi viharantoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:435_4: Tayo eva hi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:435_5: na tato ūnā adhikā vā akiriyattā.
tika-vin06t:435_6: Tattha vinayapariyāyena saṅghagaṇapuggalakammakosallatthaṃ idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin06t:435_9: taṃ apalokanakammassa kammalakkhaṇekadesaṃ ṭhapetvā itaraṃ catubbidhampi kammaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:435_14: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yasmiṃ vihāre dve tayo janā vasanti,
tika-vin06t:435_16: Yasmiṃ pana vihāre eko bhikkhu hoti,
tika-vin06t:435_17: tena bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi katikavattaṃ saṅghena katasadisameva hotī”ti.
tika-vin06t:435_18: Punapi vuttaṃ “ekabhikkhuke pana vihāre ekena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhati evā”ti.
tika-vin06t:435_22: taṃ tayo pārisuddhiuposathā aññesaṃ santike karīyanti,
tika-vin06t:435_33: tattha añattikaṃ dve eva karonti, na tayo.
tika-vin06t:435_36: tena vuttaṃ “tayo eva hi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:435_37: na tato ūnā adhikā vā akiriyattā”ti.
tika-vin06t:435_41: atha kho tehi kataṃ saṅghena katasadisanti vuttattā ekena pariyāyena tayo janā vinayapariyāyenapi saṅgho”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:435_43: lābhaṃ pana upādāya antamaso ekopi anupasampannopi “saṅgho”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati kira.
tika-vin06t:435_47: Aññathā antarāyena apavāritā “vutthavassā”ti na vuccantīti āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:435_49: Keci tanukaṃ dārutthambhaṃ antokatvā mattikāmayaṃ thambhaṃ karonti,
tika-vin06t:436_1: “Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjī”ti iminā anuddesasikkhāpadena yattha iṭṭhakapacana pattapacana
tika-vin06t:436_2: kuṭikaraṇa vihārakārāpana navakammakaraṇa khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇa vihārasammajjana paṭaggidāna kūpapokkharaṇīkhaṇāpanādīsu
tika-vin06t:436_3: pātabyataṃ jānantena bhikkhunā kappiyavacanampi na vattabbanti dasseti,
tika-vin06t:436_4: teneva pariyāyaṃ avatvā tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ anāpattivāresu “anāpatti asatiyā ajānantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:436_8: kuṭikaṃ bhindathā”ti iminā kataṃ labhitvā tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭamevāti ca siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:436_10: Esa nayo bhedanakaṃ chedanakaṃ uddālanakanti etthāpi,
tika-vin06t:436_12: Tato eva hi bhedanakasikkhāpadādīsu viya “aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:436_17: aññathā kuṭikārasikkhāpadādīsu viya “aññassatthāya vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā sabbattha,
tika-vin06t:436_20: Sabbamattikāmayabhāvaṃ pana mocetvā kaṭṭhapāsāṇādimissaṃ katvā paribhuñjati, anāpatti.
tika-vin06t:436_21: Tathā hi chedanakasikkhāpadādīsu bhagavatā nayo dinno “aññena kataṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ paṭilabhitvā chinditvā paribhuñjatī”tiādīsu.
tika-vin06t:436_22: Keci pana “vayakammampīti etena mūlaṃ datvā kārāpitampi atthi,
tika-vin06t:436_23: tena taṃ aññena katampi na vaṭṭatīti siddha”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:436_27: Iṭṭhakāhi giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepena katā vaṭṭatīti ettha pakatiiṭṭhakāhi cinitvā kattabbāvasatho giñjakāvasatho nāma.
tika-vin06t:436_30: tasmā thusagomayatiṇapalālamissā mattikāmayāpi apakkiṭṭhakamayāpi “sabbamattikāmayā”tveva vuccatīti no khantīti ācariyo,
tika-vin06t:436_33: na ca āyasmā dhaniyo ekappahāreneva kumbhakāro viya kumbhaṃ taṃ kuṭikaṃ niṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin06t:436_34: anukkamena pana sukkhāpetvā sukkhāpetvā mattikāpiṇḍehi cinitvā niṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin06t:436_35: apakkiṭṭhakamayā kuṭi viya sabbamattikāmayā kuṭi ekābaddhā hoti,
tika-vin06t:436_38: Sabbamattikāmayāya kuṭiyā bahi ce tiṇakuṭikādiṃ katvā anto vasati,
tika-vin06t:436_40: Sace tattha tattha chiddaṃ katvā bandhitvā ekābaddhaṃ karoti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:436_41: Anto ce tiṇakuṭikādiṃ katvā anto vasati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:436_45: Sace anto vā bahi vā ubhayattha vā sudhāya limpati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:436_47: tasmā tattha ṭhapitaṃ pattacīvarādi aguttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:438_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhārenti,
tika-vin06t:438_1: uccāvacāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhārentī”ti evamādīni vatthūni nissāya “na,
tika-vin06t:438_5: āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā nayena akappiyaparikkhāresu ca dukkaṭaṃ paññattaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:438_14: savikāraṃ vā karontassa āpatti dukkaṭanti dīpentena “na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:438_18: ṭhapetvā āsandiṃ pallaṅkaṃ dārupattaṃ dārupādukaṃ sabbaṃ dārubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin06t:438_19: ṭhapetvā katakañca kumbhakārikañca sabbaṃ mattikābhaṇḍa”nti vuttattā yathāṭhapitaṃ vajjetvā itaraṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin06t:438_22: tasmā “ṭhapetvā paharaṇi”nti evaṃ jātivasena ayaṃ pāḷi pavattā,
tika-vin06t:438_23: yathādassitā pāḷi vaṇṇamaṭṭhādivikārapaṭisedhanavasena pavattāti evaṃ ubhayampi na virujjhati,
tika-vin06t:439_9: Yaṃ ettha cīvaraṃ vā patto vā “na vaṭṭatī”ti vutto,
tika-vin06t:439_15: Kuñcikāya senāsanaparikkhārattā suvaṇṇarūpiyamayāpi vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati,
tika-vin06t:439_16: “kuñcikāya vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato aññe kappiyalohādimayāva kuñcikā kappanti pariharaṇīyaparikkhārattā.
tika-vin06t:439_21: atha kho “uccāvacāni na dhāretabbānī”ti paṭikkhepābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:439_25: Gaṇṭhipade pana “telabhājanesu vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ vaṭṭatīti senāsanaparikkhārattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:439_30: tattha parehi na kattabba”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:439_33: Yesaṃ pana aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ sīmā katā,
tika-vin06t:439_35: “Saṅghabhedādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ‘mā karothā’ti paṭisedhetabbā evā”ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin06t:440_4: Āṇāpehīti vacanaṃ aniṭṭhe eva vuccatīti katvā bandhaṃ āṇāpesi.
tika-vin06t:441_3: mā punapi evarūpamakāsīti idaṃ kiṃ byāpādadīpakaṃ,
tika-vin06t:441_4: dārūsupi lobhakkhandhadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ sotāpannassa sato tassa rājassa patirūpaṃ.
tika-vin06t:441_6: vadeyyātha punapi yenattho”ti pavāretvā atīva pītipāmojjaṃ uppādetabbaṃ tena siyāti?
tika-vin06t:441_7: Saccametaṃ sotāpannattā atīva buddhamāmako dhammamāmako saṅghamāmako ca,
tika-vin06t:441_9: sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ca okāsaṃ kattukāmo “supayuttāni me dārūnī”ti tuṭṭhacittopi evamāhāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:441_12: ito thokatarehi vā āgatakāle tadanurūpā yojanā kātabbā”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:441_15: tasmā tattha tattha āgatapadānurūpena yojanā veditabbā”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:442_1: Bārāṇasinagarādīsu tehi tehi rājūhi porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ lakkhaṇasampannā uppāditā nīlakahāpaṇā.
tika-vin06t:442_7: Tasmā tassa kahāpaṇassa catutthabhāgo pañcamāsako viya atirekapañcamāsako vā ūnapañcamāsako vā pādoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:442_8: Imassatthassa dīpanatthaṃ “tadā rājagahe vīsatimāsako kahāpaṇo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:442_9: Tattha rajatamayo suvaṇṇamayo tambamayo ca kahāpaṇo hoti.
tika-vin06t:442_10: Suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ viya pādopi yattha tambamayova kato hoti,
tika-vin06t:442_13: tasmā tassa pādassa catutthabhāgova siyā pādoti eke.
tika-vin06t:442_19: Na hi sabbattha bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā nīlakahāpaṇagghena agghāpenti.
tika-vin06t:442_21: tasmā tassa tassa janapadassa pādova pādoti tadagghanakameva pādagghanakanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:442_23: na itaresanti yattha pana nīlakahāpaṇā vaḷañjaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin06t:444_1: Gāmā vā araññā vāti lakkhaṇānupaññattikattā paṭhamapaññattiyā ādimhi vuttā.
tika-vin06t:444_5: gāmappavesanañca anāpucchā pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:444_7: taṃ gāmaṃ evaṃ pavisituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti eke.
tika-vin06t:444_8: Keci pana “yakkhapariggahabhūtopi āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu eva ‘gāmo’ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin06t:444_10: “Gāmo eva upacāro gāmūpacāroti evaṃ kammadhārayavasena gahite kurundaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttampi suvuttameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:444_12: “Gāmassupacāro ca gāmo ca gāmūpacāro cā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:444_14: “Imesaṃ lābhādīsu lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘gharaṃ gharūpacāro’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:444_15: taṃ na mayaṃ paṭikkhipāmā”ti ca vadanti.
tika-vin06t:444_16: “Kataparikkhepo cāti gharassa samantato tattako upacāro nāmā”ti gaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:444_17: Anugaṇṭhipade pana “yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccatīti ito anāgataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, nātītaṃ.
tika-vin06t:444_20: tasmā anāgatameva sandhāya vuttanti ācariyā kathayantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:445_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tassa gāmūpacārassa gahaṇe ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin06t:445_1: Vikālegāmappavesanādīsūti ettha “gāmappavesanañhi bahi eva āpucchitabba”nti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:445_3: “Gāmasaṅkhātūpacāraṃ sandhāya vutta”nti gahite sametīti mama takko. “Ādi-
tika-vin06t:445_4: saddato ghare ṭhitānaṃ dinnalābhabhājanādīnī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:445_5: “Gāmūpacāre ṭhitānaṃ pāpuṇitabbalābhaṃ sañcicca adentānaṃ pārājika”nti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:445_6: Kiñcāpi kurundiādīsu pāḷiyaṃ vuttavacanānulomavasena vuttattā “pamādalekhā”ti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:445_11: So hi tato aparena leḍḍupātena paracchinno.
tika-vin06t:445_12: Imasmiṃ adinnādānasikkhāpadeti niyamena aññattha aññathāti atthato vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:445_13: Tena vā niyamena yathārutavasenāpi attho idha yujjati.
tika-vin06t:446_0: “Pariccāgādimhi akate ‘idaṃ mama santaka’nti aviditampi parapariggahitameva puttakānaṃ pitu accayena santakaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:446_1: taṃ atthato apariccatte saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:446_7: tasmā “theyyasaṅkhāta”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto”ti padabhājanampi tesaṃ porāṇānaṃ yujjateva,
tika-vin06t:446_13: tesu ayameveko pacchimo cittakoṭṭhāso idha adhippeto ‘theno’ti apare”ti anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:448_2: Ākulā duviññeyyavinicchayāti ācariyānaṃ mukhe santike sabbākārena aggahitavinicchayānaṃ duviññeyyā.
tika-vin06t:448_4: kevalaṃ taṃ ācariyā pubbāparavirodhamakatvā saṅgītito paṭṭhāya āgatanayamavināsetvā vaṇṇayantīti “paṭṭhānapāḷimivāti apare vadantī”ti ca vuttā.
tika-vin06t:448_12: tāni sīhaḷadīpe ācariyehi saṅghādīnamanumatiyā aṭṭhakathāsu pakkhittāni,
tika-vin06t:450_1: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saccepi alikepi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:450_2: taṃ pamādalikhitanti veditabbanti yathetarahi yuttiyā gahetabbā.
tika-vin06t:450_3: Tattha “catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadapavāraṇaabbhānādisabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati”cceva vattabbe
tika-vin06t:450_11: Pamādalikhitanti ettha idha adhippetameva gahetvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti gahite sameti viya.
tika-vin06t:450_12: Ācariyā pana “pācittiyaṭṭhāne pācittiya”nti vatvā dukkaṭe visuṃ vattabbe “saccālike”ti sāmaññato vuttattā “pamādalekhā”ti vadantīti veditabbāti.
tika-vin06t:450_13: “Kusalacittena gamane anāpattī”ti vuttattā “dānañca dassāmī”ti vacanena anāpatti viya.
tika-vin06t:451_0: Pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccatīti pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭamāpajjati.
tika-vin06t:451_1: Bahukāpi āpattiyo hontūti khaṇanabyūhanuddharaṇesu dasa dasa katvā āpattiyo āpanno,
tika-vin06t:451_2: tesu uddharaṇe dasa pācittiyo desetvā muccati,
tika-vin06t:451_8: evaṃ aññesupi evarūpāni aṭṭhakathāya āgatavacanāni saṅgītito paṭṭhāya āgatattā gahetabbānīti attho.
tika-vin06t:451_13: “visabhāgakiriyaṃ vā patvā purimaṃ paṭippassambhatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:452_0: Evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā ṭhānācāvanañcettha chahākārehi veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:452_3: pārājikanti ettha mukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhokāsaṃ bundena mocite “ṭhānācāvanañcettha chahākārehi veditabba”nti iminā sameti,
tika-vin06t:452_4: tathā avatvā “bhūmito mutte kesaggamattampi atikkante bhūmito mocitaṃ nāma hotī”ti daḷhaṃ katvā vadanti,
tika-vin06t:452_6: Ettha ekacce evaṃ atthaṃ vadanti “pubbe khaṇantena avasesaṭṭhānāni viyojitāni,
tika-vin06t:452_8: Saṅkhepamahāpaccariyādīsu vuttavacanassa pamādalekhabhāvo “attano bhājanagataṃ vā karoti,
tika-vin06t:453_1: taṃ yathetarahi “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā uppannārammaṇā”ti padassa “uppannavatthukāhi anāgatapaṭikkhepo”ti
tika-vin06t:453_6: Yaṃ pana ācariyā “idaṃ pamādalikhita”nti apanetvā paṭikkhipitvā vacanakāle vācenti,
tika-vin06t:454_0: Anāpattimattameva vuttanti neva avahāro na gīvā anāpattīti byañjanatova bhedo,
tika-vin06t:454_6: “Na hi tadeva bahūsu ṭhānesu yuttato pārājikamahutvā katthaci hotī”ti sabbaṃ anugaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_7: Duṭṭhapitaṃ vā ṭhapetīti ettha tato paggharissatīti ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya katattā pārājikaṃ taṃ pana
tika-vin06t:454_8: gaṇhatu vā mā vā tattheva “bhindatī”tiādivacanato veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_9: “Tatthevāti ṭhānācāvanaṃ akarontova ṭhānā acāvetukāmova kevalaṃ ‘bhindatī’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca ñāpetabba”nti aññatarasmiṃ gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_10: Tathā “paggharitehi tintapaṃsuṃ gahetvā udake pakkhipitvā pacitvā gahetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin06t:454_16: tadā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti atthasādhako āṇattikāle eva pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin06t:454_17: Apica āvāṭakādīni thāvarapayogāni ca ettha sādhakāni.
tika-vin06t:454_18: Natthi kālakatapayogāni pārājikavatthūnīti tasmā upaparikkhitabbanti eke.
tika-vin06t:454_20: tattha tattha suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:454_24: Evameke vadantīti taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:454_25: “Passāvaṃ vā chaḍḍetī”ti ca “aparibhogaṃ vā karotī”ti ca atthato ekattā,
tika-vin06t:455_0: Ayaṃ panettha sārotiādikathāya “amhākaṃ ācariyassa vacana”nti dhammasiritthero āha.
tika-vin06t:455_3: tasmā vohāravasenāti achaḍḍetukāmampi tathā karontaṃ “chaḍḍetī”ti voharanti.
tika-vin06t:455_4: Evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho gahetabboti evaṃ sante “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena ativiya sameti,
tika-vin06t:455_5: tattha ṭhānācāvanacittassa natthitāya ṭhānā cutampi na “ṭhānā cuta”nti vuccatīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:455_6: Itarathāpīti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassapi dukkaṭaṃ yujjati.
