tika-vin06t:2081_12: Ettha pana ekaccesu gatesupi sabbesu gatesupi sabbe sannipātāpetvā ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā kevalaṃ pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2081_13: Ekacce sannipātāpetvā pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭati “saṅghaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin06t:2081_15: Sabbepi hi sannipatitā pacchā diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā parisaṅkitaṃ vā vattāro honti.
tika-vin06t:2081_16: Anāgatānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ekaccānaṃ santike pavāraṇāvacanaṃ viya hoti.
tika-vin06t:2081_17: Sammukhībhūte cattāro sannipātāpetvā nissaggiyaṃ āpannacīvarādinissajjanaṃ viya pavāraṇā na hoti sabbāyattattā.
tika-vin06t:2081_19: “Ito aññathā na vaṭṭati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ananuññātattā”ti upatissatthero vadati.
tika-vin06t:2081_20: “Thokatarehi tesaṃ santike pavāretabbaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2081_21: Āgantukā nāma navamito paṭṭhāyāgatā vā vajasatthanāvāsu vutthavassā vā honti.
tika-vin06t:2082_0: 237. “Dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi hoti tathāgatotiādī”ti likhitaṃ. “Natthi dinnantiādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_3: Tattha “gāmānaṃ asītiyā sahassesū”ti vattabbe “asītiyā gāmasahassesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2087_13: Tato pana bhagavato gandhakuṭiyā kavāṭaṃ subaddhaṃ passitvā icchitākārakusalatāya iddhiyā gantvā kuṭiṃ pavisitvā ārocesi.
tika-vin06t:2087_16: Bhagavato sambahulehi saddhiṃ āhiṇḍanaṃ āyasmato soṇassa vīriyārambhanidassanena anāraddhavīriyānaṃ uttejanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2087_17: evaṃ sukhumālānaṃ pādarakkhaṇatthaṃ upāhanā anuññātāti dassanatthañca.
tika-vin06t:2089_0: 243. Tattha ca nimittaṃ gaṇhāhīti tesaṃ indriyānaṃ ākāraṃ upalakkhehi.
tika-vin06t:2090_1: Adhimutto hotīti paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhito hoti.
tika-vin06t:2090_4: “Tañhi sabbakilesehi nikkhantattā ‘nekkhamma’nti ca gehato pavivittattā ‘paviveko’ti ca byāpajjābhāvato
tika-vin06t:2090_5: ‘abyāpajja’nti ca arahattaṃ upādānassa khayante uppannattā ‘upādānakkhayo’ti ca taṇhāya khayante uppannattā
tika-vin06t:2092_2: “Khallakādīni apanetvā’ti vuttattā dve tīṇi chiddāni katvā vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadantānaṃ vādo na gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2097_3: Kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2097_4: atha kho vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbato idha vuttanayenevettha attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2097_5: “Tattha pana suttantikadesanāya gahaṭṭhādīnampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ṭhapetvā ‘tūlikaṃ…pe…
tika-vin06t:2097_6: vaṭṭantī’ti vuttaṃ viya khāyatīti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2098_4: Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti yena pariyāyena cammaṃ vaṭṭissati,
tika-vin06t:2098_12: sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇānī”ti ettha anumatippasaṅgabhayā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2102_1: “Yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā”ti parato “tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kissā hontī”tiādinā virodhadassanato
tika-vin06t:2102_5: Sabbabuddhakālepi hi sappiādīnaṃ sattāhakālikabhāvāpekkhāti tathā vacanena bhagavato adhippāyo,
tika-vin06t:2102_7: na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2102_8: Tathā hi kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitunti ettha ca kālaparicchedo na kato.
tika-vin06t:2102_9: Kutoyeva pana labbhā tadaññāpekkhādhippāyo bhagavato mūlabhesajjādīni tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvanti kālaparicchedo.
tika-vin06t:2102_12: tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitu”nti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2102_13: taṃ “sannidhiṃ katvā aparāparasmiṃ divase kāle eva paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmī”ti adhippāyato vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2102_14: Aññathā atisayattābhāvato “yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā”tiādi vitakkuppādo na sambhavati.
tika-vin06t:2102_15: Paṇītabhojanānumatiyā pasiddhattā ābādhānurūpasappāyāpekkhāya vuttānīti ce? Tañca na,
tika-vin06t:2102_18: tathā “navanītaṃ upādāya sappi”nti vattabbato navanītaṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2102_20: Yathā phāṇitaggahaṇena siddhepi parato ucchuraso visuṃ anuññāto ucchusāmaññato guḷodakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanādhippāyato.
tika-vin06t:2102_21: Tathā navanīte visesavidhidassanādhippāyato navanītaṃ visuṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2102_23: Vuttañhi tattha “pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin06t:2103_1: navanītaṃ viya ucchurasopi sattāhakālikapāḷiyaṃ eva vattabboti?
tika-vin06t:2103_3: Sattāhakālikapāḷiyaṃ vutte ucchuraso guḷāpadesena yathā agilānassa phāṇitaṃ paṭisiddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2103_5: avutte pana guḷaṃ viya so phāṇitasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin06t:2103_6: Idha avatvā pacchā vacanena guḷodakaṭṭhāneva ṭhapito hoti.
tika-vin06t:2103_12: “ucchurasaṃ upādāya ucchuvikati phāṇitanti veditabbā”ti yadetaṃ nissaggiyaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2103_13: tattha “upādāyā”ti imassa nissāya paccayaṃ katvāti atthoti. Na,
tika-vin06t:2103_15: Yathā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu “paṭiccā”ti imassa ussukkavacanassa “uppajjatī”ti aparakiriyā dissati,
tika-vin06t:2103_16: na tathā “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti ettha aparakiriyā dissatīti.
tika-vin06t:2103_18: Yathā “cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpa”nti ettha aparakiriyāya abhāvepi ussukkavacanaṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2103_22: pavattakaṃ vā rūpanti imaṃ pāṭhasesaṃ sā pāḷi apekkhati,
tika-vin06t:2103_23: na tathā idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ kañci pāṭhaṃ apekkhati.
tika-vin06t:2103_28: Idha pana “ucchurasaṃ upādāyā”ti ucchurasaṃ ādiṃ katvā,
tika-vin06t:2103_30: tasmā “ucchurasena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ agilāno bhikkhu viññāpetvā bhuñjanto paṇītabhojanasikkhāpadena kāretabbo,
tika-vin06t:2104_0: Ettāvatā “ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti ucchurasaṃ ādiṃ katvā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ micchā gahetvā yadi “ucchurasaṃ
tika-vin06t:2104_2: “apakkā vā”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ apakkavacanena ucchurasassa gahitattā.
tika-vin06t:2104_3: Atha “pakkā vā”ti vacanena ucchuraso phāṇitanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2104_6: So cetehi apakkā vāti sāmaṃ bhikkhunā apakkā vā.
tika-vin06t:2104_7: Avatthukapakkā vāti bhikkhunāva sāmaṃ vinā vatthunā pakkā vāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2104_8: Tasmā aññathā “savatthukapakkā vā”ti ca vattabbanti attho dassito,
tika-vin06t:2104_10: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jhāmaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitaṃ vā purebhattameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2104_12: “Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana ‘etaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ vaṭṭati no vaṭṭatī’ti pucchaṃ katvā ‘ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ no vaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2104_13: taṃ yutta”nti vuttattā ca savatthukapakkā vāti attho ca vuttoyeva hoti,
tika-vin06t:2106_1: Sati paccayeti ettha satipaccayatā gilānāgilānavasena dvidhā veditabbā.
tika-vin06t:2106_2: Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadassa hi anāpattivāre yāmakālikādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi avisesena satipaccayatā vuttā.
tika-vin06t:2111_1: Sāmaṃ pakkaṃ samapakkanti duvidhaṃ viya dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:2112_1: “Buddhappamukha’nti āgataṭṭhāne ‘bhikkhusaṅgho’ti avatvā ‘saṅgho’ti vuccati bhagavantampi saṅgahetu”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2113_1: Sambādheti vaccamagge bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca passāvamaggepi anulomato.
tika-vin06t:2113_10: Tena sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulaṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:2113_12: Kiñca bhiyyo pubbe sambādheyeva satthakammaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2113_16: Ettha “satthaṃ nāma satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”tiādīsu viya yena chindati,
tika-vin06t:2113_19: Khāradānaṃ panettha bhikkhunivibhaṅge pasākhe lepamukhena anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2113_20: Eke pana “satthakammaṃ vā”ti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā vatthikammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin06t:2113_22: Tāya chindanaṃ vatthikammaṃ nāmāti ca atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
tika-vin06t:2113_23: te “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti imassa padabhājanīyaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-vin06t:2115_6: dukkaṭassā”ti ca vuttattā appaṭivekkhaṇadukkaṭañca thullaccayañcāti dve āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2117_2: sabbaṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ dasannampi manussamaṃsādīnaṃ akappiyabhāvamattaparidīpanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2117_4: Yaṃ kiñci ñatvā vā añatvā vā khādantassa āpattiyevāti idampi aniyamitavacanameva “ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti avuttattā.
tika-vin06t:2117_5: Tadubhayampi heṭṭhā manussādīnaṃ maṃsādīsu thullaccayadukkaṭāpattiyo hontīti gahitanayehi adhippāyo jānituṃ sakkāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2117_15: Tena vuttaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “manussamaṃse vā kese vā nakhe vā aṭṭhimhi vā lohite vā thullaccayamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2119_0: Khuddasikkhāgāthāpadassa attho ca adhippāyo ca suviññeyyoti.
tika-vin06t:2119_3: Nāgarājena vuttādīnave satipi ujjhāyanādhikārameva gahetvā “paṭikūlatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2121_2: Na hi bhagavā tameva sikkhāpadaṃ dvikkhattuṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin06t:2121_5: tathāpi na ca te bhikkhū sāpattikā jātā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin06t:2121_7: “Apica mayaṃ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2121_8: Mātikāvibhaṅge ca “paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito,
tika-vin06t:2121_9: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin06t:2121_11: tasmā aññaṃ bhojanaṃ nāma nimantanato laddhaṃ yaṃ kiñcīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2121_14: Ettha “yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti vuttattā pana aññanimantanato laddhabhojanameva bhuñjantassa āpatti,
tika-vin06t:2121_16: Tato paṭṭhāya tassa anāpattivāre “niccabhatte salākabhatte pakkhike uposathike pāṭipadike”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2121_20: tasmā “apica mayaṃ kālasseva piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjimhā”ti aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2121_21: padabhājanepi “aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti avisesena vuttattā ca paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin06t:2121_22: vā pacchā vā nimantitaṃ bhojanaṃ ṭhapetvā animantitameva bhuñjantassa āpatti,
tika-vin06t:2121_25: aññatra nimantitena aññassa bhojjayāgu paribhuñjitabbā”ti vuttattā pana paṭhamanimantitabhojanato aññaṃ pacchā laddhaṃ nimantitabhojanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2121_26: niccabhattādīni ca bhuñjantassa āpattīti āpajjamānaṃ viya jātanti anupaññattippasaṅganivāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2121_28: paṭhamapaññattisikkhāpadameva iminā atthena pariṇāmento ca “yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti bhagavā āha,
tika-vin06t:2121_29: tasmā tato paṭṭhāya pacchā nimantanabhojanaṃ bhuñjantasseva āpatti.
tika-vin06t:2121_31: Tenevāyasmā upālitthero tassa anāpattivāre “niccabhatte”tiādīni pañca padāni pakkhipitvā saṅgāyi.
tika-vin06t:2121_33: tasmā paṭhamameva yaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ “pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2121_34: pacchāpi taṃ anurakkhantena abhojanaṃ madhugoḷakaṃ aparāmasitvā bhojjayāgu eva vuttāti evaṃ ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2122_4: cha kappissantī”ti kimatthaṃ na vuccanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:2122_7: andhakavinde cāti ubhayattha upaḍḍhupaḍḍhena paññattaṃ siyā. No ce,
tika-vin06t:2122_9: na ca te sāpattikā appaṭikkhittepi tesaṃ kukkuccadassanato. “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa,
tika-vin06t:2122_11: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2122_12: Tesañhi “paribhuñjathā”ti bhagavato āṇattiyā paribhuttānampi “odissakaṃ nu kho idaṃ amhāka”nti vimatippattānaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:2122_15: Evamidhāpete paññattaṃ paramparabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ omadditvā paramparabhojanaṃ kathaṃ bhuñjissantīti.
tika-vin06t:2122_16: Etthāhu keci ācariyā paramparabhojanasikkhāpadeneva “aññassa bhojanaṃ na kappatī”ti jānantāpi “anujānāmi,
tika-vin06t:2122_18: yāguñcā”ti visuṃ anuññātattā “paṭaggidānamahāvikaṭādi viya kappatī”ti saññāya bhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin06t:2122_19: Tena vuttaṃ “apica mayaṃ kālasseva bhojjayāguyā dhātā”tiādi,
tika-vin06t:2122_20: taṃ ayuttaṃ tattha aṭṭhuppattimātikāvibhaṅgavirodhena anāpattivāre niccabhattādīnaṃ asambhavappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:2122_23: Te hi bhikkhū yasmā bhagavā katthaci vinayavasena kappiyampi “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”nti paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin06t:2122_24: tasmā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ pati “kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2122_29: Tathā hi bhāradvājassa pāyāsaṃ abhojaneyyanti akataviññattippasaṅgato paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin06t:2122_30: Ānandattherena viññāpetvā sajjitaṃ tekaṭulayāguṃ pana “yadapi, ānanda,
tika-vin06t:2122_34: Tena no ce taṃ antovutthaṃ kappatīti adhippāyadassanena paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadāni upatthambheti bhagavatopi kappati,
tika-vin06t:2123_1: Gilānasseva bhagavatā guḷo anuññātoti “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyānī”ti vacanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2123_5: gilānassa guḷodaka”nti vattabbe guḷādhikārattā pubbe anuññātañca vatvā agilānassa guḷodakaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2123_6: tena gilānena sati paccaye guḷo paribhuñjitabbo,
tika-vin06t:2123_7: guḷodakaṃ asati paccayepi vaṭṭatīti imaṃ visesaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:2123_13: tathā sattāhakālikaṃ jahitvā tadanantare yāvajīvike ṭhita”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2123_15: tañca bhagavatā odissānuññātattā paccavekkhaṇābhāve doso natthi.
tika-vin06t:2123_18: madhupi siyā taṃ tathā anuññātattā. Mā hotu,
tika-vin06t:2126_3: “Bahūsu ekassapi vacanena saha siyāti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2126_9: Taṃ upari aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iṭṭhakādīhi katācayassā”tiādinā virujjhati viya.
tika-vin06t:2126_10: Mattikāpiṇḍaṃ vāti ettha “asatiyā anadhiṭṭhitāya saritaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya ce upari adhiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin06t:2126_14: Ettha kappiyakuṭi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti evaṃvidhe puna kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2126_15: Kappiyakuṭiṃ kātuṃ demāti ettha kappiyakuṭikiccaṃ kātunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2129_1: “Attanā paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattameva pariccajitvā sāmaṇerādīhi pānakaṃ katvā dinne purebhattameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2129_5: attanā ca aggahitattā doso na dissati,
tika-vin06t:2129_17: pabbajitena akappiye samādapetabba’nti vuttattā anupasampannassāpi na kevalaṃ dasasu eva sikkhāpadesu,
tika-vin06t:2129_18: atha kho yaṃ bhikkhussa na kappati,
tika-vin06t:2134_2: “Pañca kappantī”ti avatvā “kappissantī”ti anāgatavacanaṃ “vo”ti imassa sāmivacanapakkhe yujjati tesaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe anatthatakathinattā.
tika-vin06t:2134_3: Dvīsu panetesu atthavikappesu pacchimo yutto sabbesampi tesaṃ pāveyyakānaṃ sabbadhutaṅgadharattā.
tika-vin06t:2134_10: Upacārasīmaṭṭhassa matakacīvarādibhāgiyatāya baddhasīmāya tatruppādābhāvato viññeyyametaṃ upacārasīmāvettha adhippetāti.
tika-vin06t:2134_11: Kathinatthāraṃ ke labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2134_13: Kathinadussassa hi dāyakā pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro honti.
tika-vin06t:2134_17: yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake
tika-vin06t:2134_20: taṃ hatthapāse akatvāpi bahisīmāya ṭhitassapi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2134_21: taṃ hatthapāse katvā eva dātabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2134_23: “Tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthesu cetāpitesu atthatakathinānameva tāni vatthāni pāpuṇanti.
tika-vin06t:2134_24: Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2134_25: Paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā labhantīti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhakoṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2134_26: Antarāyena appavāritānampi vutthavassānaṃ kathinatthārasambhavato itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabbanti kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2134_27: “Dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti parivāre ekavacanakaraṇato,
tika-vin06t:2134_29: gaṇassa puggalassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanato ca.
tika-vin06t:2135_0: Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti idaṃ kiṃ ekasīmasmiṃ,
tika-vin06t:2135_4: parato “sace pana ekasīmāya bahū vihārā honti,
tika-vin06t:2135_5: sabbe bhikkhū sannipātetvā ekattha kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2135_6: visuṃ visuṃ attharituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin06t:2135_7: Idañhi vacanaṃ sabbesaṃyeva eko kathinatthāroti dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:2135_13: Idañhi vacanaṃ dvīsupi āvāsesu tassa kathinatthārasiddhiṃ dīpetīti.
tika-vin06t:2135_15: tasmā ekasīmasmiṃ vā nānāsīmasmiṃ vā nānūpacāre aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2135_17: vassiko ca hoti ānisaṃsañca labhatīti sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2136_0: Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarappahonakanti idaṃ “na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakena atthataṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_1: hoti kathina”nti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhanaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin06t:2136_2: Ayañhi pāḷi tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataravirahenāpi na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti dīpetīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2136_4: na tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataravirahena na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti hi dīpetukāmo bhagavā taṃ pāḷimāha.
tika-vin06t:2136_5: Yadi evaṃ “aññatra saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti na vattabbā siyāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2136_8: tassa aññatra saṅghāṭiyā na atthataṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2136_10: Teneva sukkapakkhe “saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena ekameva cīvaraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2136_11: evaṃ sante “catuvīsatiyā ākārehi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2136_12: sattarasahi ākārehi atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti yathārahaṃ ukkaṭṭhakoṭiyā vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2136_14: nissīmaṭṭhānumodanānaṃ catuvīsatiyā ākārānaṃ sambhavantānaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvenapi nimittakatādīnaṃ
tika-vin06t:2136_15: asambhavantānaṃ aññatarabhāvenapi na atthataṃ hoti kathinanti evamadhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2136_17: sīmaṭṭhānumodanānaṃ sattarasannaṃ ākārānaṃ sambhavantānaṃ aññatarabhāvenapi itaresaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvenapi
tika-vin06t:2137_1: kaṇhapakkhe “uttarāsaṅgena atthate kathine na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā na aññatra antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti
tika-vin06t:2137_2: kathina”nti vacanappamāṇato taṃ kathinaṃ anatthataṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:2137_3: Sukkapakkhe ca “animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanappamāṇato animittakatena kathine atthate tañce parikathā kataṃ,
tika-vin06t:2137_4: tathāpi atthatameva kathinaṃ hotīti ayaṃ duvidhopi virodho.
tika-vin06t:2137_5: Yathāvuttanayena adhippāye gahite parihāro hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2138_0: Yo ānisaṃsaṃ bahuṃ detīti iminā paccayalolabhāvaṃ viya dīpeti,
tika-vin06t:2138_1: tathāpi bhagavatā yāvadatthacīvarapariyesanapaññāpanamukhena dvāraṃ dinnanti katvā saṅghānuggahatthaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2138_2: “Akātuṃ na hotīti anādariyena akarontassa dukkaṭa”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2138_6: Kathinacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācāya bhinnamattāya puggalassa atthataṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2138_7: “Kammavācā pana ekāyeva vaṭṭatīti kathinadussassa eva kammavācā,
tika-vin06t:2138_10: Keci pana “baddhasīmā adhippetā ekasīmāya ekaṭṭhāne attharite sabbattha attharitaṃ hoti ‘sabbe bhikkhū sannipatitvā’ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2138_12: upacāraparicchinne tattha tattha laddhaṃ tehi tehi laddhabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2139_5: Paṭhamacimilikā ghaṭetvā ṭhapitā hotīti kathinadussaṃ dubbalaṃ disvā taṃ balavatā attano pakatidussena
tika-vin06t:2139_6: saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā dupaṭṭaṃ katvā sibbitukāmehi kathinadussato pakatidussassa mahantatāya paṭhamaṃ tappamāṇānurūpaṃ
tika-vin06t:2139_7: bandhakaṇḍuse ghaṭetvā rajjukehi bandhitvā kataṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2139_8: Kathinacīvarassa appatāya paṭhamaṃ baddhadussaṃ kucchicimilikā hoti,
tika-vin06t:2139_14: Tathākataṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ pakaticīvarassa mahantatāya pakaticīvarasaṅkhyameva gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2139_19: Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pañcakassa icchitabbattā kathinadussaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ bahudhā chinditvā sibbitukāmo kathinacīvarato
tika-vin06t:2139_20: paṭṭaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ akathinacīvare paṭṭamāropetī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2139_21: Atha vā bahūni kathinadussāni paṃsukūlāni khuddakakhuddakāni ekacīvaratthāya,
tika-vin06t:2139_23: Kathinacīvaratoti bhikkhu ekaccato kathinacīvarato paṭṭaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ āropeti. Etthāha –
tika-vin06t:2139_26: Ettha acīvarasaṅkhyattā khuddakāni dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2139_28: “Paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ nayadānato kucchicimilikabhāvena ṭhitassa kathinadussassa attano
tika-vin06t:2139_30: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ padānato ca khuddakānipi dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2139_31: Tañhi kathinatthārako ghaṭetvā kathinacīvaraṃ karissatīti katvā kappatīti eke,
tika-vin06t:2140_2: Pañca khaṇḍāni paṭṭāni pamāṇaṃ assāti pañcakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2140_4: Tadaheva sañchinnenāti saṅghena kathinatthārakassa kammavācaṃ vatvā dinneneva tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalikatena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2140_5: Evaṃ dinnaṃyeva hi parivāre “pubbakaraṇaṃ sattahi dhammehi saṅgahita”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2140_7: tasmā pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇameva ce dāyako saṅghassa deti,
tika-vin06t:2140_9: Tena ca tasmiṃyeva sīmāmaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo katapubbakaraṇassa puna kattabbābhāvato.
tika-vin06t:2140_10: Atthārakassa hatthagatameva hi sandhāya “na ullikhitamattenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2140_11: Pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇampi puna dhovitvā visibbitvā kātabbameva vacanapamāṇatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2140_14: pabbajjādhikāre “kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā”ti vacanappamāṇato muṇḍikassa chinnepi kese pariyesitvā sirasmiṃ
tika-vin06t:2140_19: kārena paṭisiddhattā uttarāsaṅgena atthate anatthataṃ hotīti aniṭṭhappasaṅgato,
tika-vin06t:2141_1: Asannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinanti ettha kiṃ kathinatthāramāseyeva duvidhopi sannidhi adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:2141_6: kathinatthāramāsepi asukasmiṃ divaseyeva atthāratthāya dammīti dātuṃ vaṭṭati na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2141_8: Dāyakenāpi vassāvāsikaṃ viya kathinacīvaraṃ uddissa dinnaṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2141_12: Na āgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2142_6: Aññathā “cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin06t:2142_7: atthate kathine pañca māsā”ti vibhaṅge vuttattā antarāpakkamanantikādiubbhārābhāvepi pañcahi pañcasu māsesu anāpattiyevāti micchāgāho siyā.
tika-vin06t:2142_8: Tato āpattikhette anāpattikhettasaññāya taṃ taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2144_1: Sanniṭṭhānantike dvepi palibodhā ekato chijjantīti idha,
tika-vin06t:2144_2: parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ imissā khandhakapāḷiyā sameti ekato ubhinnampi dhuranikkhepassa katattā.
tika-vin06t:2144_4: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ parivāre ‘cattāro kathinuddhārā siyā antosīmāya uddhariyyanti,
tika-vin06t:2144_7: Tattha bahisīmāya sanniṭṭhānantiko uddhariyyatīti idha dassitanayova.
tika-vin06t:2144_10: gatagataṭṭhāne phāsuvihāraṃ alabhanto tameva vihāraṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin06t:2144_12: So ca ‘nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressa’nti citte uppannamatte chijjati,
tika-vin06t:2144_16: aññathā antosīmāya “nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressa”nti pavattaubbhāro itaresu samodhānaṃ na gacchatīti atiritto siyā.
tika-vin06t:2144_18: Saubbhāre cīvarapalibodho paṭhamaṃ chijjanto viya khāyati,
tika-vin06t:2144_19: atha kho sāpekkhatāya cīvarakaraṇe saussāhova hotīti lesaṃ sandhāya parivāravasena “dve palibodhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ chijjantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2145_1: Sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ anavasesetvā pakkamanto “samādāya pakkamatī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2145_3: Puggalādhippāyavisesena kevalaṃ vāradassanatthaṃ samādāyavārā vuttā”ti sabbesu gaṇṭhipadesu likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_5: Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena tīṇi tikāni dassitāni,
tika-vin06t:2146_6: tattha paṭhamattikaṃ antosīmāya “na paccessa”nti imaṃ vidhiṃ anāmasitvā bahisīmāyaṃ eva “na paccessa”nti pavattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_14: Adhiṭṭhānupage ca vippakate sati na niṭṭhānantiko.
tika-vin06t:2146_20: Yasmā ime tayo atthavikappā imehi eva tīhi kathinuddhārehi sakkā dassetuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_22: aññathā paṭhamattikaṃ chakkaṃ bhaveyya imassa pannarasakassa ante chakkaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:2146_24: Tathā ca yojiyamānaṃ itarehi savanantikādīhi aviruddhakkamaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2146_25: tasmā catutthattikaṃ ahutvā chakkaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_26: Evaṃ tīṇi tikāni ekaṃ chakkañcāti paṭhamaṃ pannarasakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_27: Idāni idameva pannarasakaṃ upasaggavisesena dutiyaṃ samādāyapannarasakaṃ nāma kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_31: Tattha paṭhamadutiyesu pannarasakesu sabbena sabbaṃ akatacīvaraṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_36: na taṃ cīvarapalibodhaṃ karotī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_37: Nissaggiyesu tatiyakathine āgatacīvarapaccāsā idha cīvarāsāti takko.
tika-vin06t:2146_39: taṃ ṭhānaṃ adhikaraṇūpacārena “cīvarāsā”tveva vuccatīti katvā “taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_40: tasmā anāsāya labhatīti anāsāyitaṭṭhāne labhatītiādinā attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2146_41: Ettha niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanaāsāvacchedikavasena eko vāroti idamekaṃ catukkaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_42: tasmā pubbe vuttāni tīṇi tikāni āsāvacchedikādhikāni tīṇi catukkānīti ekaṃ anāsāyadvādasakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_44: tathāpi taṃ nibbisesanti tamekaṃ dvādasakaṃ avuttasiddhaṃ katvā visesato dassetuṃ ādito paṭṭhāya “antosīmāya paccessa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2146_45: taṃ dutiyacatukke “so bahisīmagato suṇātī”tiādivacanassa tatiyacatukke savanantikādīnañca okāsakaraṇatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_46: Idaṃ pana dvādasakaṃ anāsāya vasena labbhamānampi iminā avuttasiddhaṃ katvā na dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2146_51: Tattha yasmā “disaṃgamiko pakkamatī”ti vacaneneva “na paccessa”nti idaṃ avuttasiddhameva,
tika-vin06t:2147_4: Tassa cīvaralābhe sati vassaṃvutthāvāse niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsanantikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ tikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2147_6: gataṭṭhāne ekanti tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ vasena ekaṃ navakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2147_7: Tato paraṃ niṭṭhānasanniṭṭhānanāsananti kasīmātikkantikasaubbhārānaṃ vasena phāsuvihārapañcakaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2148_0: 325. Dveme bhikkhave kathinassa palibodhāti kathinatthārassa anupabandhanapaccayāti.
tika-vin06t:2156_2: tasmā dvīsu divasesu dinnaṃ tena tesu ekekaṃ gahetvā dvīsu aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti yujjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2158_1: Kabaḷe kabaḷeti ettha kiñcāpi guḷādīsu pakkhittaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2162_3: Katikakaraṇaṃ dassetvā “mayhaṃ santakaṃ tava ca mama ca hotūti vatvā itarena ca tathāvutte vaṭṭatī”ti samānaparikkhāravidhiṃ vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2163_1: “Khaṇḍasīmāyapi sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttattā sesakammānipi tattha nisīditvā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2163_3: tasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti dīpavāsino vadanti kira.
tika-vin06t:2163_4: “Corikāya gahitattā na pāpuṇātīti senāsanakkhandhake āgatasuttañca sādhaka”nti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2163_5: tasmā tesaṃ matena idaṃ āveṇikalakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2169_1: Aṭṭhānametanti ettha rūpakaṇḍe “catusamuṭṭhānika”nti vuttattā kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ rāgacittābhāvā na muccatīti
tika-vin06t:2169_2: vā rāgapaccaye sati kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti vā vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ kathāvatthunā ca.
tika-vin06t:2170_1: Aggaḷaguttiyeva pamāṇanti imehi catūhi nikkhepakāraṇehi ṭhapentena aggaḷaguttivihāreyeva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2172_1: No ce atthataṃ hoti “ekaṃ cīvaramāsa”nti na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2172_4: tasseva tāni cīvarāni yāva cīvaramāsā”ti vacanassa abhāvato,
tika-vin06t:2172_8: Heṭṭhā hi “akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2172_11: etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti vacanato anatthatakathinānaṃ ekacīvaramāse uppannaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2172_13: tasmā idha taṃ avatvā ekopi tayo gaṇapūrake labhitvā kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhatīti imaṃ līnatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “yāva kathinassa ubbhārāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2172_15: “Jānitabbo ca vinayadharehīti tathā vuttoti apare”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2172_17: pañca māse sabbaṃ tasseva bhikkhuno hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:2172_19: “Idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti niyamitattā “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti ettha ca “idhā”ti adhikārattā tasmiṃ vutte labhati.
tika-vin06t:2172_20: “Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattāti cīvarakālassāsannattā ca anatthatakathinānampi vutthavassānañca anuññātaṭṭhānattā
tika-vin06t:2172_22: Keci pana “yaṃ pana idaṃ ‘idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā’tiādiṃ katvā yāva ‘anāgatavasse’ti padaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2172_24: Piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā’ti idaṃ parato ‘tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī’ti imassa pariyosāne ‘kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2172_27: Parato ‘cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassā’ti vuttena nibbisesattā,
tika-vin06t:2172_28: tasmā eva ekaccesu paṇḍitanti vadantī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2172_39: “Gahitameva nāmā’ti imassa idaṃ pattanti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2172_40: te pana bhāgā tesaṃ atthato pattāyevāti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2174_2: aññatra vassaṃvutthenā”ti cīvarasamayaṃ upādāya paṭikkhepo kato.Ekasmiṃ vihāre “rājavihāre viya nānāpariveṇesu
tika-vin06t:2174_3: vā idha vā vutthā labhatū”ti vatvā dinnaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2174_4: “Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti etaṃ vacanamattameva ekavihāre sattāhakiccābhāvā”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2176_9: itaro tassa parikkhāraṃ apāpetvā taṃ theyyacittena gaṇhāti,
tika-vin06t:2176_14: Maraṇasamaye vattuṃ asahanto ce citteneva deti,
tika-vin06t:2176_22: “Saṅgho sāmī”ti vacanato saṅghena balakkārena so vāretabboti eke.
tika-vin06t:2176_23: Jīvamānakāle gahitattā na saṅgho sāmīti eke.
tika-vin06t:2176_24: Sāmiko ce sayaṃ passitvā acchindituṃ labhati,
tika-vin06t:2177_12: Saṅgho ce āvāsaṃ ānetvā attano santakaṃ katvā pacchā samīpe bahisīmāya ṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:2177_20: Puna upaṭṭhākānaṃ bahubhāve sati sabbesaṃ dātabbakammaṃ dassentena bhagavatā kammavācāyaṃ “gilānupaṭṭhākāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2177_22: “Imaṃ tuyhaṃ demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi pariccajāmi vissajjāmi nissajjāmī’ti vā ‘itthannāmassa demi…pe…
tika-vin06t:2177_24: ‘sammukhā vā parammukhā vā vutte dinnaṃyeva hotī’ti dānalakkhaṇassa ca ‘tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vutte ‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti vadati,
tika-vin06t:2177_25: ‘sudinnaṃ suggahitañcā’ti gahaṇalakkhaṇassa ca vuttattā ‘mama santakaṃ tava ca mama ca hotū’ti evamādivacanena
tika-vin06t:2178_0: Anugaṇṭhipade pana atīva papañcaṃ katvā puna “idamettha ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ –
tika-vin06t:2178_3: te sabbe attano santakaṃ vattamānaṃ uppajjanakena saddhiṃ pesalassa ekassa pariccajanti,
tika-vin06t:2178_6: Idaṃ samānaparikkhāralakkhaṇaṃ pāḷiādīsu vuttalakkhaṇeyeva patanato acalappattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2178_8: ācariyānaṃ matānusārena kātabbaṃ kātukāmenāti apare”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2178_9: “vassaṃvutthasāmaṇero pañcasu sikkhāpadesu ekaṃ atikkamitvā puna gahito lābhaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin06t:2180_1: Uppanne cīvare abhājite pakkamatīti ettha “saṅghena tatruppādato ekekassa bhikkhuno ettakaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ
tika-vin06t:2180_4: puna pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā cīvarabhājanaṃ sambhāventopi na labhatiyeva pubbapakatito bhaṭṭhattā.
tika-vin06t:2184_5: pāpuṇātīti ‘upacārasīmāya demā’ti evaṃ dinnameva sandhāyā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2184_6: “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti vutte khaṇḍasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti tāsaṃ visuṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmattā.
tika-vin06t:2184_8: “avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2184_10: “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti dinnaṃ pana yasmiṃ ṭhāne avippavāsasīmā atthi,
tika-vin06t:2184_13: “Khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā ‘sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghassa dammī’ti vutte upacārasīmāya eva paricchinditvā dātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2184_14: “Avippavāsasīmāya demā”ti khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā dinne tattheva pāpuṇātīti keci.
tika-vin06t:2184_15: Yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdantīti ettha vihārūpacāre hatthapāsena,
tika-vin06t:2184_17: “Imasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassā”ti vutte ekābaddhā hutvāpi parikkhepaparikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇātīti eke.
tika-vin06t:2184_18: “Bhikkhunivihārato bahi yattha katthaci ṭhatvā ‘saṅghassā’ti vutte bhikkhusaṅghova sāmī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2184_19: Ekopi gantvāti ettha sabbesaṃ vā pāpetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2184_26: Teneva ekasmiṃ avasiṭṭhe yujjatīti no mati.
tika-vin06t:2188_3: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvare dinne paṃsukūlikānaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2188_5: tattha apariyāpannattā ca puggalo visuṃ labhati.
tika-vin06t:2188_6: Evaṃ sante “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca dammī”ti vuttepi “ubhatosaṅghassa dinnameva hotī”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2188_10: tasmā eva “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vāro na vutto.
tika-vin06t:2188_13: Yasmā eko addhānādiyako viya duvidho na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2188_14: tasmā ubhatosaṅghaggahaṇena eko bhikkhu na gahitoti.
tika-vin06t:2188_15: “Sabbāvāsassa ca cetiyassa ca dhammassa cā’ti vutte sabbavihāresu cetiyadhammānaṃ ekekassa bhikkhuno bhāgo dātabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2188_16: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte na virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2188_18: idha vihārena ghaṭitattā ca tamhi tamhi vihāre ekabhāgaṃ labhitabbamevāti pariharanti.
tika-vin06t:2188_19: Attano pāpetvāti vikāle aparibhogattā sakalopi vaṭṭeyyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:2188_25: itarathā samuccayatthe gahite “lakkhaṇaññū vadantī”ti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:2188_26: Kasmāti ārabhitvā papañcaṃ karonti. Kiṃ tena,
tika-vin06t:2188_28: atītavassaṃvutthānameva pāpuṇātī”ti iminā siddhattā na vicāritaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2188_31: sampattānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti yattha katthaci vutthavassānanti adhippāyo “yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ
tika-vin06t:2188_33: Gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya vutte pana yasmā anantarātītaṃ hemantaṃ eva vutthā nāma honti,
tika-vin06t:2192_1: Appatto nissāraṇanti ettha nissāraṇaṃ nāma kuladūsakānaṃyeva anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2192_6: “Tassapāpiyasikakammārahassa tassapāpiyasikakammaṃ karontī”ti vacanato cakkaṃ bandhanti ñātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2194_3: Imasmiṃ campeyyakkhandhake adhammakammāniyeva dvidhā katvā pañcāgatānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2194_4: Teneva parivāre imasmiṃ khandhake “pañca adhammikānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2194_5: “Andhamūgabadhiro sosārito”ti iminā apabbajitassapi upasampadā ruhatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2198_4: Āvuso ettha āpattīti vacanaṃ upādāya “so tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhi hotī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2198_6: na paññattiya”nti satiṃ paṭilabhitvā tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhi ahosi,
tika-vin06t:2198_7: tena vuttaṃ ante “aññe bhikkhū tassā āpattiyā āpattidiṭṭhino hontī”ti.
tika-vin06t:2205_2: paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmīti ettha senāsanārahassa yo senāsanaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin06t:2205_4: “Kalahakārakādīnamettha okāso natthītiādikaṃ saṅghassa katikaṃ vatvā taṃ na paññāpentassa vā ‘ahaṃ buddho’ti
tika-vin06t:2205_5: pasayha attanā attano paññāpetvā gaṇhantaṃ ‘yuttiyā gaṇhathā’ti vatvā vārentassa vā doso natthi.
tika-vin06t:2205_6: Idha kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ āgatānaṃ kosambikānampi ‘yathāvuḍḍha’nti avatvā ‘vivitte asati vivittaṃ katvāpi
tika-vin06t:2205_7: dātabba’nti vuttattā vivittaṃ katvā dentaṃ paṭibāhentasseva āpattīti kira ayamattho pārivāsikādīnaṃ vihārapariyantadāpanena
tika-vin06t:2207_1: “Atha kho te ukkhittānuvattakā bhikkhū taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhuṃ osāretvā yena ukkhepakā bhikkhū…pe…
tika-vin06t:2207_2: tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghasāmaggiṃ karomā”ti vacanaṃ duviññeyyavinicchayaṃ vinayalakkhaṇakusalassa.
tika-vin06t:2207_3: Vijjamāne hi kārakasaṅghe itaro saṅgho osārituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:2207_5: te bhikkhū kārakasaṅghena samānaladdhikabhāvaṃ pattattā tena samānasaṃvāsakā honti,
tika-vin06t:2207_6: tato ukkhepakānaṃ chandaṃ aggahetvā osārentānaṃ kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin06t:2207_9: taṃ bhikkhuṃ osārethā”ti bhagavato vacanena ukkhittānuvattakā osāresuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2209_0: Sati tasmiṃ na aññassa, paṭippassambhanaṃ khamaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2212_2: sāvetā ca uggahetā ca dhāretā ca viññātā ca viññāpetā ca kusalo ca sahitāsahitadassano ca akalahakārako cāti etānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2219_1: Asammukhā kataṃ hotītiādayo tikā kevalaṃ desanāmattameva.
tika-vin06t:2219_2: Na hi tīhi eva aṅgehi samodhānehi adhammakammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2219_7: Kaṇhapakkhe “adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti sukkapakkhe “desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ parato “tīhi,
tika-vin06t:2219_9: aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
tika-vin06t:2219_14: Etthāha upatissatthero “tajjanīyakammassa hi visesena bhaṇḍanakārakattaṃ aṅga’nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2219_16: tasmā sabbattikesupi bhaṇḍanaṃ āropetvā bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivasena idaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2219_17: tasmā ‘adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti etthāpi pubbabhāge vā aparabhāge vā codanāsāraṇādikāle bhaṇḍanapaccayā āpannāpattivaseneva kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2219_19: “Adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyāti pārājikāpattiyā’ti ettakamattaṃ vatvā parato ‘adhisīle pārājikasaṅghādisese
tika-vin06t:2219_23: tasmā tattha pacchimaṃ pārājikapadaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin06t:2219_24: aṭṭhakathāyañca “adesanāgāminiyāti pārājikāpattiyā vā saṅghādisesāpattiyā vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2219_26: Yato gaṇṭhipade “adhisīle sīlavipanno’ti saṅghādisesaṃ sandhāyā”ti ettakameva likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2219_27: tasmā sabbattha gaṇṭhipade sakalena nayena pārājikāpattipaccayā uppannabhaṇḍanahetu na tajjanīyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ payojanābhāvā,
tika-vin06t:2219_28: saṅghādisesapaccayā kātabbanti ayamattho siddho hoti. Na,
tika-vin06t:2219_29: sukkapakkhe “desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hotī”ti vacanatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2220_2: Yena kammena nissāya te vatthabbanti nissiyati bhajāpiyati niyasso,
tika-vin06t:2220_7: Yena kammena akkuṭṭhagahaṭṭhasamaīpameva paṭisāriyati so akkosako pacchā pesiyati,
tika-vin06t:2221_0: 11. “Nissāya te vatthabba”nti garunissayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na itaranti.
tika-vin06t:2222_1: Assajipunabbasukavatthusmiṃ “tesu vibbhantesupi kammaṃ paṭippassambhetuṃ anuññātampi sammāvattantānaṃyevā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2225_10: Kasmā tajjanīyakammanti vuccatīti saṅgho kalahakārakapuggalaṃ kalahe ca bhede ca bhayaṃ dassetvā khantiyā janeti,
tika-vin06t:2225_23: Kathaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hotīti samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena.
tika-vin06t:2225_24: Kathaṃ akataṃ hotīti vaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena.
tika-vin06t:2225_28: Kena ca akataṃ hotīti gaṇena puggalena.
tika-vin06t:2225_29: Kattha ca kataṃ hotīti yassa puggalassa saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:2225_31: Kattha ca akataṃ hotīti yassa puggalassa saṅgho tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:2225_33: Kāya velāya kataṃ hotīti yadā kalahajātāpatti saṃvijjati.
tika-vin06t:2225_34: Kāya velāya akataṃ hotīti yadā kalahajātāpatti na saṃvijjati.
tika-vin06t:2225_44: asaṃvāsiko vā puggalo tassaṃ parisāyaṃ saṃvijjati,
tika-vin06t:2229_1: Pārivāsikakkhandhake “mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathāti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2229_4: “Taṃ pana pārivāsikena pāpitassa attanā sampaṭicchitasseva punadivasādiatthāya vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2230_1: Pakatiyāva nissayoti ettha “antevāsikānaṃ ālayasabbhāve yāva vassūpanāyikadivaso,
tika-vin06t:2230_3: tassa ālayassa sabbhāve nissayo na paṭippassambhatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2230_7: idha pana ekanteneva dvinnampi samabhāvo icchitabbo evāti eke.
tika-vin06t:2230_8: Paṭibalassa vā bhikkhussāti ettha “laddhasammutikena āṇattopi garudhammehi,
tika-vin06t:2230_9: aññehi vā ovadituṃ na labhatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2230_10: Tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarāti ettha “asañcicca āpannasañcarittato sukkavissaṭṭhi pāpiṭṭhatarāti ayampi nayo yojetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2230_17: Aññavihāragatenāpi tattha pubbe ārocitassa punārocanakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin06t:2230_18: “Anikkhittavattassa bahi ārocitassa yathā puna vihāre ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:2230_19: evaṃ ‘āgantukasodhanatthaṃ uposathadivase ārocetabba’nti vacanañhettha sādhaka”nti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2231_2: Avisesenāti pārivāsikassa ukkhittakassāti imaṃ bhedaṃ akatvā.
tika-vin06t:2231_4: “Samavassāti etena apacchā apurimaṃ nipajjane dvinnampi vattabhedāpattibhāvaṃ dīpetī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2234_2: Paṭhamaṃ saṅghamajjhe parivāsaṃ gahetvā nikkhittavattena puna ekassapi santike samādiyituṃ,
tika-vin06t:2234_5: Ūne gaṇe caraṇadosattā na gahetunti eke.
tika-vin06t:2234_6: Paṭhamaṃ ādinnavattaṃ ekassa santike yathā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin06t:2238_3: na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti adhippāyo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2238_9: Vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin06t:2238_14: atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanena tathā eva paṭipajjitabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2238_16: anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2238_20: Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu abbhetabboti ciṇṇamānattassa ca abbhānārahassa ca ninnānākāraṇattā aññathā “abbhānāraho abbhetabbo”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:2238_21: Ukkhepanīyakammakatopi attano laddhiggahaṇavasena sabhāgabhikkhumhi sati tassa anārocāpetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin06t:2240_3: “Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti pasaṅgato idheva pakāsitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2240_5: Tattha ñattiyā āvi katvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ anuññātattā lahukasabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin06t:2240_6: Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti kira.
tika-vin06t:2240_7: “Tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatī’ti vuttattā lahukassevāyamanuññātā.
tika-vin06t:2240_8: Na hi sakkā suddhassa ekassa santike saṅghādisesassa paṭikaraṇaṃ kātu”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2240_9: Lahukesupi sabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti,
tika-vin06t:2240_10: tasmā eva hi ñattiyā āvikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2240_13: tato na vaṭṭatīti dīpanatthameva ñattiyā āvikaraṇamanuññātaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2240_16: tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā”ti vacanena kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ pakāsitova.
tika-vin06t:2240_17: Saṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2240_18: Tassā ñattiyā ayamattho yadā suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissati,
tika-vin06t:2241_0: Nāmañceva āpatti cāti “tena tena vītikkamenāpannāpatti āpatti.
tika-vin06t:2241_2: Ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti ettha ārocanaṃ vattabhedadukkaṭapaaharaṇappayojananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2241_3: Akāraṇametanti “sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”nti vutte vuṭṭhānato.
tika-vin06t:2242_0: Dasasataṃ rattisatanti dasasataṃ āpattiyo rattisataṃ chādetvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2242_1: Agghasamodhāno nāma sabhāgavatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa bahurattiṃ paṭicchāditāpattiyaṃ nikkhipitvā dātabbo,
tika-vin06t:2244_0: “Gāmassāti na vutta”nti vacanato kira gāmūpacārepi vaṭṭatīti adhippāyoti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2244_7: ratticchedo hotiyevā”ti vacane heṭṭhā “antoaruṇe eva nikkhamitvā gāmūpacārato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”tiādinā nayena garuṃ katvā vacanato,
tika-vin06t:2244_8: bhikkhunīnaṃ garukavaseneva tattha tattha sikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattā ca tadanurūpavaseneva aṭṭhakathācariyena
tika-vin06t:2244_9: bhikkhunīnaṃ garuṃ katvā mānattacaraṇavidhidassanatthaṃ “yattakā purebhattaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2244_10: Kurundiādīsu vuttavacanena karontassapi doso natthīti dassetuṃ kevalaṃ lakkhaṇamattameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2244_12: vinicchaye patte lakkhaṇe eva ṭhātabbato kurundiādīsu vuttavacanaṃ pacchā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2244_15: tathā sace kāci bhikkhunī dve leḍḍupāte anatikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapeti,
tika-vin06t:2244_18: Parivāsavattādīnanti “parivāsanissayapaṭippassaddhiādīnaṃ upacārasīmāya paricchinnattā bhikkhunupassayassa upacārasīmāva gahetabbā,
tika-vin06t:2244_21: Na hi tattha antogāme vihāro atthī”ti ca likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2246_1: “Visuṃ mānatthaṃ caritabbanti mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā visuṃ kammavācāyā”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2247_0: 143. Dhammatāti dhammatāya, tathātāyāti attho “alajjitā”ti ettha viya.
tika-vin06t:2248_1: Purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbāti ettha “parivasitadivasāpi gaṇanūpagā hontī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2249_2: Sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampītiādi jātivasenekavacanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2253_1: Yattha yattha kammavācāya “aya”nti vā “ime”ti vā sammukhāniddesaniyamo atthi,
tika-vin06t:2253_4: Pañcavidhasseva pana uddharitvā dassanaṃ kammakkhandhake tāva tasseva pāḷiāruḷhattā,
tika-vin06t:2253_5: catuvīsatiyā pārājikesu vijjamānesu pārājikakaṇḍe āgatānaṃyeva catunnaṃ uddharitvā dassanaṃ viyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2253_14: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti tattha bhavitabbāpattidassanatthaṃ idaṃ āraddhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2253_15: “Sammukhāvinayapatirūpakena vūpasantampi sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasantagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti dassetuṃ ‘adhammavādī puggalo’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2253_17: Evaṃ vūpasantaṃ sammukhāvinayapatirūpakena vūpasantaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin06t:2253_18: na sammukhāvinayena ca aññena kenacīti dassetuṃ idamāraddhanti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2255_1: Dabbassa kammavācāya “saṅgho imaṃ āyasmantaṃ dabba”nti sammukhāniddeso natthi,
tika-vin06t:2255_2: tathāpi “paṭhamaṃ dabbo yācitabbo”ti vacanena sammukhākaraṇīyatā tassa siddhā.
tika-vin06t:2257_2: tādisasseva amūḷhavinayaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti amūḷhassa kattabbavinayo amūḷhavinayo”ti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2257_3: taṃ yuttaṃ “saṅgho gaggassa bhikkhuno amūḷhassa amūḷhavinayaṃ detī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin06t:2257_6: adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānānī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “na sarāmī”ti vacanaṃ vītikkamakālaṃ sandhāya tassa vibhaṅgassa pavattattā.
tika-vin06t:2259_1: “Appaṭiññāya bhikkhūnaṃ kammāni karontī”ti ārabhantassa kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-vin06t:2261_2: aṅgehi samannāgataṃ tassapāpiyasikākamma”nti ārabhitvā pañca aṅgāni dassetvā pāḷi gatā,
tika-vin06t:2263_1: “Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabba”nti chandadānassa paṭikkhittattā pavāraṇakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyañca “bhinnassa hi saṅghassa samaggakaraṇakāle,
tika-vin06t:2263_3: imasmiñca pavāraṇasaṅgaheti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu chandaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā idha āgantvā vā chandaṃ
tika-vin06t:2263_4: datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnāti idaṃ virujjhati viya khāyatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2263_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visujjhitukāmānaṃ chandaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2263_12: “Ṭhapetvā ye na tattha hotī”ti hi ayaṃ pāḷi sannipātaṃ āgantvā chandaṃ datvā ṭhitānaṃ atthitaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin06t:2263_15: tasmā yo sāmaggīuposathe chandaṃ datvā tiṭṭhati ce,
tika-vin06t:2263_19: so tāhi āpattīhi na sujjhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2263_22: tattha hi kevalaṃ chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti sace,
tika-vin06t:2263_26: na tattha chandāraho atthīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2263_30: teneva satipi diṭṭhāvikamme idaṃ paṭikuṭṭhakataṃ na hotīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2263_32: Idha hi ye pana “na metaṃ khamatī’ti aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ karontī”ti vacanato na saṅghassa diṭṭhāvikammaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin06t:2263_34: Aññathā pubbabhāgā tā ñattiyo niratthikā siyuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2263_35: na ca parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ chandārahādhikāre nayo dinno.
tika-vin06t:2263_36: Pavāraṇakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tīsu ṭhānesu chandaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2263_37: aṭṭhakathāya pamāṇabhāve sati “idha chandaṃ datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnā”tiādi vacane suddhikāmato eva gahite sabbaṃ na virujjhatīti eke.
tika-vin06t:2263_39: te āpattīhi na vuṭṭhahantī”ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin06t:2263_40: Heṭṭhā “sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabba”nti chandadānassa paṭikkhepavacanato aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tīsu ṭhānesu chandaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2263_42: ekajjhameva kamme karīyamāne yo idha “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin06t:2263_48: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti ekatopakkhikānaṃ sandhiyā katāya tadanantare kenaci karaṇīyena chandaṃ datvā gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2263_50: Aparesampi ekatopakkhikānaṃ abbhantare ṭhitattā vibhūtattā karaṇassa ayamatthova vutto.
tika-vin06t:2263_51: Sādhāraṇavasena dutiyāya ñattiyā ṭhapitāya ye tasmiṃ khaṇe ñattidutiyakammavācāsu anāraddhāsu,
tika-vin06t:2263_54: Ye na tattha hontīti padassa ca ye vuttappakārena nayena tattha na hontīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin06t:2263_55: Vuttappakāratthadīpanatthañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “chandaṃ datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnā”ti idameva avatvā “ye
tika-vin06t:2263_56: pana tehi vā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi tattha anāgatā,
tika-vin06t:2263_57: āgantvā vā chandaṃ datvā pariveṇādīsu nisinnā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2263_59: “Pāḷiyā ca tattha diṭṭhāvikammena kammassa akuppatā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2265_3: Taṃ sandhāya “samathehi ca adhikaraṇīyatāya adhikaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2265_4: Atha vā vivādahetubhūtassa cittuppādassa vūpasamena sambhavassa saddassapi vūpasamo hotīti cittuppādassapi
tika-vin06t:2266_1: “Āpattiñhi āpajjanto kusalacitto vā”ti vacanato kusalampi siyāti ce?
tika-vin06t:2266_4: so tīsu cittesu aññataracittasamaṅgī hutvā āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ “yaṃ kusalacitto āpajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2266_6: tassa akusalādibhāvopi āpattādhikaraṇassa na yujjateva vivādādhikaraṇādīnaṃ viyāti ce? Na,
tika-vin06t:2266_9: Avasiṭṭhesu kusalābyākatapaññattīsu ‘āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākata’nti vacanato paññattitāva paṭisiddhā kusalattike apariyāpannattā.
tika-vin06t:2266_10: Kusalapaṭisedheneva tena samānagatikattā kiriyābyākatānampi paṭisedho veditabbo,
tika-vin06t:2266_11: kiriyābyākatānaṃ viya anugamanato vipākābyākatānampi paṭisedho katova hoti,
tika-vin06t:2266_12: tathāpi abyākatasāmaññato rūpakkhandhena saddhiṃ vipākakiriyābyākatānampi adhivacananti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2266_13: Tattha “kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hotī”ti vinaye apakataññuno sandhāya vuttaṃ appaharitakaraṇādike sati.
tika-vin06t:2266_14: Tasmāti yasmā “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin06t:2266_15: tasmā kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2266_16: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “ticittaṃ tivedana”nti vuccatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2266_21: ‘Yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hotī’ti vuttattā”ti vadanti. Tena kiṃ?
tika-vin06t:2266_29: niddāyante vā mātugāmo ce seyyaṃ kappeti,
tika-vin06t:2266_30: tassa bhikkhuno vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2266_31: tasmā tasmiṃ khaṇe seyyākārena vattamānarūpameva āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:2266_33: Tasmiñhi khaṇe uṭṭhātabbe jāte anuṭṭhānato rūpakkhandhova āpatti nāma,
tika-vin06t:2266_39: paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvā padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa ca āpajjitabbāpattiyā kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyyāti.
tika-vin06t:2267_3: Kevalaṃ paññattiyā akusalādibhāvāsambhavato āpattitā na yujjati.
tika-vin06t:2267_4: Āpattiṃ āpajjanto tīsu aññatarasamaṅgī hutvā āpajjatīti dassanatthaṃ “yaṃ kusalacitto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2267_6: pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalacittakkhaṇe vītikkamavasena pavattarūpasambhavato kusalacitto vā abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin06t:2267_7: Tathā abyākatacitto vā abyākatarūpasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2267_10: Supinapassanakālādīsu pāṇātipātādiṃ karonto sahaseyyādivasena āpajjitabbāpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacitto abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2267_12: Porāṇagaṇṭhipadesu pana “puthujjano kalyāṇaputhujjano sekkho arahāti cattāro puggale dassetvā tesu arahato āpattādhikaraṇaṃ abyākatameva,
tika-vin06t:2267_16: Yasmā cassa sañcicca vītikkamakāle akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin06t:2267_18: Sabbattha abyākataṃ nāma tassa vipākābhāvamattaṃ sandhāya evaṃnāmakaṃ jāta”nti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2268_2: so sabbo kiṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma hotīti ekapucchā.
tika-vin06t:2268_3: “Vivādo adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇameva vivādo ca adhikaraṇañcāti pucchati.
tika-vin06t:2268_4: Tadubhayaṃ vivādādhikaraṇamevāti pucchatīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2268_6: Yadi evaṃ imāya na bhavitabbaṃ vivādo vivādādhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2268_8: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādo ceva adhikaraṇañcāti pañcapañhāhi bhavitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin06t:2268_13: Itarāsu adhikaraṇaṃ vivādoti yaṃ kiñci adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2271_0: 233. Ubbāhikāya khiyyanake pācitti na vuttā tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin06t:2272_0: 236. Tassa kho etanti esoti attho “etadagga”nti ettha viya.
tika-vin06t:2274_2: taṃ vivādādhikaraṇādīni viya samathehi sametabbaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2281_4: yathā tassa uṇṇapāvārassa bahiddhā lomāni dissanti,
tika-vin06t:2283_0: 252. Uṭṭitvāti pakkhipitvā. Otaratūti iddhiyā otāretvā gaṇhātu. Anupariyāyīti anuparibbhami.
tika-vin06t:2284_0: 253. Na acchupiyantīti na lagganti. Rūpakākiṇṇānīti itthirūpādīhi vokiṇṇāni.
tika-vin06t:2285_2: Parivattetvā tatthevāti ettha “parivattetvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhiyā patiṭṭhātī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2285_3: Paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahi kuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2285_4: Ettha “parivaṭṭitvā patto bhijjatīti adhikaraṇabhedāsaṅkāya abhāve ṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2285_5: Pattamāḷako vaṭṭitvā pattānaṃ apatanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā māḷakacchannena kato.
tika-vin06t:2285_7: Miḍḍhante ādhārake ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati pattasandhāraṇatthaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin06t:2285_8: Mañce ādhārakepi na vaṭṭati nisīdanapaccayā vāritattā.
tika-vin06t:2286_1: “Aṃsakūṭe laggetvāti vacanato aggahatthe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2286_3: “na kevalaṃ yassa patto”tiādi yadi hatthena gahitapatte bhedasaññā,
tika-vin06t:2286_14: “Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin06t:2287_6: Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena pariyante saṃharitvā diguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2287_7: Aññathā khuddakacīvarassa anuvātaparibhaṇḍādividhānakaraṇe hatthassa okāso na hoti.
tika-vin06t:2287_8: Salākāya sati dvinnaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ ñatvā sibbitāsibbitaṃ sukhaṃ paññāyati.
tika-vin06t:2287_9: Daṇḍakathine kate na bahūhi sahāyehi payojanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2287_12: “haliddisuttena saññākaraṇa”nti vuttattā haliddisuttena cīvaraṃ sibbetumpi vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2288_8: tathāpi santakametaṃ amūlacchedakatabhikkhuno lajjinopi samānassa kappatīti yujjati.
tika-vin06t:2289_1: Bahi kuṭṭassa samantato nīcavatthukaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ “maṇḍalika”nti vuccati.
tika-vin06t:2289_2: Jantāgharappaṭicchādinā channassa naggiyaṃ yassa na paññāyati,
tika-vin06t:2290_4: Tassa are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena,
tika-vin06t:2290_6: Āviddhapakkhapāsaṃ nāma yattha maṇḍalākārena pakkhapāsā bajjhanti āviddhavatthatā viya āviddhapakkhapāsakā.
tika-vin06t:2291_0: 273. Paragalaṃ gacchatīti imassa payogābhāvā vaṭṭati. Kammasatenāti mahatā ussāhena.
tika-vin06t:2292_7: Akāyabandhanena sañcicca vā asañcicca vā gāmappavesane āpatti.
tika-vin06t:2293_1: Sattaṅgulaṃ vā aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ vāti ettha “sugataṅgulenā”ti avuttattā pakatiaṅgulena sāruppatthāya vaḍḍhetvāpi karonti ce, na doso.
tika-vin06t:2298_1: Nilīyanti bhikkhū etthāti vihārādayo leṇāni nāma. Āgata-
tika-vin06t:2299_2: Thambhakavātapānaṃ nāma tiriyaṃ dārūni adatvā ujukaṃ ṭhiteheva dārūhi kattabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2299_3: Bhisīnaṃ anuññātaṃ vaṭṭatīti bimbohane vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2299_4: Tūlapūritaṃ bhisiṃ apassayituṃ na vaṭṭati uṇṇādīnaṃyeva anuññātattā.
tika-vin06t:2299_8: Yadi evaṃ akappiyamañcañca apassayituṃ na vaṭṭeyya.
tika-vin06t:2305_0: 308. Citāti iṭṭhakāyo kabaḷena niddhamanavasena chinditvā katāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2306_1: Chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antevāsikāti ettha vīsativassaṃ atikkamitvā chabbaggiyā uppannā.
tika-vin06t:2306_2: “Ārādhayiṃsu me bhikkhū citta”nti vuttattā aññasmiṃ kāle sāvatthigamane uppannaṃ vatthuṃ idha āpattidassanatthaṃ āharitvā vuttanti yuttaṃ viya,
tika-vin06t:2309_4: Paccayeneva hi tanti tasmiṃ senāsane mahātherā tassa paccayassa kāraṇā aññattha agantvā vasantāyeva naṃ paṭijaggissantīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2309_15: Tāvakālikaṃ kālena mūlacchedanavasena vā aññesaṃ vā kammaṃ aññassa siyā nāvāyaṃ saṅgamoti ācariyo.
tika-vin06t:2309_16: Puggalavaseneva kātabbanti apalokanakāle saṅgho vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ pāṭekkaṃ “ettakaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ vatthaṃ deti,
tika-vin06t:2309_20: “Ekasmiṃ āvāse saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī’ti vacanato saṅghavasena kātabba”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2309_21: Na hi tathā vutte saṅghassa kiñci kammaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin06t:2309_22: “Sammatasenāsanaggāhāpakato aññena gāhitepi gāho ruhati aggahitupajjhāyassa upasampadā viyā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2310_0: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi janeti ettha kiṃ visuṃ visuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2310_3: Na hi te tathā sammatā saṅghena kammakatā nāma honti,
tika-vin06t:2310_4: teneva sattasatikakkhandhake ekato aṭṭha janā sammatāti.
tika-vin06t:2310_6: Apalokanakammassa vatthūhi sā eva kammavācā labbhamānā labbhati,
tika-vin06t:2310_7: tassā ca vatthūhi apalokanakammameva labbhamānaṃ labbhati,
tika-vin06t:2310_9: Imaṃ nayaṃ micchā gaṇhanto “apalokanakammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2310_12: Maggo pokkharaṇīti ettha maggo nāma magge katadīghasālā,
tika-vin06t:2310_14: Etāni hi asenāsanānīti ettha bhattasālā na āgatā,
tika-vin06t:2310_26: Taṃ saññāpetvāti ettha paññattiṃ agacchante balakkārenapi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2311_0: Upanibandhitvāti tassa samīpe rukkhamūlādīsu vasitvā tattha vattaṃ katvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin06t:2311_3: “Paṭhamabhāgaṃ muñcitvāti idaṃ ce paṭhamagāhitavatthuto mahagghaṃ hotī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2311_4: Chinnavassānaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ nāma pubbe gahitavassāvāsikānaṃ pacchā chinnavassānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2311_5: Bhatiniviṭṭhanti bhatiṃ katvā viya niviṭṭhaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2311_7: vibbhantopi labhatevā”ti idaṃ tatruppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2311_10: Vinayadharā pana “amhākaṃ vihāre vassaṃ upagatānaṃ ekekassa ticīvaraṃ saṅgho dassatī’tiādinā apalokitepi abhājitaṃ vibbhantako na labhati.
tika-vin06t:2311_12: ‘abhājite vibbhamatī’ti evaṃ pubbe vuttattā cā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin06t:2311_13: “Paccayavasenāti gahapatikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ paccayavasena gāhita”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2311_14: “Ekameva vatthaṃ dātabbanti tattha nisinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ vatthaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2313_6: na bhikkhunā sayaṃ attharitvā vissajjitabbaṃ saṅghena attharāpetvā vā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2315_1: “Na vissajjetabbaṃ saṅghena vā gaṇena vā puggalena vā”ti vacanaṃ “yaṃ agarubhaṇḍaṃ vissajjiyaṃ vebhaṅgiyaṃ saṅghikaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2315_2: taṃ gaṇo ce tasmiṃ āvāse vasati puggalopi vā,
tika-vin06t:2315_3: gaṇena vā puggalena vā vissajjitaṃ saṅghena vissajjitasadisameva hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ sādheti,
tika-vin06t:2315_7: “Vaṭṭacāṭi viya hutvā thokaṃ dīghamukho majjhe paricchedaṃ dassetvā kato”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2316_0: Garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍanti saṃhārimaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2316_3: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āgantukassa adatvā paricārikahatthato attano nāmaṃ likhāpetvā gahetvā yathāsukhaṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2316_10: Ito paṭṭhāyāti imaṃ pāḷiṃ ādiṃ katvā.
tika-vin06t:2316_15: Eteneva suttena aññathā atthaṃ vatvā “pāvārādipaccattharaṇaṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2318_2: “Kapotabhaṇḍikā nāma vaḷabhiyā upari ṭhapetabbavalayaṃ vā tiṇacchadanagehassa piṭṭhivaṃsassa heṭṭhā ṭhapetabbaṃ vā ubhayamassa gatā dārū”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2318_3: Kārantarāti tadā puna pavisaṭṭhaṃ pubbapayojitānānaṃ vacanapātasenāsanavāso.
tika-vin06t:2318_5: Sabbattha vinaṭṭhavāso na ca paṭisedhako hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin06t:2318_7: Gopānasiādayo dentassa vihāro palujjatīti “mūlaṃ vā dātabba”ntiādi vuttanti eke.
tika-vin06t:2321_2: Dinnaṃ panāti yathā so dāyako deti,
tika-vin06t:2321_5: Ticīvaraparivāranti ettha “udakamattalābhī viya aññopi uddesabhattaṃ alabhitvā vatthādimanekappakāraṃ labhati ce,
tika-vin06t:2321_7: “Uddesapatte dethā’ti vatvā gahetvā āgatabhāvena saṅghassa pariccattaṃ na hotiyeva tasseva hatthe gatattā,
tika-vin06t:2321_8: tasmā tehi vuttakkamena sabbehi bhājetvā bhuñjitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2321_11: “paṇītabhattaṭṭhitikañca ajānitvā missetvā gāhitepi evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2321_14: Atikkantampi ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvāti ettha “taṃdivasameva ce bhikkhā labbhati,
tika-vin06t:2321_15: aparadivasato paṭṭhāya na labbhati kirā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2321_16: Pacchā “sabbo saṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti avuttepi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2321_17: “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā’ti avatvā ‘ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti dinnaṃ saṅghikanimantanaṃ nāmā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2323_3: uddesabhatte pana ekassa pahonakappamāṇe eva ṭhitikā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin06t:2325_0: Na hi bahisīmāya saṅghalābhoti ettha “uddesabhattādīsu bahisīmāya ṭhitassapi ce upāsakā denti,
tika-vin06t:2325_7: Sammukhībhūtassāti yebhuyyena ce bhikkhū bahisīmaṃ gatā,
tika-vin06t:2325_9: Sabhāgattā hi ekena laddhaṃ sabbesaṃ pahoti,
tika-vin06t:2325_19: “Corikāya gahitattā na pāpuṇātī”ti vacanato “kuṭisodhanaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca dīpavāsino vadanti kira.
tika-vin06t:2325_20: Ekaṃ mahātherassāti mahāthero vihārato yebhuyyena na gacchati,
tika-vin06t:2325_24: Vihāre therassa pattasalākabhattanti mahāthero ekakova vihāre ohīno,
tika-vin06t:2325_25: “avassaṃ sabbasalākā attano pāpetvā ṭhito”ti paṭissayaṃ gantvā āgantukabhikkhūnampi adassanato kukkuccaṃ akatvā bhuñjanti.
tika-vin06t:2327_2: “Āgantukabhattampi gamikabhattampī”ti āgantukova hutvā gacchantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2332_0: 332. Pubbe pubbakāle. “Rañño sato”ti ca “raññovasato”ti ca pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:2337_1: Ekarattādhikārena rakkhaṃ paccāsīsantā īdisāti dassanatthaṃ “pañcime”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2337_2: “Pubbe rakkhasseta”nti vuttattā mayhaṃ pana rakkhaṇe kiccaṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2337_3: Parūpakkamena tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti idaṃ āṇattiyā āgatattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2338_5: “Paṭikuṭitoti apasakkitvā saṅkucito hutvā vā paṭisakkatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2339_7: “Akataviññattiladdhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ kiñcāpi taṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2339_9: Tayo atthavase paṭiccāti etthāpi “mā pāpicchāpakkhaṃ nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyu”nti pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2339_16: Āyukappanti ettha kiñcāpi avīcimhi āyuparimāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin06t:2340_1: “Aññataraṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā nisīdī”ti vacanato visabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa pesalassapi bhikkhuno tesaṃ āsane nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2340_3: Ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyāti tassa tassa cittācāraṃ ādissa ādissa desanā,
tika-vin06t:2340_7: Nanu taṃ āvusoti ettha taṃ vacanaṃ nanu mayā vuttosīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2343_1: bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ bhindatīti ettha bhikkhu saṅghaṃ na bhindati,
tika-vin06t:2343_8: “Sīlasatibhedesupi samāno dhammaṃ kātunti saṅghabhede vematikopi tādiso vā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2347_2: Tattha keci evaṃ vadanti “āvāsiko katthaci gantvā sace āgato,
tika-vin06t:2347_3: ‘tenāpi āgantukabhattaṃ bhuñjitabba’nti vuttattā dūrāgamanaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, na gāme,
tika-vin06t:2347_8: Tathā vihārādhikārattā aññavihārato āgatopi āgantuko vā”ti ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2347_10: paribhojanīyaṃ pucchitabbanti uddharitvā ghaṭasarāvādigataṃ sandhāya paṭhamaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2349_2: “Manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā dentī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2349_5: Aggahitaggahaṇena gaṇiyamānāni asīti khandhakavattāni nāma honti.
tika-vin06t:2355_1: “Attādānanti sayaṃ parehi codito attānaṃ sodhetuṃ anādiyitvā paresaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ disvā sāsanaṃ sodhetuṃ attanā āditabba”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2360_5: Na hi nijjhānikānaṃ sabbappakārā sampatti ijjhatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2363_1: “Paṭiggaṇhāmi yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo”ti vatvā idāni kiṃ kāraṇā varaṃ yācatīti ce?
tika-vin06t:2363_3: Dubbuddhino hi keci vadeyyuṃ “mahāpajāpatiyā paṭhamaṃ sampaṭicchitattā ubhatosaṅghassa yathāvuḍḍhaabhivādanaṃ na jātaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2365_3: Dve tisso bhikkhuniyoti dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi.
tika-vin06t:2367_6: utuniyā kaṭisuttaka”nti vacanato bhikkhussa vinibandhaṃ kaṭisuttakaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin06t:2368_0: 425. Tayo nissayeti rukkhamūlañhi sā na labhati.
tika-vin06t:2369_1: Bhattagge sace dāyakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa bhuttavato catupaccaye dātukāmā honti,
tika-vin06t:2370_0: 427. Vikāleti yāva vikāle honti, tāva pavāresunti attho. Ajjattanāti ajjatanā.
tika-vin06t:2371_2: Idaṃ sabbaṃ “ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho”ti paññattassa garudhammassa vītikkamaāpattipaññāpanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2371_3: aññathā yesaṃ garudhammānaṃ paṭiggahaṇena bhikkhunīnaṃ upasampadā anuññātā,
tika-vin06t:2371_4: tesaṃ vītikkame anupasampannāva siyāti āsaṅkā bhaveyya.
tika-vin06t:2374_1: “Navakammanti katvā ‘ettakāni vassāni vasatū’ti apaloketvā saṅghikabhūmidāna”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2374_7: posetu”nti vacanato posanayuttakammaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati mātuyā,
tika-vin06t:2374_9: Vasituṃ ce na sakkoti dutiyaṃ vinā,
tika-vin06t:2374_10: sammannitvāva dātabbā tāya iti no mati.
tika-vin06t:2375_1: “Idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ vaṭṭatīti ekato vā ubhato vā avassave satipi vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2375_2: “Kesacchedādikaṃ kammaṃ anujānāmi sādituṃ ”icceva vuttattā vuttaṃ “tadaññe sāditu”nti.
tika-vin06t:2375_5: tasmā sā vicikicchāya ubhatopi avassave api pārājikakhettena sā pārājikaṃ phusati.
tika-vin06t:2375_7: Odissakābhilāpo hi aññathā nibbisesato taṃ pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2376_0: Kālamodissa naṃ padaṃ, na sattodissakañhi taṃ;
tika-vin06t:2382_0: Nissāya satthunā vuttaṃ, sāditunti na aññathā;
tika-vin06t:2384_0: Api pārājikakkhette, kathaṃ dvāraṃ dadeyya so;
tika-vin06t:2386_0: Vacanañca samānento, no cettha yuttikathā dhīrā;
tika-vin06t:2394_3: Upaddutā ca mayaṃ homāti atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2394_6: “Pañca bhikkhusatānī”ti gaṇanavasena vatvā “vassaṃ vasantā”ti puggalaniddeso kato.
tika-vin06t:2396_1: “Vassikasāṭikaṃ akkamitvā”ti vacanato bhagavato catutthacīvarampi atthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2397_2: kintu susaṅgītā āvuso therehi dhammo ca vinayo ca.
tika-vin06t:2397_3: Apicāhaṃ nāma tathevāhaṃ dhāressāmīti yatheva mayā bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2397_4: tatheva therehi bhagavatā sayameva etadaggaṃ āropitehi,
tika-vin06t:2399_2: therā pana brahmadaṇḍaṃ katvā vuttaṃyeva “channassā”tiādimāhaṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2399_3: Ettha ca ānandatthero viya aññopi saṅghena āṇatto bhikkhu brahmadaṇḍakatena bhikkhunā ālapituṃ labhati, na añño.
tika-vin06t:2399_5: Āgamā nu kho idha āgamā nu khvidha.
tika-vin06t:2399_13: Imāya kho pana “dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā”ti vattabbe visesena vinayassa sāsanamūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2399_15: idaṃ vo na kappatī”ti vatthusmiṃ āraddhattā,
tika-vin06t:2399_16: imissā ca pariyattiyā vinayapiṭakattā “vinayasaṅgītiyā”ti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2407_6: yena sannidhikataṃ yāvajīvikaṃ yāvakālikena tadahupaṭiggahitena sambhinnarasaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitasaṅkhayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2407_10: yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti vacanato purepaṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitenāmisena ce sambhinnaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2407_14: yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya idhāpi “yāvakālikena,
tika-vin06t:2407_18: Tasmā purepaṭiggahitaṃ taṃ āmisasambhinnaṃ āmisagatikamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2407_19: Gaṇṭhipade pana “sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2408_3: vikāle na kappatī’ti vuttavacanamattena ‘vikāle kappatī’ti vikālabhojanapācittiyaṃ āvahaṃ hotīti attho,
tika-vin06t:2408_5: yadi sambhinnarasaṃ ajjapaṭiggahitampi yāvajīvikanti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2408_6: Suttavibhaṅgeti mātikāsaṅkhāte sutte ca tassa padabhājanīyasaṅkhāte vibhaṅge cāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2410_0: Nisīdanaṃ kathaṃ hoti, sadasaṃ tañhi lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2411_0: Tividatthipamāṇaṃ taṃ, dasā tattha vidatthi ce;
tika-vin06t:2416_0: Kathaṃ yujjati no cetaṃ, nisīdanassa nāmakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2421_0: Na saṅghassāti saṅghassa, tañce kappati sabbaso.
tika-vin06t:2423_0: Na saṅghassāti saṅghassa, kappatīti kathaṃ samaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2430_5: “Paññattikālaṃ jānatā”ti dukanayavasena vatvā puna suttantanayena vattuṃ “apica pubbenivāsādīhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2430_6: Tattha passanaṃ nāma dassanattā dibbacakkhunā yojitaṃ paṭivedhañāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2430_11: “Ājīvahetu paññattānī”ti vacanato imāni cha sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesā ācāravipatti nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2430_12: Kāyena pana āpattiṃ āpajjatīti ettha “pubbabhāge sevanacittamaṅgaṃ katvā kāyadvārasaṅkhātaṃ viññattiṃ
tika-vin06t:2430_15: tathāpi cittena adhippetassa atthassa viññattiyā sādhitattā ‘kāyadvārena āpajjatī’ti vutta”nti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2430_18: Porāṇakehi mahātherehīti sīhaḷadīpe mahātherehi potthakaṃ āropitakāle ṭhapitāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2433_1: Katāpattivāre “saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā”tiādi ajjhokāsattā vihārabbhantarepi āpajjanato leḍḍupātātikkamavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2433_2: Dutiye seyyaṃ santharitvāti abbhantare santharitabhāvato vihārato bahigamanepi taṃdivasānāgame āpajjanato “parikkhepaṃ atikkāmetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2434_1: Sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento catasso āpattiyoti ettha kiñcāpi tasmiṃ sikkhāpade tiracchānagatapāṇova adhippeto,
tika-vin06t:2434_2: atha kho pāṇoti vohārasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena “catasso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2436_2: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”ti vutte jatumaṭṭhakassokāso na jāto,
tika-vin06t:2436_3: idha pana “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā”ti vutte puggalaniddesābhāvā jatumaṭṭhakañca paviṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2439_6: Piṭake tīṇi desayi tesaṃ aññatarattāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2439_23: “Ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhātīti paṭhamapārājikaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2439_26: samuṭṭhānaṃ niyato kata”nti vuttaṃ purimanayeti attho.
tika-vin06t:2441_1: Nānubandhe pavattininti “yā pana bhikkhunī vutthāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyyā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca.
tika-vin06t:2441_2: Ayaṃ pāṭho ekaccesu potthakesu na dissati.
tika-vin06t:2443_1: “Kukkuccaṃ cīvaraṃ datvāti kukkuccuppādanañca dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā khīyanañca cīvaraṃ datvā khīyanañcā”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin06t:2443_3: tasmā “kukkuccaṃ dhammikaṃ datvāti pāṭho sundaro”ti vadanti,
tika-vin06t:2447_4: “Ārakā”ti nivattiatthena vuttattā taṃ puna sarūpena vattukāmo “bhusā vā”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:2447_5: “Gehaṃ dhūmena puṇṇaṃ ādhūmita”ntiādīsu viya rāgādiveraṃ maṇati vināseti.
tika-vin06t:2448_1: Saparasantāne vāti sasantāne vā parasantāne vā.
tika-vin06t:2448_2: Tathā vivadantā panāti bhedakaravatthūni nissāya vivadantā.
tika-vin06t:2448_9: “Dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā eva alajjiparibhogo vārito.
tika-vin06t:2448_10: Sabbesaṃ dātabbamevāti sanniṭṭhānena ajānantena vibhāgaṃ akatvā dātabbabhāvaṃ dīpetīti eke.
tika-vin06t:2448_15: Yasmā ayaṃ viseso kātabboyevāti ayaṃ karoti,
tika-vin06t:2450_1: “Paṭhamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena dubbhāsitaṃ āpajjeyyāti na hīti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ vācācittavasenevāpajjitabbato.
tika-vin06t:2451_1: Kuṭiṃ karotīti ettha sañcarittamavatvā dukkaṭathullaccayasaṅghādisesānaṃ ekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭipāṭiyā uppattidassanatthamidaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2451_3: “Iminā pana nayena sabbattha paṭipāṭiyā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2454_4: ayaṃ vinayo”ti vivadanto “tvaṃ kiṃ jānāsī”tiādinā omasati.
tika-vin06t:2454_6: “Sammukhāvinayañcettha sabbattha icchitabbato ‘sammukhāvinayena ceva paṭiññātakaraṇena cā’tiādinā dvīhipi yojitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2455_1: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyoti ettha “kiñcāpi avasesā natthi,
tika-vin06t:2455_2: tathāpi paṭipāṭiyā pāṭavajananatthaṃ pucchā katā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2459_11: Akkosantena hi catūsu vipattīsu ekena anuvadanato “catasso vipattiyo ṭhānānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2459_12: Cuddasa mūlānīti vivādādhikaraṇe vuttā dvādasa, kāyo, vācā ca.
tika-vin06t:2460_1: Satta āpattikkhandhā ṭhānānīti ettha “āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa yā āpatti hoti,
tika-vin06t:2460_2: tassā āpattiyā pubbe āpannā āpatti ṭhānaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2460_3: “Natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusalanti vacanato natthi āpattādhikaraṇassa kusalahetu,
tika-vin06t:2460_5: Cattāri kammāni ṭhānānīti ettha “evaṃ kattabbanti ṭhitapāḷi kammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin06t:2460_11: “kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sampajjatīti attho”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2460_14: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dveti te dve ṭhapetvā aññehi na sammati.
tika-vin06t:2463_1: Ekādhikaraṇaṃ sabbe samathā samaggā hutvā sametuṃ bhabbāti pucchanto “samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā”ti āha.
tika-vin06t:2463_2: Samathā samathassā siyā sādhāraṇā siyā asādhāraṇā.
tika-vin06t:2465_0: 301. Ime samathā samathā, na sammukhāvinayoti attho.
tika-vin06t:2466_2: tasmā vinayo sammukhāvinayoti vinayavāro uddhaṭo siyā.
tika-vin06t:2466_3: Na sammukhāvinayoti sammukhāvinayaṃ ṭhapetvā sativinayādayo sesasamathā.
tika-vin06t:2467_1: Saṅghassa sammukhā paṭiññāte taṃ paṭijānanaṃ saṅghassa sammukhatā nāma hotīti “tassa paṭijānanacittaṃ
tika-vin06t:2467_3: Natthi sammukhāvinayo akusaloti “dhammavinayapuggalasammukhatāhi tivaṅgiko sammukhāvinayo etehi vinā natthi.
tika-vin06t:2471_1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena cātiādi tassā vissajjanaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2471_2: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati,
tika-vin06t:2471_4: tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhatīti evaṃ sabbattha sambandho.
tika-vin06t:2471_6: tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhatīti ettha ekaṃ vā dve vā bahū vā āpattiyo āpanno bhikkhu “imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ
tika-vin06t:2471_9: Tattha saṅghasammukhatā dhammavinayapuggalasammukhatāti evaṃ vuttasammukhāvinaye saṅghassa purato paṭiññātaṃ kataṃ ce,
tika-vin06t:2471_18: passāmī”ti vutte tattha dhammavinayapuggalasammukhatāsaññito sammukhāvinayo ca paṭiññātakaraṇañca laddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2473_3: tasmā na ca labbhā vinibhujjitvā nānākaraṇaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin06t:2474_1: Samathā samathehi sammantīti ettha sammantīti sampajjanti.
tika-vin06t:2474_2: Adhikaraṇā vā pana sammanti vūpasammantīti attho,
tika-vin06t:2474_3: tasmā “yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayena sammatī”ti imāya sammukhāvinayena saddhiṃ sampajjati,
tika-vin06t:2474_4: na sativinayādīhi tesaṃ tassā anupakārattāti attho.
tika-vin06t:2474_5: Samathā adhikaraṇehi sammantīti ettha samathā abhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.
tika-vin06t:2475_2: Yebhuyyasikāya samānabhāvato ca avasāne “sammukhāvinayo na kenaci sammatī”ti vuttattā ca sammukhāvinayo
tika-vin06t:2475_3: sayaṃ samathena vā adhikaraṇena vā sametabbo na hotīti katvā vutto.
tika-vin06t:2476_3: paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇena sammati.
tika-vin06t:2476_5: “‘Akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kamma’nti evaṃ kiccādhikaraṇampi kiccādhikaraṇena sammatīti evaṃ pāṭho veditabbo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2476_6: Aññatarasmiṃ pana gaṇṭhipade “‘samathā adhikaraṇehi sammantī’ti ettha yasmā sabbe samathā kiccādhikaraṇena sammanti,
tika-vin06t:2476_7: tasmā ‘samathā kiccādhikaraṇena sammantī’ti pāṭho gahetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2477_1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti “nāyaṃ dhammo”ti vuttamattena kiñci adhikaraṇaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin06t:2478_2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajatīti paṭhamuppannavivādaṃ pacchā uppanno bhajati.
tika-vin06t:2478_3: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dve samathe bhajatīti “imaṃ vūpasametuṃ samatthā tumhe”ti vadantaṃ viya bhajati “mayaṃ
tika-vin06t:2478_4: taṃ vūpasamessāmā”ti vadantehi viya dvīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2482_1: Nidānaṃ nāma kālañca nagarañca deso ca bhagavā ca.
tika-vin06t:2482_5: ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo”tiādinā nayena uttamāni padāni vuttānīti sambandho.
tika-vin06t:2482_6: Sā sā tassa tassa padassa āpattīti vuccatīti yā “na,
tika-vin06t:2482_8: ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo”ti padena paññattā āpatti,
tika-vin06t:2485_1: Ekuttarikanaye āpatti jānitabbāti ettha āpatti nāma kiṃ paramatthasabhāvā,
tika-vin06t:2485_7: āpatti jānitabbā”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ vibhaṅge “methunadhammoti vatthu ca gottañca.
tika-vin06t:2485_9: Nāmañca gottañca “nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti vacanato sammutimattaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2485_10: tasmā “kusalattikavinimuttā na vattabbadhammabhūtā ekaccā sammuti evā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_11: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ samathakkhandhake “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2485_15: siyā abyākata”nti ettha viya pariyāyato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_16: Atthato hi vivādo nāma ekacco sammutiviseso.
tika-vin06t:2485_18: so “taṃ cittapariyāyena pana siyā kusala”ntiādi vohāraladdho,
tika-vin06t:2485_20: Teneva vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āpattiṃ āpajjamāno hi akusalacitto vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacitto vā”ti.
tika-vin06t:2485_22: Na hi samathā kusalādiṃ akusalādiṃ vā adhikiccapavattanti,
tika-vin06t:2485_25: anuvādassa vā kusalādisamathehi vūpasametabbatā āpajjatīti tesaṃ adhikaraṇamattameva na sambhaveyya,
tika-vin06t:2485_29: teneva sammukhāvinaye viya āpattādhikaraṇe tikaṃ na pūritaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_30: Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjamānassa yasmā sañcetanā ekantato akusalāva hoti.
tika-vin06t:2485_31: Itarassa sacittakassa vā acittakassa vā tadābhāvamattaṃ upādāya “abyākata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_32: Yathā hi “tikkhattuṃ codayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin06t:2485_34: “samparāyikānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭighātāyā”tiādīsu na akusalā vā hoti.
tika-vin06t:2485_35: Itarassa sacittakassa vā acittakassa vā tadābhāvamattaṃ upādāya “abyākata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_36: Yathā hi dvikkhattuṃ codayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin06t:2485_38: tassa vasena tadakusalato satta vinītavatthūni veditabbāni,
tika-vin06t:2485_41: Anantarikalakkhaṇappattassa vasena niyatā ca nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2485_47: tato vā ayaṃ lahukādīti idaṃ sabbaṃ ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ,
tika-vin06t:2485_49: Yasmā “pārājikanti nāmañceva āpatticā”ti vacanena ce āpatti na vattabbadhammo siyā,
tika-vin06t:2485_50: vatthu ca na vattabbadhammo siyā gottena samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttattā,
tika-vin06t:2485_52: Ajjhācāravaseneva āpattiyā laddhanāmaṃ asādhāraṇanāmattā “gotta”nti ca vuccatīti ayaṃ tattha attho.
tika-vin06t:2486_1: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso, moho, alobho, adoso,
tika-vin06t:2486_4: tayo abyākatahetū”ti ca vuttattā nippariyāyeneva “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2486_6: Samathakkhandhake pana sandhāyabhāsitavasena tathā eva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2486_7: Tasmā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sabhāvato nippariyāyeneva akusalā cattāro khandhā,
tika-vin06t:2486_10: khīṇāsavānaṃ kiriyābyākataṃ nāma hotīti kusale paṭikkhitte kiriyābyākatampi paṭikkhittameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:2486_11: Tasmiṃ paṭikkhitte sabbathā avāvaṭaṃ vipākābyākataṃ paṭikkhittameva hoti.
tika-vin06t:2486_21: Itarassāpi ādito chādanā kusalacittatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2486_24: tasmā “jīvitindriyaṃ siyā sārammaṇaṃ siyā anārammaṇa”nti vacanaṃ viya ekantākusalaṃ anekantākusalañca lokavajjaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2486_25: ekantābyākataṃ bhūtārocanaṃ anekantābyākatañca sesaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ ekato sampiṇḍetvā “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyābyākata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2486_26: Samathakkhandhake pana paṇṇattivajjameva sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2486_30: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala’nti ettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin06t:2486_31: Yasmiñhi pathavikhaṇanādike āpattādhikaraṇe apakataññuno sandhāya appaharitakaraṇādikāle kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2486_35: Tasmiñhi sati na sakkā vattuṃ “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti.
tika-vin06t:2486_36: Yasmā āpattisamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin06t:2486_37: tasmā na yidaṃ aṅgappahonakacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2486_46: taṃ yasmā sañcicca “imaṃ āpattiṃ vītikkamāmī”ti vītikkamantasseva akusalaṃ hoti,
tika-vin06t:2486_47: asañcicca pana kiñci ajānantassa sahaseyyādivasena āpajjato rūpavipākaṃ abyākataṃ hoti anuṭṭhānato.
tika-vin06t:2486_48: Tasmā tassa paṇṇattivajjassa sañciccāsañciccavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ,
tika-vin06t:2487_0: Sace pana koci vinaye apakataññū “yaṃ kusalacitto āpajjati,
tika-vin06t:2487_2: tassevaṃvādino acittakānaṃ eḷakalomādisamuṭṭhānānampi kusalacittasamaṅgikāle tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ kusalacitto āpajjeyya,
tika-vin06t:2487_5: Na ca tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2487_7: Kataraṃ pana tassā āpattiyā tadā aṅgasabhāvoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin06t:2487_9: pavattāya vācāya cāti etesaṃ dvinnaṃ calitappavattānaṃ kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva aṅgasabhāvo,
tika-vin06t:2487_12: vācā ca tadā āpattādhikaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2487_14: tā abbohārikā honti kāyavacīkammakāle manokammaṃ viya.
tika-vin06t:2487_18: Yadā pana kāyavācāyo āpattiyā aṅgameva honti,
tika-vin06t:2487_19: tadā “cittaṃ cittādhipateyya”nti vacanaṃ viya pubbapayogānaṃ aparapayogassa paccayabhāvato āpattikarādipaññattiṃ na vijahanti.
tika-vin06t:2487_25: Ettāvatā āpatti nāma cattāro akusalakkhandhā sañcicca vītikkamakāle bhūtārocanaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbāpi avisesato,
tika-vin06t:2487_28: bhikkhuniādīnaṃ ummaddanaparimaddanappabhedā cāti dasappabhedā sakanāmehi paricchinditvā vatthujānanasacittakakāle eva akusalā,
tika-vin06t:2487_29: tadabhāvato acittakakāle vinā anāpattādhikaraṇena kammaṭṭhānādisīsena kusalacittena taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamantassa āpatti kevalaṃ rūpaabyākatameva.
tika-vin06t:2488_8: Yasmā panettha ābādhapaccayāpi na sakkā vinā akusalena surāpānaṃ pātuṃ,
tika-vin06t:2488_9: tasmā yathāvuttesu anekantākusalesu viya lokavajjesu idha “surāpānesu anāpatti ābādhapaccayā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2488_14: tattha supinanto vijjamānampi akusalaṃ anaṅgattā abbohārikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2488_15: Kusale kathāva natthi anāpatti sabhāvattā kusalassa.
tika-vin06t:2488_16: Tathā kiriyāti iminā nayena sabbattha yathāsambhavaṃ akusalaṃ vā suddharūpaṃ vā savipākaṃ vāti tidhā bhijjatīti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin06t:2489_3: sesaṃ saha surāpānena anekantākusalaṃ lokavajjañca anekantābyākataṃ paṇṇattivajjañca yebhuyyena sacittakācittakanti sabbasikkhāpadaṃ tippabhedaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2489_6: sabbaṃ sekhiyaṃ paṇṇattijānanacitteneva sacittakaṃ “anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti vacanatoti sacittakaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2489_11: vatthujānanacittassa vā paṇṇattijānanacittassa vā ubhinnaṃ abhāvena acittakabhāvena acittakaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2489_13: Ariyapuggalānaṃ itaresaṃ ubhinnaṃ vā aññatarassa bhāvena sesaṃ cittakācittakaṃ.
tika-vin06t:2489_15: apakataññuno paṇṇattijānanacittābhāvena vā acittakabhāvena acittakaṃ hoti.
tika-vin06t:2490_0: Mūlavisuddhiyā antarāpattīti antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ katvā ṭhitena āpannāpatti.
tika-vin06t:2490_1: Ayaṃ agghavisuddhiyā antarāpattīti sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjitvā tāsu sabbacirapaṭicchannavasena agghasamodhānaṃ gahetvā vasantena āpannāpatti.
tika-vin06t:2490_5: “Evaṃ desite pana yā kāci āpatti na vuṭṭhātīti apare,
